story:
ProtonMail is an email service that is developed by a team of scientists who met while working at the European Organization for Nuclear Research (CERN) in Geneva, Switzerland. Our goal is simple: we want to protect people around the world from the mass surveillance that is currently being perpetrated by governments and corporations around the world.

We believe that privacy is a fundamental human right that must be protected at any cost. The advent of the internet has now made all of us more vulnerable to mass surveillance than at any other point in human history. The disappearance of online privacy is a very dangerous trend as in many ways privacy and freedom go hand in hand.

 ProtonMail uses breakthrough web technologies and proven cryptographic algorithms to protect your privacy. Because of our end-to-end encryption, your data is already encrypted by the time it reaches our servers. We have no access to your messages, and since we cannot decrypt them, we cannot share them with third parties. We host all our servers in Switzerland outside US and EU jurisdiction so all user data is protected by strict Swiss privacy laws.

We feel that the best way to guard against mass surveillance is to give encryption to everybody by making it free and easy to use. This is why ProtonMail works out of any modern web browser, and why we went to great lengths to make the complex cryptography completely invisible to the user. 


Your email is encrypted by default and can be accessed from your home computer, laptop, tablet and your iPhone or Android device effortlessly. ProtonMail accounts are also fully backwards compatible with existing email so you can continue to send and receive email from friends who aren’t using ProtonMail. We believe the world deserves better email which is why we've also developed a full line of extra email features:

The first $100,000 will give us enough money to buy and host the servers we need to support all users currently on our waiting list. With some luck, it will be enough for us to get ProtonMail out of beta. This will allow us to introduce paid accounts with additional storage after which the ProtonMail project can be self-sustaining.

However, we have a much bigger vision for ProtonMail, and we need your help to hire and expand our team. Below are some of our stretch goals:

We will build these features even if the targets are not met, but without additional funding, it will take us much much longer. Additional funding will also allow us to build a stronger service that is more resilient to attacks and outside pressure. With your support, we can make internet privacy a reality again and protect freedom around the world.


"The only email system the NSA can't access" – Forbes

"ProtonMail's security measures are intense: end-to-end encryption and user authentication protocols so rigorous even the creators can't read user emails." – Huffington Post

"Three young entreprenuers, inspired by their time at CERN have launched ProtonMail, a secure email service with a sophisticated encryption system to deter would-be spies." – CERN News

"A new email service being developed by a group from MIT and CERN promises to bring secure, encrypted email to the masses and keep sensitive information away from prying eyes." – Boston Herald

"By incorporating the company in a country with some of the most strict privacy laws in the world, the developers keep the system out of the legal jurisdiction of both the U.S. and the European Union." – USA Today

"ProtonMail won’t have access to encryption keys and they won’t log personally identifiable information such as IP addresses." – TechSpot

"All in all, I was quite impressed by ProtonMail. The service doesn’t sacrifice simplicity for the sake of security." – Cryptocoins News

When we launched our public beta on May 16th we immediately had tens of thousands of users from around the world sign up which rapidly exceeded our server capacity.  We are working hard to accommodate everybody, but with many more users still on our waiting list, we simply need more resources.

We firmly believe that ProtonMail can only succeed in its mission if it remains independent. By raising money through crowd funding, we can ensure that our first and only priority is protecting the privacy of our users. 

There are certain powerful governments and corporations out there who are in the business of controlling and exploiting personal data that will try to hinder us. If we want to live in a future where privacy on the internet is respected, we must stand together now and fight for those rights. With your support, we can make this brighter future a reality.

Basic ProtonMail accounts are free and will always be free, because many of the people most in need for email that is secure against government surveillance, are also the ones least able to pay. 

We do however have some special perks for ProtonMail contributors. Most contributors will get priority access on our waiting list which means you will be first in line to get a ProtonMail account as soon as we have capacity. Larger contributors will also get one year of ProtonMail+ which is a premium account that provides an additional 1GB of storage space.

Finally, it is also possible to get an exclusive ProtonMail T-shirt!



The ProtonMail team includes 5 developers who met while working at CERN and MIT, and have strong backgrounds in software, computing, and mathematics. Our core development team includes:

Jason Stockman
Jason is responsible for designing ProtonMail's user interface and front end encryption. He has over 10 years of software development experience working with large organizations such as Epson, 3M, Versace, and the International Red Cross.

Andy Yen
Andy has over 8 years of experience in distributed computing for advanced particle physics applications. He has worked at CERN since 2009 on the ATLAS Experiment and studied physics and economics at Harvard and Caltech.

Wei Sun
Wei is our lead backend developer and resident cryptography expert. He builds software for the RE1 Experiment at CERN and is the author of numerous theoretical physics papers. Wei studied physics at MIT.

In addition, we have a dedicated support team focused on providing the best user experience:

Mariana Ferreira
Mariana is responsible for gathering feedback and communicating with ProtonMail users worldwide. Mariana graduated from the International School of Lausanne before studying Public Relations at Boston University.

Dayne Davis
Dayne is in charge of technical support and helps to ensure ProtonMail works well. Dayne studies Computer Science at Harvard University and builds many of our customer support tools. He is also a Bitcoin enthusiast.


Andy Yen Photo Credit: Boston Herald

We’re also looking for more software developers to join our team, if you are passionate about privacy and freedom and want to work on technology that can change the world, email us at careers@protonmail.ch

I have questions, how can I reach your team?

For questions related to the indiegogo campaign, feel free to email us at indiegogo@protonmail.ch. Otherwise, you can always reach us at contact@protonmail.ch 

How will perks be matched to my future ProtonMail account?

If you are already on our waiting list, please use your notification email when you check out on Indiegogo. The notification email is the non-ProtonMail email address you used when registering on our waiting list. With that, we will be able to make sure your perk is delivered. 

If you are not on our waiting list, you can already reserve your username here: https://protonmail.ch/invite/index.php

Make sure your Notification Email (not your ProtonMail address) matches the email you use when you donate on Indiegogo.

If you have any problems or questions, don't hesitate to contact us at indiegogo@protonmail.ch

Is ProtonMail Free?

Yes, ProtonMail accounts will always be available for free. In the future, we will have additional features like extra storage that will cost a small amount of money each month and will help us pay the bills.

Does using ProtonMail really mean the NSA cannot read any of my emails?

As a general principle, it is impossible to have 100% safety. More details about the threats that ProtonMail can defend against and those it cannot can be found here: https://protonmail.ch/blog/protonmail-threat-model/

How is ProtonMail funded so far?

So far, just out of the life savings of our founders. We’re willing to risk everything on this idea because this is something that personally means a lot to us.

Do you have a BitCoin (BTC) address I can donate to?

Yes, you can get our BTC details here. If you want a perk, email us your details at indiegogo@protonmail.ch!

Is it possible to donate via PayPal?

Yes, we have enabled PayPal donations now, but honestly we're not big fans of PayPal. UPDATE 7/1/2014: https://protonmail.ch/blog/paypal-freezes-protonmail-campaign-funds/

$100,000 seems like a very small amount for a major email service, how much money do you actually need?

$100,000 is the minimum that we need to support the users currently on our waiting list. However, if we have $1,000,000, we would be able to easily accomplish all of the objectives we have listed above.

When can I expect to get my perk?

We are doing something that has never been done before: providing encrypted email to everyone. There will be many challenges (both technical and political) so we cannot guarantee that perks can be delivered on time despite our best efforts. Our delivery schedule is provided here. We promise timely and transparent communications if our delivery schedule changes for any reason. 

Other than contributing, how can I help?

You can spread the word about ProtonMail to your friends. Security is most effective if everybody uses it so the more people begin using encrypted email, the better!
story_txt:
ProtonMail is an email service that is developed by a team of scientists who met while working at the European Organization for Nuclear Research (CERN) in Geneva, Switzerland. Our goal is simple: we want to protect people around the world from the mass surveillance that is currently being perpetrated by governments and corporations around the world.We believe that privacy is a fundamental human right that must be protected at any cost. The advent of the internet has now made all of us more vulnerable to mass surveillance than at any other point in human history. The disappearance of online privacy is a very dangerous trend as in many ways privacy and freedom go hand in hand. ProtonMail uses breakthrough web technologies and proven cryptographic algorithms to protect your privacy. Because of our end-to-end encryption, your data is already encrypted by the time it reaches our servers. We have no access to your messages, and since we cannot decrypt them, we cannot share them with third parties. We host all our servers in Switzerland outside US and EU jurisdiction so all user data is protected by strict Swiss privacy laws.We feel that the best way to guard against mass surveillance is to give encryption to everybody by making it free and easy to use. This is why ProtonMail works out of any modern web browser, and why we went to great lengths to make the complex cryptography completely invisible to the user. 
Your email is encrypted by default and can be accessed from your home computer, laptop, tablet and your iPhone or Android device effortlessly. ProtonMail accounts are also fully backwards compatible with existing email so you can continue to send and receive email from friends who aren’t using ProtonMail. We believe the world deserves better email which is why we've also developed a full line of extra email features:
The first $100,000 will give us enough money to buy and host the servers we need to support all users currently on our waiting list. With some luck, it will be enough for us to get ProtonMail out of beta. This will allow us to introduce paid accounts with additional storage after which the ProtonMail project can be self-sustaining.However, we have a much bigger vision for ProtonMail, and we need your help to hire and expand our team. Below are some of our stretch goals:We will build these features even if the targets are not met, but without additional funding, it will take us much much longer. Additional funding will also allow us to build a stronger service that is more resilient to attacks and outside pressure. With your support, we can make internet privacy a reality again and protect freedom around the world.

"The only email system the NSA can't access" – Forbes
"ProtonMail's security measures are intense: end-to-end encryption and user authentication protocols so rigorous even the creators can't read user emails." – Huffington Post
"Three young entreprenuers, inspired by their time at CERN have launched ProtonMail, a secure email service with a sophisticated encryption system to deter would-be spies." – CERN News
"A new email service being developed by a group from MIT and CERN promises to bring secure, encrypted email to the masses and keep sensitive information away from prying eyes." – Boston Herald
"By incorporating the company in a country with some of the most strict privacy laws in the world, the developers keep the system out of the legal jurisdiction of both the U.S. and the European Union." – USA Today
"ProtonMail won’t have access to encryption keys and they won’t log personally identifiable information such as IP addresses." – TechSpot
"All in all, I was quite impressed by ProtonMail. The service doesn’t sacrifice simplicity for the sake of security." – Cryptocoins NewsWhen we launched our public beta on May 16th we immediately had tens of thousands of users from around the world sign up which rapidly exceeded our server capacity.  We are working hard to accommodate everybody, but with many more users still on our waiting list, we simply need more resources.We firmly believe that ProtonMail can only succeed in its mission if it remains independent. By raising money through crowd funding, we can ensure that our first and only priority is protecting the privacy of our users. There are certain powerful governments and corporations out there who are in the business of controlling and exploiting personal data that will try to hinder us. If we want to live in a future where privacy on the internet is respected, we must stand together now and fight for those rights. With your support, we can make this brighter future a reality.
Basic ProtonMail accounts are free and will always be free, because many of the people most in need for email that is secure against government surveillance, are also the ones least able to pay. We do however have some special perks for ProtonMail contributors. Most contributors will get priority access on our waiting list which means you will be first in line to get a ProtonMail account as soon as we have capacity. Larger contributors will also get one year of ProtonMail+ which is a premium account that provides an additional 1GB of storage space.Finally, it is also possible to get an exclusive ProtonMail T-shirt!


The ProtonMail team includes 5 developers who met while working at CERN and MIT, and have strong backgrounds in software, computing, and mathematics. Our core development team includes:


Jason StockmanJason is responsible for designing ProtonMail's user interface and front end encryption. He has over 10 years of software development experience working with large organizations such as Epson, 3M, Versace, and the International Red Cross.



Andy YenAndy has over 8 years of experience in distributed computing for advanced particle physics applications. He has worked at CERN since 2009 on the ATLAS Experiment and studied physics and economics at Harvard and Caltech.


Wei SunWei is our lead backend developer and resident cryptography expert. He builds software for the RE1 Experiment at CERN and is the author of numerous theoretical physics papers. Wei studied physics at MIT.In addition, we have a dedicated support team focused on providing the best user experience:

Mariana FerreiraMariana is responsible for gathering feedback and communicating with ProtonMail users worldwide. Mariana graduated from the International School of Lausanne before studying Public Relations at Boston University.



Dayne DavisDayne is in charge of technical support and helps to ensure ProtonMail works well. Dayne studies Computer Science at Harvard University and builds many of our customer support tools. He is also a Bitcoin enthusiast.
Andy Yen Photo Credit: Boston Herald


We’re also looking for more software developers to join our team, if you are passionate about privacy and freedom and want to work on technology that can change the world, email us at careers@protonmail.chI have questions, how can I reach your team?For questions related to the indiegogo campaign, feel free to email us at indiegogo@protonmail.ch. Otherwise, you can always reach us at contact@protonmail.ch How will perks be matched to my future ProtonMail account?If you are already on our waiting list, please use your notification email when you check out on Indiegogo. The notification email is the non-ProtonMail email address you used when registering on our waiting list. With that, we will be able to make sure your perk is delivered. If you are not on our waiting list, you can already reserve your username here: https://protonmail.ch/invite/index.phpMake sure your Notification Email (not your ProtonMail address) matches the email you use when you donate on Indiegogo.If you have any problems or questions, don't hesitate to contact us at indiegogo@protonmail.chIs ProtonMail Free?Yes, ProtonMail accounts will always be available for free. In the future, we will have additional features like extra storage that will cost a small amount of money each month and will help us pay the bills.Does using ProtonMail really mean the NSA cannot read any of my emails?As a general principle, it is impossible to have 100% safety. More details about the threats that ProtonMail can defend against and those it cannot can be found here: https://protonmail.ch/blog/protonmail-threat-model/How is ProtonMail funded so far?So far, just out of the life savings of our founders. We’re willing to risk everything on this idea because this is something that personally means a lot to us.Do you have a BitCoin (BTC) address I can donate to?Yes, you can get our BTC details here. If you want a perk, email us your details at indiegogo@protonmail.ch!Is it possible to donate via PayPal?Yes, we have enabled PayPal donations now, but honestly we're not big fans of PayPal. UPDATE 7/1/2014: https://protonmail.ch/blog/paypal-freezes-protonmail-campaign-funds/$100,000 seems like a very small amount for a major email service, how much money do you actually need?$100,000 is the minimum that we need to support the users currently on our waiting list. However, if we have $1,000,000, we would be able to easily accomplish all of the objectives we have listed above.When can I expect to get my perk?We are doing something that has never been done before: providing encrypted email to everyone. There will be many challenges (both technical and political) so we cannot guarantee that perks can be delivered on time despite our best efforts. Our delivery schedule is provided here. We promise timely and transparent communications if our delivery schedule changes for any reason. Other than contributing, how can I help?You can spread the word about ProtonMail to your friends. Security is most effective if everybody uses it so the more people begin using encrypted email, the better!

story:
The clou is inside.

This magnetic usb cable is the ideal design for mobile cable solutions. It´s perfect for your keyring, but the real invention is INSIDE the cable: This cable communicates with your charging source and allows your phone to be charged with up to 200% speed!

So if you depend on a working smartphone at any time, the USB ChargeDoubler is for you, because it is the world´s first charging cable which provides:

Charging acceleration with up to 200%...

… for Apple® iPhone®, Android™ and Windows Phone® devices.
It allows you to charge at highest possible speed from a computer usb socket or other usb chargers. This means that your device will regularly be charged with full current of 1.000 mA (1 A) instead of only 500 mA (0.5 A). Save 50% of your time and charge twice as fast as with a standard usb cable!

An “Always by your side” design

Tangle-free with a magnetic lock and its 2.35“ (6cm) overall length it is predistined to be carried on your keyring without compromising comfort while loading.

Protection of your private data

DataProtectedCharging (DPC) blocks data transfer while connected to a computer. This prevents data hacking and any risk of malware being loaded onto your device while charging from an unknown usb-socket or charging while being in a public network (e.g. wifi hot spot in a cafe, hotelroom, airport etc.).

There is no other usb charging cable
offering these advantages at once.


Availibility and colours

The USB ChargeDoubler cable is available as:
• (1) microUSB compatible cable for Android™ and Windows Phone® devices
• (2) Lightning™ compatible cable for Apple® iPhone® devices

Colours: Please select from light blue, orange, lime green, pink and grey.
Any cable type can be ordered in any colour listed!
Just select your USB ChargeDoubler cable type. Your fave colour(s) can be selected after the campaign´s end! We will contact you concerning details.

If you have already a USB-C equipped computer as charging source, the USB ChargeDoubler cable is now also available as:
• USB-C to microUSB comp. cable for Android™ and Windows Phone® devices
• USB-C to Lightning™ compatible cable for Apple® iPhone® devices
Please choose the 17 USD perk only!




Engineering and quality

The USB ChargeDoubler is well-engineered and doesn´t sacrifice reliability and function for bells and whistles. We have tested cable length and have carefully chosen exact 2.75" (7cm) between the plugs. The reason is simple: Whereas shorter cables compromise comfort and tend to break, this length effectively avoids the risk of cable break and makes it easy to use. The safe lock is equipped with strong custom-sintered neodym magnets.

The cable folds smooth as a teardrop.

Specifications at a glance

• charging acceleration with up to 200%
• portable (60mm effective length) through small & smart design
• data protected charging (DPC)
• magnetic lock with N50 neodym magnets for strong adhesion
• spray water safe
• plug & play (universal operation system support)
• works with every usb charger (also wall- & car chargers), power banks etc.
• flexible 2.75" (7cm) cable avoids risk of breakage
• two pair 24AWG conductor for low resistance

Use every usb charger you like, or just your power bank.

How does it work

As soon as the USB ChargeDoubler cable is connected to your device and the charging source, both communicate via the cable´s internal circuit board and supply the maximum charging current.
In contrast to standard usb cables, the USB ChargeDoubler cable demands full (and also compatible) charging current of about 1.000 mA (1 A) from your PC while denying to establish a data connection. Important for you: You don´t have to care about anything – just plug in and charge-up with double speed now.

1.070 mA/1.07 A (USB ChargeDoubler) versus 430 mA/0.43 A (standard cable)


Why do we need your support for this project?

The USB ChargeDoubler cable is manufactured from lots of custom-made components: N50 neodym magnets, circuit boards and mouldings for the connector housings - nothing comes from stock. To make it a viable product, we have to raise funds for initial costs and meet minimum order quantities for all components. Now we need your support to get the USB ChargeDoubler cable in the hands of energy-hungry smartphone users everywhere.
Please help us a to spread the word!



Fulfillment, shipping & insurance

Timetable

• mid of June: end of campaign
• till end of June: production of custom magnets and custom mouldings
• July: pre-production sampling, production & assembly of cable
• till mid of August: quality check in Germany
• mid till end of August: packaging and contributors shipment
Estimated world-wide delivery is August 2015.


Shipping & insurance
Valued friends, supporters & customers: We want everyone (including ourselves) to be happy with our USB ChargeDoubler and this campaign. As experience has shown, valuable goods often get lost or broken when shipped untracked and without insurance. For this reason we decided to offer most of our perks including insurance and a basic tracking. We applied a lot of effort to offer you a fair and well-priced solution and included the expenses to absolute original costs. So these are terms of shipping:

Perks marked with **: Perk includes free worldwide shipping
WITH insurance and tracking. (Recommendation)

Perks marked with *: Perk includes free worldwide shipping
WITHOUT insurance and tracking on contributor´s risk.
No replacement for lost or broken consignments.

Risks & challenges
As soon as our campaign is successfully funded, we are going to make sure everything is happening according to our plan. The supply chain, manufacturing, operations and logistics are set up and ready to go. Although we do not see any direct risks or challenges, there might always be unforeseen tasks that may present itself during the process of production. We are committed to do everything in our power to deliver your USB ChargeDoubler cable on time and keep you informed about all processes.

Thank you.

Thanks for taking the time to look at our project. We really appreciate your support!
If you should have any further question, don´t hesitate to contact us.
Kai & Jorg

USB ChargeDoubler:
200% power, 50% charging time, 10% volume.



Copyright notice
Apple, iPhone and Lightning are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and in other countries. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. Windows Phone is either a registered trademark or trademark of Microsoft Corporation in the United States and/or other countries.

story:
Finely crafted four-sided curved ceramic body

UMIDIGI S3 Pro is designed to impress with its four-sided curved ceramic back plate and highly durable aerospace-grade aluminum alloy frame. This is the masterpiece in your hand.

 

48 MP Sony IMX586 + 12 MP Telephoto Dual Rear Camera

Designed for ultra clarity, the 48 MP Sony IMX586 lens paired with advanced algorithms and masterful Helio P70 AI, captures great details in every photo. While the 12 MP telephoto lens focus on your distant shots. The shots keep fairly sharp even if you zoom in several times.

 

Superb Low Light Performance

Equipped with the Sony’s most advanced 1/2.0 inch IMX586 sensor, supporting 4-in-1 Light Fusion with synthesis 1.6μm large pixel size,  the UMIDIGI S3 Pro is tackling low-light and night time photography effortlessly. Your everyday shots are beautiful, clear, bright and without noise even when daylight fades and night draws in.

 

20MP Sony IMX376 Selfie

Bring Out Your Natural Beauty

The 20 MP Sony IMX376 front camera means every selfie you take will be vibrant, sharp and dazzling. With the masterful Helio P70 AI,  the UMIDIGI S3 Pro can easily bring out your natural beauty.

 

5150mAh Powerful Battery with 18W Fast Charging

Charge Less, Do More

With a huge 5150 mAh battery and AI power management, the UMIDIGI S3 Pro puts enormous power in your hands, while the 18W Fast Charging gets you up and running in just a while.

 

AI Master Helio P70 Processor 
6GB RAM + 128GB ROM

Powered by the AI Master Helio P70 Processor and enormous 6GB RAM, UMIDIGI S3 Pro deals with multitask smartly, delivering smooth responsiveness and lightning-fast gaming experience. While the 128GB ROM enable the massive storage for your games, movies, music and photos.

 

6.3''  FHD+ Waterdrop Full Screen

Immerse yourself in the seamless 6.3-inch FHD+ waterdrop display. When you turn on the screen, enjoy the distinct clarity and vivid colour and dive into your own world.

 

Stock Android 9 Pie
Latest Android Version Out of The Box

Powered by the latest android version Android 9 Pie, UMIDIGI S3 Pro offers you the smarter and faster mobile experience easily connecting to your life.

 

Cashless Life with Secure NFC


UMIDIGI S3 Pro supports Multi-function NFC where Google Pay and on-vehicle payment can be used.

 

Global bands & Dual 4G VoLTE
Perfect for Worldwide Travel

UMIDIGI S3 Pro supports almost all global LTE bands - ideal for business travel. And the S3 Pro also enables 4G VoLTE in both slots simultaneously. Enjoy faster data transmission, lower power consumption and more reliable connection.

 

Key Features

 

Specification

 

Dimensions

157 mm*74.65 mm*8.5 mm

 

Network
Dual SIM use:
Both SIM slots are compatible with 4G, support 4G VoLTE in both slots simultaneously.

2G: GSM 2 /3 /5 /8
2G: CDMA1X BC0,BC1
3G: EVDO BC0,BC1
3G: WCDMA 1 /2 /4 /5 /6 /8 /19
3G: TD-SCDMA 34 /39
4G: TDD-LTE 34 /38 /39 /40 /41
4G: FDD-LTE 1 /2 /3 /4 /5 /7 /8 /12 /13 /17 /18 /19 /20 /25 /26 /28A /28B

story:
Short Summary

We are so excited to launch and share with the Indiegogo community the first wireless HD portable projector: the Pro-X, which is compatible with all phones, tablets, and PCs ( Apple, Android, Windows).

The namesake of Pro-X is “pro” for “projector,” and “X,” as in Algebra, where the X can be any number. It’s the same concept here. The Pro-X  is Compatible with all Apple, Android, and Window devices. With your help, we will be able to produce this amazing new device, which is battery-operated, allowing sharing and viewing in unlimited ways.

We are thrilled with Pro-X, and we think you will be too. We hope you will support our campaign with contributions and by spreading the word to your community!



WHAT CAN I DO WITH Pro-X?

The Pro-X is an ideal product for people who enjoy viewing and sharing their content and data from different platforms. The pro-X can be used in a lot of ways to make our day-to-day lives easier and more convenient, basically allowing you to have one product that is compatible with all of your devices.

The Pro-X can be used in numerous ways; here are few of the ways you can enjoy your Pro-X.

  •   Mirror or cast your phone (Apple or Android) onto a wider screen and share with everyone.
  •   Mirror or cast your tablet (Apple or Android) onto a wider screen and share with everyone.
  •   Mirror or cast your computer/laptop ( Apple or Android and Windows) onto a wider screen and share with everyone.
  •   Always be able to share the content and data of your memory card or USB drive.
  •   Connect up to four different devices simultaneously, and share the fun.
  •   Stream movies from Netflix and Hulu, or your favorite website.
  •   Watch your favorite sport on a bigger screen.
  •   Access files from Dropbox,  Skydrive, or iCloud. 
  •   Be confident in meetings that you can share your data and ideas with everyone.
  •   Surf the web, and view docs, slides, and photos.
  •   Play video games on a bigger screen.
  •   Express your creativity in new ways—use a projection as a guide to paint murals, trace pictures, and much, much more.
  •   These are just some of the activities you can accomplish with the Pro-X.
  •   We are sure that you will think of thousands of other ways.




The Pro-X STORY

How many times have you wanted to share a funny video or picture with your friends and you had to pass the phone or tablet around to everyone? Or how about going into a meeting, and wanting everyone in the room to see your presentation or idea without worrying if they had a projecting device already set up there. Or didn’t you ever wish you could be spontaneous, and have a romantic dinner on the roof or the park with romantic images or videos playing in the background? Or how about watching a movie or sharing pictures when you have those big family gatherings. Everywhere and anywhere: that was the inspiration for the Pro-X. We came up with an idea that combined all our devices into one viewing point.



We wanted a product that could handle all our devices (phones, tablets, PCs) in a more convenient way. Before the Pro-X, the only way we could achieve what we desired was to hook up a computer to a bulky projector (prone to inconvenient overheating). Long story short, that search for the ultra-convenient projector morphed into the initial idea.


For the creation of Pro-X, a multi-functional, portable visual display solves a slew of A/V problems, and opens the door to a limitless universe of content sharing possibilities. It’s battery powered, wireless,  compact, and connects effortlessly with the Internet. Necessity sparked invention, and we haven’t looked back since








  • Why pro-X (projector-X) ?




Risks & Challenges

One of the Biggest challenges we faced so far is finding the right manufacturer and working on the design, we spent a lot of late nights at the office working on the pro-X trying to make it perfect in all aspects :
  • Designing 
  • Quality
  • pricing
  • Manufacturing 
  • Engineering 
And after a whole lot of hard work we found everything that we need to launch the Pro-X.
Even with all that, there are still some risks we have to keep in mind , like inspection of the quality , the success of this campaign shipping and a lot more.
but thanks to a dedicated team we are ready for any challenges that come our way.


    Other Ways You Can Help

     We know that not everyone can contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

    • you get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
    •  use the Indiegogo share tools!
    And anything you do is fully appreciated !
story_txt:
Short Summary 

We are so excited to launch and share with the Indiegogo
community the first wireless HD portable projector: the Pro-X, which is
compatible with all phones, tablets, and PCs ( Apple, Android, Windows). 
The namesake of Pro-X is “pro” for “projector,” and “X,”
as in Algebra, where the X can be any number. It’s the same concept here. The Pro-X
 is Compatible with all Apple, Android, and
Window devices. With your help, we will be able to produce this amazing new
device, which is battery-operated, allowing sharing and viewing in unlimited
ways.
We are thrilled with Pro-X, and we think you will be
too. We hope you will support our campaign with contributions and by spreading
the word to your community!






WHAT CAN I DO WITH Pro-X?


The Pro-X is an ideal product for people who enjoy
viewing and sharing their content and data from different platforms. The pro-X
can be used in a lot of ways to make our day-to-day lives easier and more
convenient, basically allowing you to have one product that is compatible with
all of your devices.
The Pro-X can be used in numerous ways; here are few
of the ways you can enjoy your Pro-X.



  Mirror or cast your phone
(Apple or Android) onto a wider screen and share with everyone.


  Mirror or cast your tablet
(Apple or Android) onto a wider screen and share with everyone.


  Mirror or cast your computer/laptop
( Apple or Android and Windows) onto a wider screen and share with everyone.


  Always be able to share the
content and data of your memory card or USB drive.


  Connect up to four
different devices simultaneously, and share the fun.


  Stream movies from Netflix
and Hulu, or your favorite website.


  Watch your favorite sport
on a bigger screen.


  Access files from Dropbox,  Skydrive, or iCloud. 


  Be confident in meetings
that you can share your data and ideas with everyone.


  Surf the web, and view docs,
slides, and photos.


  Play video games on a
bigger screen.


  Express your creativity in
new ways—use a projection as a guide to paint murals, trace pictures, and much,
much more.


  These are just some of the
activities you can accomplish with the Pro-X.


  We are sure that you will
think of thousands of other ways.








The Pro-X STORY
How many times have you
wanted to share a funny video or picture with your friends and you had to pass
the phone or tablet around to everyone? Or how about going into a meeting, and
wanting everyone in the room to see your presentation or idea without worrying
if they had a projecting device already set up there.
Or didn’t you ever wish you could be spontaneous, and have a romantic dinner on
the roof or the park with romantic images or videos playing in the background? Or
how about watching a movie or sharing pictures when you have those big family
gatherings. Everywhere and anywhere: that was the inspiration for the Pro-X.
We came up with an idea that combined all our devices into one viewing point.






We wanted a product that could handle all our devices (phones,
tablets, PCs) in a more convenient way. Before the Pro-X, the only way we could achieve what we desired was to hook up
a computer to a bulky projector (prone to inconvenient overheating). Long story
short, that search for the ultra-convenient projector morphed into the initial
idea.

For the creation of Pro-X, a multi-functional, portable visual
display solves a slew of A/V problems, and opens the door to a limitless
universe of content sharing possibilities. It’s battery powered, wireless,  compact,
and connects effortlessly with the Internet. Necessity sparked invention, and
we haven’t looked back since








   




Why pro-X (projector-X) ?












Risks & Challenges
One of the Biggest challenges we faced so far is finding the right manufacturer and working on the design, we spent a lot of late nights at the office working on the pro-X trying to make it perfect in all aspects :


Designing 


Quality


pricing


Manufacturing 


Engineering 


And after a whole lot of hard work we found everything that we need to launch the Pro-X.
Even with all that, there are still some risks we have to keep in mind , like inspection of the quality , the success of this campaign shipping and a lot more.
but thanks to a dedicated team we are ready for any challenges that come our way.









  Other Ways You Can Help  We know that not everyone can contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help: 
you get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.  use the Indiegogo share tools!

And anything you do is fully appreciated !

story:
Meet OISLE.

The World's first MagSafe Battery Pack!

 

Charge with Style.

 
 

We´ve design Oisle to work seamlessly with your iPhone.

Charging as soon as it's attached, no more cables on the go.

 

Suitable for all Magnetic Cases. 

 

There is no need to remove the phone case when charging. 

Oisle is compatible with all magnetic MagSafe cases.

 

Smaller but higher Capacity.

 

We use a high-density poly core battery so that it's small and at the same time, 

with 4225mah large enough to give you up to 150% extra battery life.   

 

Wireless & Portable.

 

With its compact design, Oisle is perfect for an urban and active lifestyle.

The size is designed according to the gap between your palm when holding your phone.

Reduce your everyday carry and eliminate the fuss of external charge cables with the Oisle Battery Pack!

 

Choose your style. 

 

 

Choose between five color options and express your personnel style. 

 

Compact structure maximum efficiency.

Oisle ships with both American and European electrical safety approvals (FCC, CE, RoHS, and UN38.3). Moreover, no less than seven redundant safety features ensure you and your devices are protected.

 

The Story 

It all started two months ago.

I woke up to go to work and saw the new Apple iPhone12 commercial.

I was fascinated, as always how beautiful the advertising was. Then I took a shower and I thought about the new MagSafe ecosystem that Apple had introduced with the new iPhone12 series.

Later that day I talked with my colleagues at work about the new iPhone and we thought about all the cool things that can possibly come up with the MagSafe system.

At that time the idea for a portable wireless Battery Pack was born. My friend told me that Apple had already come up with such a device like that.

But then we found out that they had not!

I thought to myself, soon or later someone will do it... Why don´t you take action and make it!

 

This thought won´t let me go and I began my work. My knowledge as an engineering student helped me a lot. After weeks of research and development, design sketches, and more I found a manufacture that was capable to produce the product and we both combine our knowledge to make it happen. Now we are ready for mass production and with the support of 12.500€, we will be able to deliver the first international batch in early 2021!

 

 

About Us

We teamed up with the best manufacturers to focus on creating & designing new and innovative tech solutions. The Oisle Magsafe Battery Pack represents our love and passion for creating a consumer product that we hope will become a part of your everyday life. Our goal was to create a minimal but iconic design.

And there is more to come...

 

 

Why Indiegogo

Indiegogo is a proven start-up platform, whose community of “early adopters” vets, funds and helps refine new products and services in an efficient manner.

The traditional retail model involving distributors, middlemen, and retail outlets is costly and adds no value to the actual product or service around which the manufacturer/customer relationship is formed.

In fact, it is a major impediment for entrepreneurs, who want to realize their vision for a new product. Therefore, we highly value the Indiegogo community and its role in supporting innovation and hope that together we can launch Oisle.

story:
The upgraded, enhanced, and improved RasPad 3.0 is here. An ideal programming tablet perfectly compatible with Raspberry Pi Tablet. What’s more, is that it’s open-source and specially designed for physical computing projects.

 A programmer’s paradise! An open-source, portable, wireless tablet with a straightforward software speeding up your creative journey. Turn your ideas into real-life working projects.

RasPad is a portable tablet tailored for you to start making immediately and working efficiently. 

RasPad is designed for everyone! Here is what RasPad can do for Both an Entry-level Beginner and an Experienced Developer:

As a developer, we need a Personal Project Station to boost efficiency that an extra split-screen is always helpful at any time. By leveraging the HDMI, you can easily extent RasPad with other monitors for double or triple work efficiency. 

Thanks to the Bluetooth, a portable wireless keyboard is ready for you to note down your inspirations, wherever you are.

 See how to leverage the ports:

 

RasPad displays all the source files and data on a touch screen just like an iPad. It's portable and all-in-one that you can easily get easy access to all the source files without a keyboard and mouse.

After collecting a lot of feedback from the maker community, RasPad 3.0 has upgraded and added new features. These features will enable you to create IoT/AI/Autopilot projects without any hindrances.

You can also instantly swap out micro-SD cards to change OSes.

RasPad 3.0 has taken the fun of project creation to a whole new level. Thanks to an iPad like user experience brought to you by 10.1” responsive touchscreen and quick and interactive RPi OS.

The GPIO interface has been retained for super easy connectivity. RasPad boosts your hardware prototype efficiency with 10+ times faster. We make the GPIO open for everyone that you can build fancy projects anywhere anytime.

Get better usability with the optimized Raspberry Pi open ports and keep the creating process stress free.

It's also compatible with different programming languages. Just choose the one you'd love to work with!

RasPad 3.0 also has 5 hours of battery life along with a battery level indicator to keep you informed.

With simple 2 steps assemble, a quick, easy, and portable power packet to help you get started anytime anywhere.

RasPad 3.0 is an ideal IoT project companion as it can help you create millions of applications. How do you ask?  Simple. 

You can use RasPad for programming, project testing, and remote control.

It’s equipped with fast data transfer and equally fast uploading and downloading from the cloud. Turn your RasPad into a wireless Hard Drive that can be used internally as well.

You can then also use the same RasPad to run your home media center.

The CMOS Serial Interface also helps to conduct Vision Project or real-time streaming.

Project dashboard, like make a personal datacenter about your 3d printer and the objects that you can adjust your printing process in time and make a record of your creative hacking & printing journey.

In a nutshell, endless possibilities!

An easy-breezy way to program thanks to the easy to use and simple to understand software. Firstly, choose any language you prefer. It’s fun only because it's simple to understand.

Browse the Internet for any suggestions or doubts.

Use the pre-installed Raspbian Office to assemble or organize your information.

And also be able to debug lines of your codes with efficiency and simplicity.

RasPad 3.0 also supports 3D design Software. Did we mention endless possibilities!

A learning system of RasPad to allow you to explore immersive learning resources and create a tool or instrument of your own. RasPad 3. 0 supports the latest Scratch 3.0.

We have already created some interesting tutorials that you can check out from the library and get started. Step by step guide allows you to transition from beginner to advanced maker in no time.

 Letter Game!

 Tap the Interactive "Ballon" 

Maybe DIY an anti-thief monitor device or make your own smart mirror to turn your house into a James bond style house.

Make an instrument

DIY anti-thief monitor devices

Get the Retro Pi work

Supporting Blockly and Python, you can use Blockly to learn programming logic, then work with Python to upgrade your programming skills.

The Smart "Examples" You Can Leverage Immediately

To make things easier and more efficient. With both Blockly and Python examples, you can use it, modified it, or even upgrade it to meet your needs. 

Boost your programming and project building efficiency 10 times more. Simply use the examples first and customize it to your own projects. 

 Accessories 

With blocks that can be triggered by sound, light, touch and the entire world of IoT, there isn’t much you CAN’T do.

With the remote control panel, you can control the PiCar-X, even with video feedback. Check out what the robot sees, and what it recognizes.

PiCar-X is an AI self-driving robot car based on Raspberry Pi. This smart robot can do color and face detection, automatic obstacle avoidance, but also line tracking.

With SunFounder-designed Robot HAT as the driving module, PiCar-X integrates the motor driving, servo driving, and presets ADC, PWM, Digital pins for you to hack and explore! 

 obstacle avoidance

Line Tracking

Traffic Lights Detection

 

A speaker has already been inserted in the Robot HAT to conduct experiments such as TTS (Text-to-Speech), sound effect, background music, and more.

   Text-to-Speech

 Gesture Detection

The software for Picar-X

Picar-X provides a visual programming platform - Ezblock Studio to learn, program, and control PiCar-X.

For beginners, there are 14 classes to help you completely gain the blockly program skills and the use of several functions of PiCar-X. Advanced users can access through Python! In addition, we have developed a web control page for you to operate with your smartphone/tablet/desktop.

Worried about not knowing where to get started? We are here to help! The part list and Picar-X assemble tutorial offers an unbox experience for you!

Preview the assembly process below:

If you think Picar-X has overloaded functions and would like to explore the most intelligent part, we have specifically made the Mount Camera Kit ready. Think big and start small!

The Mount Camera is equipped with a camera sensor and a 2 axis servo to see and track the world around.

What’s inside:

You can set up a Raspberry Pi workstation anywhere anytime! Simply connect RasPad 15.6” Split Screen with RasPad 3.0 via a single HDMI Cable. Boost your programming or working efficiency double times.

What's inside: 

This small-sized keyboard has multiple useful functions! You can connect RasPad Portable Keyboard with your RasPad 3.0 or any other laptop with both USB and Bluetooth. The convenience is in your hand.

 

Optional Add-on

story:
Wind your charger in 6 seconds!

 

 

The Side Kick extends to hold all of your charging cable, as well as collapses down to 10mm/.4in to still allow for tight outlets and power strips.

 

Adjustable Length Control Keeps you organized whether you are 1 foot or 7 feet from an outlet

Fuse is a Kickstarter born company. In 2017 we launched The Side Winder, the world's first MacBook Charger Winder. Today, we have over 40,000 happy customers asking for more cable management solutions to organize and simplify their lives. We are a scrappy team of DIYers, Designers, and Tech-lovers.

story:
The Problem & Solution

Phones used to be small. Today, phones are big and slippery. It's hard to tap, type, and swipe one-handed. And forget about your thumb reaching the top of the screen. So, we invented the smallest thing possible to make any phone easy to use with fewer drops.

Introducing the Hold Button. We've been using Hold Button prototypes for months, and we love it. With a case, or without. iPhone or Android.

 

 

Is it magic? Maybe.

After a couple days, you'll discover all sorts of ways to use the Hold Button to tap, type, and swipe. Our friends are still showing us new ways.

 

Case or caseless.

We invented the Hold Button for phone commandos who go caseless. But most of our friends use the Hold Button with a case. Do whatever feels right. :)

 

In the news

 

How it works

The Hold Button creates a secure one-handed grip that frees your thumb to tap, type, and swipe. Two hands aren't required anymore.

 

Holds on other places

The patent-pending design holds on to a few other things for added convenience, like the edge of your laptop.

 

Get 3 per pack

Wanna take the Hold Button off, then put it back on? That's why we send you three per pack in a matchbox-style container. Save your extras for later, or share 'em with friends.

 

Hold Button vs. Popsockets and other grips

We actually really like Popsockets, but wish they were smaller, simpler, and more pocket-friendly. The Hold Button works every time you grab your phone. No fiddling.

 

Final thoughts

The Hold Button is fun to use, and a great conversation starter. Plus, it really works. Why do our friends love it?

  • Stop drops before they happen
  • Make any phone easier to use one-handed
  • Works with a case or without
  • Simple, small, and pocket-friendly
  • Uses a minimum of materials for low environmental impact

 

Production Risks & Challenges

We're already in production. If you pre-order now, you'll be getting your Hold Buttons soon. So far, we're only shipping one color: Black. We'd love to get to $50K in funding so that we can introduce more colors. Clear, pink, grey, blue, neon, whatever our customers want. Is "clear" a color? We dunno, but we want it!

 

How You Can Help

Share, share, share. If you think the Hold Button looks cool, tell your friends. Use the Indiegogo share tools. It's easy.

story:
Transform your standard micro USB android cables into UNIVERSAL magnetic chargers!

 
The all-new VOLTA Magnetic Adapter is the worlds BEST magnetic adapter that transforms your standard micro USB android cables into universal magnetic chargers! Not only will it transform your standard micro USB android cables into magnetic android cables. BUT it also enables you to charge any USB-C or Lightning (Apple) devices with the exchangeable magnetic tips with your single standard cable!

This means no more multiple cords lying around the house or office trying to find the right cable for your device. Or even better stop carrying your charging cables with you. Now you can carry our small & compact magnetic adapter to transform ANY CABLE FOR YOUR DEVICE ON THE GO! Make life easier with a VOLTA Magnetic Adapter and never need to replace or buy multiple cords AGAIN!

 

The VOLTA Magnetic Adapter is safe, simple and conveniently connects to any of your Micro USB Android cables.

1. Insert the tip into the port of your device

2. Attach the adapter to your existing micro USB Android cable

3. The VOLTA Magnetic adapter will now magnetically connect when placed near the tip inside your device(s)

Now your standard non-magnetic android cable has been transformed into a universal magnetic charging cable for all USB C, Lightning (apple) & micro USB Android devices!

Fast Charge:  The VOLTA Magnetic Adapter is capable of Quick Charge 2.0 & fast charging.

Data Transfer: Our Magnetic Adapter not only will CHARGE but they will also TRANSFER DATA!

Strength: We refuse to be cheap so we decided to use the worlds strongest magnets! Being two perfectly complementary N52-Grade Neodymium ‎reversible magnets in a 360‎° orientation to deliver an instant and ‎powerful connection every time!


*Black no longer available

 

 

We are also offering you a LIMITED special offer on the hugely popular Volta Magnetic Charger. It's a single cable that is unbreakable, lasts forever and will charge all your devices using a singular cable with our interchangeable tips (USB C, Micro USB (Android), Apple (Lightning).

  • LIFETIME WARRANTY*
  • Quick/Fast charge compatible 
  • Two perfectly complementary N52-Grade Neodymium ‎reversible magnets in a 360‎° orientation are placed at both ends to deliver an instant and ‎powerful connection. In layman terms, there’s no more stabbing your device to connect for a ‎charge.
     

How It Works

Each VOLTA magnetic charger comes with two tips of your choice which will allow you to charge any device using the single volta cable. All you need to do is insert the tip into the device(s) and this will allow you to charge ALL your devices with a single volta cable!



The Volta Charger was featured on LINUS TECH TIPS and has successfully delivered over 100,000 cables around the world in a matter of months!


 

The VOLTA magnetic charger comes in Red, Black & Silver and options of 1m & 2m lengths.


 

The VOLTA Adapter is compatible with 2.0qc & fast charging, however, is not able to work with 3.0qc. Our VOLTA cables are however compatible with 2.0qc & 3.0qc, for our cable compatibility please see the below chart.

 

Lightning

 

 

USB C

 

 

Micro USB

 

 

 


 



The Toughest and Fastest Charging Cable You'll Ever Own... plus a Lifetime Warranty! 


Volta XL also supports fast DATA TRANSFER and fully supports 87W USB-C power adapter charging for 15-inch MacBook Pro, 60W 13-inch MacBook Pro, HP Spectre, Windows Surface, Google Pixel XL/2 XL, Galaxy s9/Note 9 or Android USB C devices (and more)!
 

Charge Anywhere - On-The-Go  

You can now transform your phone into a battery pack with Volta XL. 

On-The-Go charging functionality allows you to share charge between your devices without the need for a charger or a power bank.

You can now safely fast charge your Nintendo Switch and other gadgets as the VOLTA XL Magnetic Cable features the 56 Ohm resistor.

Apple iPad (6th Generation), Pixel 2 XL, MacBook Pro Touchpad, Samsung Galaxy X9, iPhone X.

Get it at a discounted rate HERE.

 

With the success of the VOLTA Magnetic Charging cable, having over 100,000 units sold to over 80 countries, countless 5/5 star rated reviews and having reviewers such as the likes of Linus Tech Tips, giving amazing reviews. You can rest assure VOLTA only produces  QUALITY PRODUCTS!

The all-new VOLTA Magnetic Adapter is no different and we once again have created a product of superior quality, functionality, and style. We are so confident in our products, that all VOLTA products come with a LIFETIME GUARANTEE*!

Check out what people said about our previous product, The VOLTA Magnetic Charger...

 

 

 

Welcome to TEAM VOLTA, we are an Australian start-up located on the beautiful Gold Coast. Our team has sacrificed up everything from jobs, houses, businesses, taste buds (2min noodle life) and even schooling degrees so that VOLTA could become a success! We were passionate about creating a company that produced products that set the standard for the industry. We refused to take shortcuts like many do in order to make a larger profit margin. Rather we focused on producing a quality product that our customers would be glad to purchase without any regrets!

 

 

Click here to learn MORE. 

Be sure to follow us on our various social media platforms to stay updated about all things VOLTA and take part in our various competitions and constantly thriving community (click to connect)!


To stay abreast of all that is happening at VOLTA Charger and also to receive some of the free prototypes of our upcoming new products, kindly join over 1190+ customers in Volta Insider Facebook group and have all your questions answered by us or other customers. (Click below to Join)

 

Do you want to talk about The VOLTA Magnetic Adapter? We have a prewritten article for those who wish to share something great with their viewers. Along with amazing photos, videos, and other advertising materials.


 

Q) How strong is the magnetic connection between The VOLTA Adapter and device?
A) We used the world's strongest magnetism (N52 Neodymium magnets on both the tips and adapter, providing a strong pulling force). The VOLTA Adapter was designed to be the strongest magnetic adapter on the market, so strong in fact that it can even lift your iPad without disconnecting!

Q) Can the VOLTA Magnetic Adapter be used on all cables?
A) Our adapter connects with standard micro USB (Android) cables and enables the cable to then be used on all devices (Micro USB Android, Apple & USB C devices). 

Q) Is the VOLTA Magnetic Adapter MFI? Unoriginal cables don't work with Apple products!
A) The VOLTA Cable works and syncs perfectly with all Apple products. It also supports tethering and syncs effortlessly with iTunes. 

Q) Will The VOLTA Magnetic Adapter affect the charging speed of my device?
A) VOLTA will not reduce the charging speed of any device. It can, however, handle any charging speed of any device and adapters. The VOLTA Magnetic Adapter will support whatever your cable supports. That includes Quick Charge 2.0 & Fast Charging. But only if the cable supports it as well. 

Q) How will my order be shipped?
A) All orders will be shipped with tracking number(s) and will be delivered in most cases by your local or national postal service. 

Q) Does having a VOLTA tip in my phone negate the waterproof of my mobile device?
A) We have tested this by putting a waterproof device in water for 30min. After taking it out the device still functioned along with the tip being fully intact. Although it's possible that water under unusual circumstance can be trapped within the tip causing corrosion never the less this shouldn't affect the device's ability to be waterproof/resistant. 

Q) I bought a new cable, but it only charges when the light faces up. I need refund/replacement!

The reason why our newly improved cables only charge micro USB devices in one direction (LED side) is because of its powerful fast charging feature used by USB C devices. The one-directional charging is made to protect your devices from excessive flow of current. The new cables can easily be spotted as they are thicker than the older cables. The newly improved cables are QC3.0 compatible and supports Power Drive devices such as Samsung Galaxy S8, Google Pixel e.t.c

Read More of Our FAQ here - https://voltacharger.com/pages/help

If you need any help with this, you can contact our Customer Happiness team on care@voltacharger.com

 

REFUND & RETURN POLICY
If you have a factory defect, you may apply for your warranty and we will send you a new product - see warranty guidelines below. RETURNS are accepted ONLY when the VOLTA product you have purchased is posted back to us with all its original packaging and for all cables to be in perfect working order. Only after all cables have been checked we will then refund the purchase price, minus restocking fee's ($2 per item). RETURNS can only be accepted up to *30 DAYS* after the purchase date, anything over will NOT be accepted for a RETURN & REFUND. VoltaCharge Pty Ltd reserves the right to update its shipping & return policy at its sole discretion without prior notice. Kindly note that we do not refund shipping fees as the service is being run by a third party company.

SHIPPING POLICY
We offer FREE PRIORITY SHIPPING WORLDWIDE on all orders above US$60. Flat standard shipping rate worldwide for orders below US$60 is just US$9.99. Standard shipping takes 3 to 10 business days for delivery, while express shipping takes between 3 to 5 business days for delivery (these are both estimations). Shipments that are not delivered due to you the customer providing the wrong address or phone number will be responsible for ALL charges associated to reshipping your order out to your correct address (If you need any help with this, you can contact our Customer Happiness team on Messenger or via our contact page). RETURNS are accepted ONLY when the VOLTA product you have purchased is posted back to us with all its original packaging and for all products to be in perfect working order. Only after all cables have been checked we will then refund the purchase price, minus restocking fee's ($2 per item). RETURNS can only be accepted up to *30 DAYS* after the purchase date, anything over will NOT be accepted for a RETURN & REFUND. VoltaCharge Pty Ltd reserves the right to update its shipping & return policy at its sole discretion without prior notice.

WARRANTY
We offer a LIFETIME warranty on all VOLTA Magnetic Cables & VOLTA Magnetic Adapters and we'll send you replacements for any/all defective cables/Adapters upon showing proof of purchase of the defective product. All we ask is that you pay the handling & shipping fees for the replacement. If however, your cable is damaged or faulty on arrival, not due to wear and tear, we will then in that case NOT charge you handling & shipping fees to replace your VOLTA product. The VOLTA lifetime warranty is specific towards The VOLTA Magnetic Cable & The VOLTA Magnetic Adapter. It's NOT applicable to the VOLTA Tips. We will, however, replace tips that are faulty due to factory defects. However, when it comes to damages or issues caused to VOLTA Tips due to the USER, as one of the many examples being: dropping your device while the VOLTA tip is inside, this will NOT be covered under our VOLTA Warranty. Be sure to read our "VOLTA Product care" page located in the footer (bottom of the website) menu to ensure you don't do something to VOID your Lifetime Warranty. VoltaCharge Pty Ltd reserves the right to update its warranty policy at its sole discretion without prior notice. We offer 24/7 Messenger and Email Support, please contact us if you need assistance with anything at all, we are here to help!

story:
Problem

There are various issues when it comes to managing your money.  Keeping track of expenses and budgeting is a hassle and is time consuming. We over spend without realizing and end up in difficult financial situations. 
Understanding whether you can afford certain purchases or if you are spending within means come up often yet most people don't do anything about it.   
There are various tools available today for you to review your spending history and manually set your own budgets.  However, there isn't a solution that focuses on your future expenditures and tells you how to spend your money and not worry about whether you're overspending.  


Solution

Thrift Track wants to solve this problem.  We are developing a mobile application that will keep track of your spending patterns and make personal recommendations daily on how to spend your money.  Imagine having your very own financial advisor at the palm of your hand, giving you financial recommendations related to your daily expenditures in real time.  
Based on your spending patterns, the app will create daily, and monthly budgets suited to your needs/spending preferences.  It will also make suggestions on how to spend your money across various categories such as dining, entertainment and retail.  Applying big data analytics, the app predicts your spending habits based on prior transactions, geo locations, time and day, and provides specific recommendations to meet budget goals.


How You Can Help

With your support, we hope to reach our goal of $5000 to provide us the initial funds to get this project off the ground.  The funds will contribute to creating the beta version of the application which we aim to have released by May of 2016.  


The Impact

Our mission is to educate and help our customers live a lifestyle within their means and not stress about what they can afford and how much they should be spending.  77 million people in the U.S. alone have some level of debt.  Thrift Track wants to play a part in helping people maximize the use of their money for the long term.  


Founding Team

The founders Sai Balasubramanian Alampoondi Venkataramanan and Kareem Barghouti are students at Duke University's Fuqua School of Business. Sai is engineer with a background in computer science, mechanical and electrical engineering. Kareem works at Google with 6 years of experience in sales, marketing and product development.

story:
Thanks indiegogo!

If you missed our indiegogo campaign you can visit

                                  www.swipecases.com

 

 

The basic ZOpro case is a protective "every day" option for your iPhone 5.  Very Pocketable with Case-Integrated Charging and Magnetic Lens Compatibility.  The inside of your ZOpro is lined with luxurious soft velvet to avoid scratching and the injection molded exterior with "soft touch" offers significant drop and screen protection.  Designed with wide open access for buttons and case-on docking.

If you are looking for a case that will turn the phone in your pocket into a Pro Photo & Video Platform look no further.  The CASE PLUS Perk comes with 1/4-20 tripod mount, handle, and a full set of lenses.  Conversion to a stable platform in merely seconds.  Keep the Pro Mount in your car to mount your iPhone 5 on your dash and it will always be there when you need a tripod mount.

 ZOpro "Pro Mount"

Provides compatibility for hundreds of accessories including Dash Mounts, Tripods, Handle Systems, Camera Dolly's, Sliders etc...  Anything goes with a 1/4-20 attachments system.

 

ZOpro Integrated Magnetic Lens Compatibiltiy System

With a simple "click".  Change The Way You Capture The World. 

        Photos above were untouched and taken with the iPhone & ZOpro

 

The Two Types of Perks

 

ZOpro Case Perk

A basic thin case for daily use with Integrated Charging & Magnetic Lens Compatitility.  You can use any magnetic lenses you already own.

 

 

ZOpro Case Plus Perk

Thin case for daily use with Integrated Charging, Magnetic Lens Compatitility.  PLUS "Pro Mount" 1/4-20 tripod and handle mount, a removeable handle, and a complete set of lenses. 

 

 

Optional

The olloclip compatible case option provides an additional top case that will protect your iPhone while using the olloclip.  By adding this option to an existing comtribution, you will have two different top cases that are easily interchangeable. One with magnetic lens compatibility and one for use with the olloclip.

 

 

 

 

 We have been shooting with the ZOpro for months using multiple prototypes.  It's been an amazing and rewarding experience and we were able to make several positive changes and refine the product along the way.

Join the ZOpro team and "Change the way You Capture the World!"

Thank's for your support,

Team ZOpro

 

 

 

The iPhone name and logo are registered trademarks and property of Apple, Inc. in Cupertino, CA.  iPhone 4/4S/5 models in photos are not included in any perks and are provided to show fit and finish of the ZOpro product.  Olloclip and the Olloclip logo are registered trademarks and property of olliclip in Huntington Beach, CA.  All rights reserved for all parties named herein.

story:
The latest jackless smartphone design has definitely stirred up a lot of hullabaloo. Unless you’re planning to buy one of those easy-to-lose and pricey wireless headphones with limited battery life, you can’t charge your phone while listening to audio from wired headsets.

The Auxillite converter was designed as a solution for dual charging and listening. Instead of purchasing completely new add-ons, The Auxillite external digital-to-analog converter (DAC) attaches to 3.5mm jack and lightning ports, allowing you to play audio and stay charged around the clock. 

 

 Simply Plug-in and Play!

As soon as Apple launched the iPhone 7, users have kicked up a fuss, and rightly so, by the fact that there is no port for their high-quality headphones. This created a unique gap in the market for new technology. In steps Auxillite. This cost effective, 2 in 1 converter lets every user keep their original headphones. Auxillite provides the ultimate sleek alternative, that’s no muss, no fuss.

Introducing a dual functioning, charge and listening add-on isn’t exactly groundbreaking. However, it’s unique selling points make Auxillite the most portable, efficient and cost-effective converter on the market. 

Truth be told, we couldn’t imagine smartphones without a 3.5mm audio jack so that’s why we created Auxillite to ease users into the transition. Auxillite has the potential of becoming a must have add-on for your new smartphone, especially if you want to keep your original high-quality headphones.

While there are plenty of wireless earbuds available, most of them can’t sustain a proper connection, have a rather short battery life and are easier to misplace, making Auxillite the perfect alternative.

Android users and audiophiles out there, we heard your requests! After checking with our manufacturer, we are happy to announce that we now have another version of Auxillite that is specifically designed for Android devices. Built-in with quick charge technology and 24-bit audio, Auxillite in Android version simply makes your audio experience even more pleasurable. *Due to safety issues/design limitation, Auxillite in Android version doesn't support simultaneous music and charging.

 

Auxillite aims to restore the standard 3.5mm headphone jack to your smartphone and to resolve the dilemma of charging and listening to music at the same time. When we designed Auxillite, we put a lot of focus into each small, intricate detail, creating technology that’s so compact you wouldn't even know it’s there.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

The Auxillite team is made up of individuals with numerous years of manufacturing experience. Our vision is simple - to bring simplicity back to jackless smartphone users, so they don’t have to resort to drills, or worry about carrying packs of adapters everywhere they go. We also believe that our users wouldn’t want to see their perfectly good, high-quality wired headphones head straight for the landfill, so we invented a cost effective way to keep them.

For more information about the team please click here.

Every crowdfunding campaign requires the help of inspired individuals who come together and show their support by sharing their ideas and making a pledge. These pledges will go towards making Auxillite a reality by keeping production costs low. We have our manufacturers on standby and we hope to start delivering the first batch of Auxillite to our dedicated supporters as soon as possible.

story:
If you are looking for information about "Zmartframe Turns an Old Monitor into a Second PC", please scroll way down to the second half of this page !

 

Compatible with any projector or panel display, so you can use your existing projector or TV panel to make a BRIGHT and VIVID mega multi touchscreen. No IR pen is needed as your fingers control all !  
 
Projection on a wooden table (from IKEA) with ZmartframeMax on it !
ZmartframeMax on table - low cost mega interactive table for projection

ZmartframeMax on glass - cyber transparent mega touchscreen 

 

ZmartframeMax on TV - mega interactive display panel

 

Setup your mega touchscreen with ZmartframeMax anywhere,  for sure it deliver impressive experience to you for different applications!

  
 
 
 

 
Awesome! Cyber mega touchscreen (2m x 2m) on a truck with rear projection 

 

 

 

Easy D.I.Y assemble and setup

 

 
Zmartframe Turns an Old Monitor into a Second PC
Quote from Yahoo! Tech
"...pay $138 to turn old monitors into useful second PCs — computers that appear to have no computer, no CPU. Just a monitor floating in space, with this frame strapped to it...."
 

 

 

Just put Zmartframe onto your PC monitor , it turns into a mega android tablet and multi-touch screen for Window PC.

 

 

Easy setup Zmartframe for all LCD/LED PC monitor (19"~22")

 Zmartframe turns your PC monitor into mega android tablet

 

Zmartframe supporting multi-touch for Window PC

 

Zmartframe in trial production

 

 

 

 

 

Referral Program

We are pleased to launch Zmartframe referral program here ! By participating, you will have the chance to win a Zmartframe 19"/22" at your choice. 6 units Zmartframe are reserved to prize  

- Top 3 referrers who refer most

- Top 3 referrers who render most contributions from his/her referrals.

To join , simply

Sign Up Indiegogo > Login > Click referral buttons below campaign video

 

Thank you!

We would like to thank every backer for their contribution and assistance in realization of ZmartframeMax and Zmartframe project. Please join our referral program to share our project to your friends,  We need your help to spread the words about ZmartframeMax and Zmartframe to the world! Act now !
