story:
XyraTM is a developing company dedicated to delivering new and existing technologies for the sole purpose of customer convenience and ease of use. Our innovation stems from one fundamental belief: make technology work for you, not the other way around. 

GET CHARGED UP! Visit our website: www.helloxyra.com


**DISCLAIMER: IMAGES IN THE "PRE-PRODUCTION PROTOTYPE IMAGES" SECTION BELOW ARE NOT DIGITALLY RECREATED. IMAGES ARE OF THE FINAL PRE-PRODUCTION WORKING PROTOTYPE.**





MAIN FEATURES




Why we made it

On average, we check our smartphones over 150 times a day for all sorts of things: talking, texting, social media, surfing the web, pictures/videos, gaming, and checking our bank accounts. Smartphone battery life has become a major problem for individuals that utilize their phones for the above reasons. Limitations in battery technology and the creation of power hungry apps are what give rise to the need for the XS powercardTM. Most people leave their home with two things: their phone and their wallet. Based on the cornerstones of portability, convenience, and elegance, XS powercardTM ,  a 2200 mAh portable charger, designed to fit in a wallet, making it hard to forget. It provides your phone with the juice it needs all throughout the day…conveniently. Its additional features such as data storage, data transfer, built-in cables, and single port charging eliminate the need to carry different gadgets/accessories. 




Pre-production Prototype Images


Top and bottom views of the XS powercardTM exemplifying its fundamentals: Portability, Convenience and Elegance.



Measuring 82.5 mm in length, it is shorter than the length of a credit card (85.60mm), ensuring that it fits in the credit card slot of your wallet.



The device was created to optimize the utilization of space and provide you with a sleek and smart look, while delivering 2200 mAh battery capacity, built-in cables, data storage, and smart circuitry.

The XS powercardTM is designed to fit in the topmost credit card slot of your wallet, making it hard to forget. Since it is designed to fit in the topmost credit card slot of your wallet, it does not add any additional thickness (over 6.3 mm) to your wallet. It effectively utilizes the space above existing credit cards to maximize battery and data storage capacities, while adding no additional thickness to your wallet.



The device is equipped with an 8/16/32 GB detachable flash drive to facilitate easy data storage as well as sharing. Rather than having to give someone your XS powercardTM to share data, you can just give them the detachable flash drive.

 


The device can charge your smartphone either fast (less efficient) or more efficiently (standard charging rate). It also has a tri-colored LED indicator that indicates the battery status of the XS powercard.



Both USB and Micro USB/MFi Lightning Connector cables are embedded into the design of the device, eliminating the need to carry cables. The cables are strategically placed to circumvent any possibility of tangling.

Stretched to its full length, the device measures 14.3 inches or 1.19 ft., allowing for a convenient charge.



Single Port Smart Charging: When connected to a power source, the device prioritizes your smartphone and charges it to 100% first. On detecting your phone is at 100%, it starts charging itself to 100%. This feature works with wall adapters as well, so when you wake up in the morning, you have your smartphone and XS powercard each completely charged.



Since both cables are embedded into the device, it enables data transfer/ sync between your smartphone and PC.



In addition to a PC’s USB port, the XS powercardTM is compatible with wall adapters. You can charge the device and your smartphone through one power outlet.



The device is specifically designed to allow you to easily talk/text while charging your smartphone. 



The Micro USB and MFi Lightning Connector tips are designed to fit with most phone cases. They are 100% compatible with official smartphone cases.



The USB tip of the device is equipped with fortified metal, making it robust and safe for daily use.



The XS powercardTM is available for both Micro USB and MFi Lightning Connector devices.



Colors, Specifications & Performance


Charging Specifications



Want to compare?

*6.3mm at the portion inserted into your wallet, 11.85 mm at the top. However, as seen in pictures on this campaign, the XS powercard is designed to fit in the topmost credit card slot of your wallet, with credit cards stacked in the bottom slots. Therefore, it adds only 6.3mm to your wallet’s thickness.

** Prices on crowd funding campaign (Indiegogo/Kickstarter), not taking into account bulk order discounts for the XS powercard. For a 20 pack order, the price of each XS powercard goes down to $32.5.Note: Image of the XS powercard is NOT graphically designed. This is the real pre-production prototype.



Colors



Limited Edition XS powercards

*Note: Limited Edition XS powercards are available for purchase only during the course of this campaign. 



Where the funds will go 

& what you can get

As with most startups, funding is crucial to XyraTM. With the help of family, we have got to the point of having our final pre-production prototypes tested and combat-ready.

However, there are still fixed/variable costs we need to incur soon in order to get the product to market and expand the business. Some of these include:

1)  Product/cable/flash drive mold balances

2)  Assembly equipment and process balances

3)  Variable costs for components

4)  Meeting minimum order quantities to drive down production costs

5)  Hiring employees to speed up and optimize the process  to better serve you

6)  Marketing costs

Some of these costs, such as mold costs and assembly costs, are one-time fixed costs that we require to pay balances for on completion. Some are variable costs, which will help us deliver our product to you quicker.

This is where we need you to help us out: We need $50,000 to meet our fixed costs, hire efficient workers and place a minimum order quantity to reduce per unit costs. This will enable us to provide YOU with a better product at a better price…faster!

With this funding, we will also be able to advertise our product and cater to the needs of people who, in our opinion (and hopefully yours), are missing out.

For your supportive contributions we're offering several awesome perks.

Our perks give you the opportunity to purchase the XS powercardTM at almost unreal discount rates, going up to even 35% off future retail value. People who choose to wait until this campaign ends lose out on these discounts and limited edition offers. We did this because we want to exemplify how much we appreciate your support. It means a lot.



Goals & Stretch Goals



Timeline until delivery



What if we don't reach our goal?

For many of you who might be wondering, "What if they don't reach their goal? Where will my funds go?", we answer: they will all go into the production and delivery of your perks. The $50,000 pledge goal includes allocation of funds for expansion, such as hiring employees, marketing, meeting minimum order quantities to reduce costs, etc. If we do not reach our goal, we will forgo these expenses and put everything towards the production and delivery of your perks, even if it is at a higher production cost for us. You are our number one priority and your satisfaction is paramount. The total funds raised if we do not reach our goal will be allocated to creating a quality product for our Indiegogo backers. If you have contributed and selected a perk, you will receive it. 



Can't contribute? You can still help!

We completely understand that some of you are just not able to contribute, even if you want to. However, you can still help us out. Here's how:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Use your Facebook status updates, Tweets, Instagram, etc. to create awareness
  • You can use Indiegogo's share tools to spread the word

That's all there is to it! This would really give us the boost we need while also making people's lives more convenient and less cumbersome. After all, that's what we're here to do. Thank you!


                     


FAQs

  • How do I choose what color/version I want for my XS powercard?

    Once our Indiegogo campaign ends, each of our backers who selected perks of $34 or more, will receive a survey asking them what color they would like to receive of their version of the XS powercard. Backers that     did not choose the Limited Edition Perks for $45 will get to pick between the colors BLACK and WHITE for their XS powercard(s). Note: if you purchased a perk that included multiple XS powercards, you will get to choose your color for each of them. Backers that purchased the Limited Edition Perk for $45 will have the choice between BLUE and PINK for their XS powercard (as shown in pictures). For perks $146 and greater, you will receive a survey asking you for your choice of versions (Micro USB/Lightning) and colors (Black/White) for each of your XS powercards.
  • International Shipping outside of India for single and multiple units

    Please make sure you add $10 for international shipping if you are shipping your order outside of India. A total amount of $10 is required irrespective of how many units you are ordering. Hence, if you order one XS powercard or order a pack of 10 XS powercards, your shipping cost totals $10. This can be done by first selecting your perk, and then adding $10 to the “How much would you like to contribute?” amount.
    If you forget to do this, we have added a perk “FORGOT INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING?” for $10 which you can select and contribute the $10 for international shipping.
  • Shipping costs for multiple orders with the same shipping address.

    If you're placing more than one order, for example, if you want to purchase a Limited Edition XS powercard as well as an Early Bird Edition, select the Limited Edition perk first. Enter your email and shipping address. Your contribution amount for this perk should be $45 + $10 (shipping cost). Once you have contributed, go back to the campaign page and select the Early Bird Edition perk. Enter the SAME email and shipping address as you did for the Limited Edition perk. Your contribution for the Early Bird Edition should be $34. You do not have to add the $10 shipping amount since you are shipping to the same location.

    Your total would = $45 + $34 + $10 = $89.

  • What do you mean by discount % off future retail price?

    We provide only our Indiegogo backers with 22%-35% discounts you see through our perks (depending on the size of your order). Once this campaign ends, this product will retail for $49.99. These percentages simply highlight how much you’re saving by backing us and purchasing the XS powercard on our Indiegogo campaign. Some perks of $10 and below that give you a discount % coupon (off $49.99) can be used to purchase the XS powercard only after the campaign ends on Xyra’s website.
  • Is the XS powercard patented?

    The XS powercard is patent pending.
  • Are the Lightning Connector cables MFi approved?

        Yes! 

  • Who did your video?

    Our video was done by Gabriel Miller.     Check out his website: www.gmillerfilm.com.

For FAQs about the XS powercard or general FAQs, please visit our website: www.helloxyra.com > Support > FAQs

Disclaimers: 

1. Xyra is an India-based company. It does not have any subsidiaries in any other country. 
2. The product was designed in the USA and manufacturing will take place in India.
3. Xyra does not have rights to the music in the video.

Shipping costs for multiple orders with the same shipping address.If you're placing more than one order, for example, if you want to purchase a Limited Edition XS powercard as well as an Early Bird Edition, select the Limited Edition perk first. Enter your email and shipping address. Your contribution amount for this perk should be $45 + $10 (shipping cost). Once you have contributed, go back to the campaign page and select the Early Bird Edition perk. Enter the SAME email and shipping address as you did for the Limited Edition perk. Your contribution for the Early Bird Edition should be $34. You do not have to add the $10 shipping amount since you are shipping to the same location.Your total would = $45 + $34 + $10 = $89.

What do you mean by discount % off
future retail price?We provide only our Indiegogo backers with 22%-35% discounts you see through
our perks (depending on the size of your order). Once this campaign ends, this
product will retail for $49.99. These percentages simply highlight how much
you’re saving by backing us and purchasing the XS powercard on our Indiegogo
campaign. Some perks of $10 and below that give you a discount % coupon (off
$49.99) can be used to purchase the XS powercard only after the campaign ends
on Xyra’s website.

Is the XS powercard patented?The XS powercard is patent pending.Are the Lightning Connector cables MFi approved?        Yes! 
Who did your video?Our video was done by Gabriel Miller. Check out his website: www.gmillerfilm.com.
For FAQs about the XS powercard or general FAQs, please visit our website: www.helloxyra.com > Support > FAQsDisclaimers: 1. Xyra is an India-based company. It does not have any subsidiaries in any other country. 2. The product was designed in the USA and manufacturing will take place in India.3. Xyra does not have rights to the music in the video.

story:
The ultimate solar lamp and phone charger - for the world

BRIGHT Products is a start-up company on a mission to turn the world on to smart, simple and sustainable power solutions. Our first product - The BELL solar lamp and mobile phone charger can replace weak and polluting kerosene lamps in developing countries - but also serve the needs of campers and hikers across the world.

It has been developed over 3 years by K8 Industrial Design in Norway, and is already awarded with the International Design Award and as winner of the Common Pitch in Colorado US 2011.

The unique design lets you turn the product into a reading light, a ceiling light or a portable light - depending on what you need. It takes 8-10 hours of good sunlight to charge the batteries full. It can also be charged with a wall adaptor or 12V car adaptor. The light can be regulated from low (50 hours) to medium (8 hours) to high (4 hours). You can also use it to charge mobile phones, and on top of that the bell lampshade works as a great sound amplifier when you insert your mobile phone into it for music or radio.  It´s like the Swiss Army Knife of solar lamps!

Over the last 4 months we have travelled the world to test 10 prototypes. In the deep Norwegian woods and rural villages in Kenya, Tanzania and Bangladesh.  And people really love it! CARE Norway and CARE local field workers in Tanzania and Bangladesh has helped us out with the prototype testing. THANKS!

 

NOW we need your help to fund the production tools needed for mass production. The cost for this is $50.000.

By supporting our project you can contribute to improved education, health, income and prosperity of millions of people. Through our close collaboration with CARE Norway, we will reach out through women groups and local entrepreneurs for long term, sustainable distribution models in East Africa and Asia. Even if you just want one of the very first models for yourself, you will contribute to this goal.

«The lamps from Bright Products give poor women, who do not have access to ordinary electricity, the opportunity to study or work well after the sun has gone down. The fact that it can also be used as a flash light allows women to move more freely around after dark, without compromising their safety. We are excited about our partnership with Bright and the opportunities and improved quality of life these lamps bring to poor women and girls.» Torild Skogsholm - Country Director, CARE Norway

What We Need & What You Get

Up to this stage, we have funded the development, prototyping and travels with the help of families and friends. The next big investment is production tools for injection molding of all the plastic parts of the product. We have quoted this in both Europe and China, and our best bid at this stage is $50.000 for single cavity tools that will last for up to 1 million units produced. Tooling will start as soon as the funding is in place.

If you help us out - you can become one of the first in the world to get this amazing product. And if you wish to support our efforts to reach the people who need it the most - you can order products that will be distributed through our partnership with CARE. A global Non Governmental Organization, specializing in helping and empowering women.

IF YOU FIND THE PRICE A LITTLE HIGH considering the income level in parts of Africa and Asia, remember that this is a fundraising campaign for production tools and that future price in developing countries will be lower.

Proven impact for every Kerosene lamp replaced

  • ONE kerosene lamp replaced with a BELL will have these positive effects:
  • BIG improvements in light quality for studies and work after 6 PM.
  • Increased time for studies and home businesses by 4-6 hours every day!
  • Reduction in toxic fumes from the kerosene lamp, equal to two packs of cigarettes a day for woman and children in a small hut.
  • Reduction in CO2 emissions of about 200-250 kg per year
  • Increased safety for the owner. Reduced fire hazard indoors. A portable light to be safe in traffic, against assaults/rape and from poison snakes.
  • Reduction in money spent on charging phones. To fully charge a phone in Africa will often cost USD 0,2 - 0,3. And charged phones really drive local economy!
  • Through our partnership with CARE Norway, we aim to support hundreds of local woman entrepreneurs with a "Solar Shop Start-up kit", making every donation support a sustainable, local way of building competence and distribution for solar energy.

If you just wish to buy one for yourself, it´s good to know that this will also help us in our ambitions to reach the whole world!

Help us share this with relevant connectors!

If you have a wide network, or know someone who does - PLEASE help us spread the word about our product and campaign. We will also be happy to receive tips and ideas about relevant communities, bloggers or media to contact directly to bring the story out to as many as possible. Big love and thanks!

story:
The NetPORT enables you to run any Android app on the market using the TV as your display.  This includes: video chatting, web browsing, multimedia playback, productivity tools, gaming and so much more. Only for $149.

Around the size of a standard mouse, the NetPORT’s controller is an original design that allows you to choose the best input option for you!  The controller includes:

Camera for gesture and motion control- Flip open the controller’s top and you will find a camera that detects your hand and finger gestures to select, move, drag and control your applications.

D-Pad with 4 buttons: Use the D-Pad mode to type, control the cursor, or for gaming.

Accelerometer and Gyrometer: Allows you to use the controller as an “air mouse” or pointing device, just aim the controller at the screen like a laser pointer and click. 

Mouse mode: Place the controller on any surface and use it as a standard mouse. Additionally, use one of the NetPORT’s USB inputs and hook up a keyboard for some more productive office work or homework.

Chat mode: With the built in microphone you can talk into your controller for voice chat over the internet. Additionally, plug a webcam into one of the NetPORT’s USB ports and video chat with friends and family.

NetPORT

  • 1 Mini-HDMI TV Output
  • 2 Mini-USB Ports
  • 1 Ethernet Port
  • Audio Output Jack
  • 1 Power Adaptor Input
  • SD Card slot
  • Infrared Sensor
  • Bluetooth
 

Wireless Controller

  • D-Pad / 4 button controller
  • Camera for Motion Control & Optical Reading
  • Optical Mouse
  • Acceleration Sensor
  • Gyro Sensor
  • Microphone
 
Use the two USB ports to connect Android compatible USB devices like Portable Hard Drives, Keyboards, Webcams, etc.

The onboard Bluetooth interface will allow you to connect to mobile devices.

More details »
 

SDK – Create your own Motion Controlled Content

An SDK will be available for developers and enthusiasts to develop new apps or adapt existing ones to work with the controller in more unique ways like exergaming, remote monitoring, educational content and so much more!

We know there are brilliant people out there, so here is your chance to show us your “Minority Report” app.

And speaking of brilliant people, our partners in Japan have developed many wireless interfaces over the years that have been in the market since 2000.  The SDK will allow developers to use legacy controllers for new apps and games.

Who are we?

Lifestyle Interactive Technologies (LIT) is a Private US Company founded in 2008.  We develop interactive technologies for Schools, Senior Homes, YMCAs, Boys & Girls Clubs, and other Institutions.  Our journey in this arena began in 2004 as part of the team that launched the XaviXPORT interactive TV system.

Our interactive technology is socially responsible, non-violent, and family friendly.  The software is based on entertainment and geared towards: fighting childhood and adult obesity, slowing the aging process, developing skills and abilities.  We want people to have fun together with family and friends and benefit from their experiences. 

Why are we doing this?

The NetPORT idea came about based on feedback from customers.  There have been requests over the years to bring to market updated content, and to localize technologies and content developed by SSD.  We did not want to create a 1-off or limited use products, so our challenge was to find a way to combine multiple features and uses into 1 compact well priced system based on the latest technology that offers something for everyone.  By combining the Android platform with SSD’s sensor technologies we are able to offer this system.

Our Development Partner, SSD

SSD COMPANY LIMITED is a private Japanese Corporation founded in 1995.  SSD primarily develops hardware and software solutions for companies such as Hasbro, Bandai, Takara-Tomy, NTT DoCoMo, Epoch, and other companies.  They have over 200 patents granted/pending and have developed more than 800 different consumer products for their business partners. 

Where we are at and why we need your help 

Multiple products have been developed over the years for other companies based on these technologies.  In August of this year we decided to make the NetPORT as our own branded product.  LIT's 1st.  We are making progress on the NetPORT, but we need your help to finalize development.  The funds we are seeking are for controller component integration, to purchase the necessary tooling for Mass Production, and to fund the first production run.

Based on reaching our funding goal, we can achieve the Timeline Milestones that follow:

Working versions of the NetPORT and Controller Completed
    March 15th, 2013

Software Development Kits Available
    March 30th, 2013

Finalize Design and Start Mass Production
    June 15th, 2013

Ship Out from China
    July 15th, 2013

1st USA Sales/Shipments
    August 15th, 2013

Pledge $5 or more

Support at any level gets us closer to our goal.  We thank you for your support and will add your name to the pledge page on our website.

Pledge $99

Be the 1st to own the NetPORT, at an early adopter price.  You will also have free access to any launch games and apps developed by LIT. (includes shipping in the USA only.  Add $15 to shipments outside the USA)

Pledge $149

Get your NetPORT with free launch games and apps developed by LIT. (includes shipping in the USA only.  Add $15 to shipments outside the USA)

Pledge $249

We believe in giving back to the community.  Now is your chance to help us help others.  With this pledge you will get a NetPORT with free launch games and apps developed by LIT for yourself, and a second one to give to a friend, a family member, or perhaps donate to a local Senior Home or School.  If you would like to donate, but do not know where, we will provide a list on our website in the next few months for you to choose from.  We will send a letter to the donation recipient identifying you and your contribution.  (includes shipping in the USA only.  Add $15 to shipments outside the USA)

 

Note: Any duties, fees, or taxes imposed by countries outside the USA are your sole responsibility.

story:
About aGrowBotics & the Grow Case

Designed with the intention of revolutionizing the urban/vertical farming movement, aGrowbotics' Grow Case has the ability to allow anyone the possibility of growing a full spectrum of fruits, vegetables, herbs and flowers in a portable, automated, turnkey & secure system. The Grow Case is less expensive to operate than traditional hydroponic gardens, uses less space, water & nutrients, grows 3 times more produce in the same floor space & saves you money. With remote monitoring and control our gardens have the ability to be run from anywhere in the world. In addition our Plant OS with touch screen tablet controls can prescribe the perfect growing conditions for light cycles, fertilizer ratios, temperatures, watering schedules, grow times and expected yields for over 200 different crops as well as keep detailed grow journals for future reference.

Watch Our Assembly Video


Mission Statement

We at aGrowBotics are dedicated the the evolution of Urban & Vertical farms and gardening methods with the debut of our portable rotary garden systems. Our diligence in maintaining a quality brand is derived from our detailed product development and continuous market research and involvement. We ensure that our clients receive exceptional value, consistency and professional guidance when purchasing our systems. Our number one goal is to develop a life long relationship with our customers so that we can add to and advance their gardens as their growing needs expand and change. Our team culture is to continue product advancement, development and communication, while gaining financial stability and operating at a profit.

Urban/Vertical/Rotary Farming Benefits

  • Locally grown produce has a higher nutritional value
  • More efficient use of space & resources
  • Creates jobs & incomes
  • Vertical & Urban farming has a proven tack record of producing many times more produce than traditional farming methods
  • Foods does not need to travels great distances
  • Cost of produce is cheaper
  • Lowers pollution & carbon foot prints of growing food
  • Great source of organic products
  • Food security, avoid recalls
  • Produce more in less space
  • Gravitational stress on plants from rotating produces bigger yields


Grow Case Specs

Dimensions

Mini Grow Case 18"x18"x6" 4-32 plants depending on size 6" plant height

Medium Case 36"x36"x12" 16-64 plants depending on size 12" plant height

Regular Case 60"x60"x36" 64-256 plants depending on size 24" plant height

 

Features:

  • LED Lights
  • Fogponics
  • Remote Monitoring & Control
  • Portability
  • Stackable
  • Dual Chamber with Light Mover, Doubles Your Crop
  • Air & Water Filtration
  • Strong Carbon Fiber Construction
  • Nutrient Dispenser
  • Automated Climate Controls
  • 56L Collapsible Reservoir
  • All Fits Into a Briefcase
  • Uses only $30 a Month in Electricity
  • Patent Pending Product
  • Made in Canada

Benefits of Owning a Grow Case

  • Grow over 200 Varieties of Fruits, Vegetables, Herbs & Flowers
  • Convenient, Easy to use, Easy to Setup
  • Cost Efficient Wat to Grow Your Own Produce
  • Pays for Itself in a Few Harvests
  • Freedom to Grow Your Own Food no Matter the Size of Your Space
  • Eating Locally Produced, Organic Produce is Better For Your Health
  • Can be Run From Anywhere in the World
  • Will Clean the Air in Your House
  • Plant OS Allows Anyone with no Prior Gardening Experience to Grow
  • Makes You Feel Good!
  • 24/7/365 Customer Service Support
  • Lower Power & Water Consumption than Traditional Gardening Methods
  • 3 Year Warranty
  • Many Businesses Can be Started with an aGrowBotics Farm
  • No Fire Hazards Associated with HID Lights
  • Appliance of the Future
  • Can Meet an Average Family's Produce Needs Indefinitely

 

Market Segments

Many Industries Can Benefit From Owning Grow Cases of an aGrowBotics Farm, Here is a Short List:

  • Individuals Interested in Green, Organic Living
  • Restaruants
  • Food Industry
  • Grocery Retailers
  • Investors & Entrepreneurs in General
  • Resorts
  • Hobbyist Gardeners
  • Preppers
  • Condo, Real Estate Developers
  • Appliance Reatilers
  • Hydroponics Store
  • Medical Dispensaries
  • Health Supplement Companys
  • Natural Cures , Neutraceutical Industry
  • Community Garden Projects
  • Remote Outposts
  • Universities
  • Army Bases
  • Desert, Arctic Communites
  • Aboriginal Communities
  • & Many Others

Future Plans For aGrowBotics

After the successful launch of our Grow Case, aGrowBotics will begin construction of a large aGrowBotics Urban, Vertical Farm using arrays of Grow Cases. Many products will be produced from the locally grown organic produce grown.

Humanitarianism & Philanthropy Work

aGrowBotics has a mission: To help contribute to the overall well-being and sustainability in all areas of food production around the world. By donating containerized aGrowBotics Farms to various organizations and regions we will help these communities to become self sufficient, while creating jobs and incomes.

Watch out for our upcoming events and the opening of many non-profit community gardens utilizing our systems.

 

Explanation of Use of Funds

$5000 - Prototype

$20,000 - Tooling & Shop

$30,000 - Raw Materials For First Round of Production

$7,500 - Advertising, Marketing

$6,000 Indiegogo Fees and Perks

Explanation of Perks

Gift Cards for aGrowBotics Farms Organic Produce

  • $10 Perk - $10 Gift Card for aGrowBotics Farm Products
  • $25 Perk - $25 Gift Card for aGrowBotics Farm Products
  • $50 Perk - $50 Gift Card for aGrowBotics Farm Products
  • $75 Perk - $75 Gift Card for aGrowBotics Farm Products
  • $100 Perk - $100 Gift Card for aGrowBotics Farm Products

Pre-Purchase a Grow Case in 3 Different Sizes

  • $500 Mini Grow Case
  • $1500 Medium Grow Case
  • $3500 Regular Grow Case

Grant Info

aGrowBotics has applied for and successfully received a grant on July 23 2012 in the amount of $5000 from the government of Canada, through Mizwe Biik's Self-Employment Program to help with start up costs, product development and patenting consultation

Patent Info

aGrowBotics has also applied for and been granted a provisional patent from the USPTO. Filed on March 15, granting protection from infringements and adding to the overall marketability and value of the company.

Upcoming Events

Come out a see us at the following event

  • GMM May 11 - Toronto
  • Freedom Festival May 11 - Toronto
  • Treating Yourself Medical Expo - May 24-26 - Toronto

Will Clean the Air in Your House
Plant OS Allows Anyone with no Prior Gardening Experience to Grow
Makes You Feel Good!
24/7/365 Customer Service Support
Lower Power & Water Consumption than Traditional Gardening Methods
3 Year Warranty
Many Businesses Can be Started with an aGrowBotics Farm
No Fire Hazards Associated with HID Lights
Appliance of the Future
Can Meet an Average Family's Produce Needs Indefinitely

 
Market Segments
Many Industries Can Benefit From Owning Grow Cases of an aGrowBotics Farm, Here is a Short List:

Individuals Interested in Green, Organic Living
Restaruants
Food Industry
Grocery Retailers
Investors & Entrepreneurs in General
Resorts
Hobbyist Gardeners
Preppers
Condo, Real Estate Developers
Appliance Reatilers
Hydroponics Store
Medical Dispensaries
Health Supplement Companys
Natural Cures , Neutraceutical Industry
Community Garden Projects
Remote Outposts
Universities
Army Bases
Desert, Arctic Communites
Aboriginal Communities
& Many Others

Future Plans For aGrowBotics
After the successful launch of our Grow Case, aGrowBotics will begin construction of a large aGrowBotics Urban, Vertical Farm using arrays of Grow Cases. Many products will be produced from the locally grown organic produce grown.
Humanitarianism & Philanthropy Work
aGrowBotics has a mission: To help contribute to the overall well-being and sustainability in all areas of food production around the world. By donating containerized aGrowBotics Farms to various organizations and regions we will help these communities to become self sufficient, while creating jobs and incomes.
Watch out for our upcoming events and the opening of many non-profit community gardens utilizing our systems.
 
Explanation of Use of Funds
$5000 - Prototype
$20,000 - Tooling & Shop
$30,000 - Raw Materials For First Round of Production
$7,500 - Advertising, Marketing
$6,000 Indiegogo Fees and Perks
Explanation of Perks
Gift Cards for aGrowBotics Farms Organic Produce

$10 Perk - $10 Gift Card for aGrowBotics Farm Products
$25 Perk - $25 Gift Card for aGrowBotics Farm Products
$50 Perk - $50 Gift Card for aGrowBotics Farm Products
$75 Perk - $75 Gift Card for aGrowBotics Farm Products
$100 Perk - $100 Gift Card for aGrowBotics Farm Products

Pre-Purchase a Grow Case in 3 Different Sizes

$500 Mini Grow Case
$1500 Medium Grow Case
$3500 Regular Grow Case

Grant Info
aGrowBotics has applied for and successfully received a grant on July 23 2012 in the amount of $5000 from the government of Canada, through Mizwe Biik's Self-Employment Program to help with start up costs, product development and patenting consultation
Patent Info
aGrowBotics has also applied for and been granted a provisional patent from the USPTO. Filed on March 15, granting protection from infringements and adding to the overall marketability and value of the company.
Upcoming Events
Come out a see us at the following event

GMM May 11 - Toronto
Freedom Festival May 11 - Toronto
Treating Yourself Medical Expo - May 24-26 - Toronto

story:
Meet Jackster

Jackster is a convenient, clippable 3.5 mm wireless audio Bluetooth receiver with vibrating notification designed to make your connected life convenient by putting the headphone jack wherever you want it. Wear Jackster by your pocket or collar to keep your hands free and your space clear.  Wear the headset and headphones of your choice rather than be restricted by different jacks and adapters.  

Your favorite playlist at the gym, tangle free

Apple may have done away with the 3.5 mm headphone jack, but with Jackster you can still use your favorite headphones – no ridiculous dongle required. Our team is reclaiming our digital lives and we’d love for you to be a part of it. Check out Jackster below, and thank you for supporting us.  As our moulds and electronics are done, we can immediately go to mass production after the campaign and anticipate delivery within 2 months!  

Take calls away from your desk

We were tired of the little inconveniences: earbuds popping out, being tied by a headphone cord to a laptop, the 5-minute scramble untangling cords before a workout. So we created Jackster.

Now you can use your favorite headphones with any Bluetooth-enabled devices, including the iPhone 7. Keep your phone tucked away, the tangle out of your pocket, and your hands free. Jackster reduces dropped phones. 

Ideal for...

Cycling, taking calls at the office, jogging, driving, yoga, video games, weight training, and talking with Siri hands free. 

Jacksters come with a high quality 3.5 mm headset which attaches magnetically when not in use

Our small team is reclaiming their digital lives and they’d love for you to be a part of it too. 

You can connect to all your devices. You can play your music in the car, at home, in the gym, and all with your hands free and your phone tucked away safely nearby. Go back to doing what you want to be doing.

After the Campaign

We'll ask you for your choice of color at the end of the campaign. All Jacksters are black but the button comes in various color options.

As expected, our customer service team will answer your questions during and after the campaign. 

Risks and challenges

The Jackster team has secured manufacturing and has already produced 80 fully functioning prototypes that are currently being tested by friends and family. We have a great relationship with not only the manufacturer but also distribution teams.

As we have built many electronic products over the past 10 years, we don't anticipate any delays. However, we are still subject to external factors such as supplier delivery delays which we plan to provide contingencies for in case the supplier doesn't come through.

story:
Meet Angel. The lightest, credit card size, USB-C power bank, made with Graphene Technology.

Fast, safe and portable. Angel has been designed to fit comfortably in your pocket or purse. With 18.5W 5V Divine Power and dual USB ports, Angel keeps Android and IOs phones and USB devices powered all day.

 

 

 

 

 

Angel is made with Graphene - a 'super-material', with many super abilities. Cools batteries,  no overheating. Protects devices from power surges. Enhances charging speed. Enhances battery life span and is 200x stronger than steel.

 

 

Angel provides 5000mAh / 18.5W of fast charging capability through both its USB-C port and USB-A port. With up to 18.5W of 'Divine Power' Delivery (DPD), Angel can charge an iPhone 11 Pro or Galaxy S20 up to 50% within 45 mins. 

 

 

Angel's Graphene core enables 'rapid recharging' in 1:45hrs. So you can quickly rejuice Angel and get going. A similar external battery may take more than four hours to recharge at 2 amps.

 

Designed to fit comfortably in your pocket or purse. Carry Angel all day, whever life takes you (without feeling like you are carrying a brick!)

 

 

 

 

 

Dual USB ports mean Angel can charge not one, but two devices at a time.  Keep multiple devices charged on the go or share with friends.

 

 

 

Angel is fully tested and put through a number of rigorous industrial tests to ensure it can with stand daily use - even in the most extreme of circumstances.

 

 

Angel has a full 2 years warranty, which doubles most other power bank brand's 1 year warranty.

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Capacity: 5000 mAh 18.5Wh
  • Input Interface: Micro USB = 5V 2A / USB-C = 5V 2A
  • Output Interface:   USB-A = 5V 2A / USB-C = 5V 2A
  • Dimension: 91(L)x63(W)x12.5(T)mm
  • Weight: 103g
  • Battery Type: Li-Polymer Battery
  • Battery Life: 5 Years
  • Battery Life Cycles: 1500
  • Time to Full Charge From Empty: 1:45hrs
  • Operating Temperature: -15°c to 70°c
  • Protection: Over-discharging, Short Circuit Protection, Over-charging
  • Certificate: CE, RoHS, FCC

 

 

We are Lifestyles Trading Ltd, a team of brothers with a mission to innovate and improve everyday electronic and household items that assist us in our everyday life’s. 

Our driving focus is to deliver products that we and our community love. With quality and engineering precision at the heart of all our designs.

Join our newest adventure - Angel Power Bank and together we can shape the future of electronics.

 

All orders will be 'tracked shipping'. You will receive a personal tracking number for your order.
Due to strict regulations regarding the transportation of portable chargers, we can only ship Angel Power Bank to the following countries and regions. 

Australia, Austria, Bahrain, Belgium, Bulgaria, Canada, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Korea (Republic of), Kuwait, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Macao, Malaysia, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, Romania, Russian Federation, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States. 

Please note that we cannot send portable charger to remote islands, and this country list may be modified at a later date.

story:
Unity is proud to bring you Pocket, a multi-functional accessory that fulfills your Apple Watch's every need whether you are at home, in the office or on-the-go.

If you are getting only one accessory for the Apple Watch,  Pocket is the only one you need.




With these great features, the Pocket is equally suitable for your use at home, at the office or on the go! 

Forgot to charge your Apple Watch at night? Take the Pocket along with you! Just place your Apple Watch inside the Pocket, cover the lid, press the power button and your Apple Watch is charging while being well-protected.


Or use the Pocket as a dock for simultaneously charging your Apple Watch, your iPhone and your Pocket. With its premium aluminum casing, the Pocket is beautiful to look at and will add a touch of class to your tabletop at home or in the office.


Let's Talk About Pocket's Awesome Features

Cable Management - Hide your cables forever!


It starts with neatly organizing your Apple Watch cable by winding it around the interior chamber. Snap on the external cover and hide your cables forever! 

Protective Case For Your Apple Watch 

At its core, the Pocket is a sleek case that protects your Apple Watch while it is charging on-the-go. The inner wall is made of a silicon barrier that holds your Apple Watch in place while providing shock absorption. The external wall is made of polycarbonate to form an additional layer of protection.


Dock Your Apple Watch And Adjust The Viewing Angle To Your Liking!

The Pocket’s silicon swivel holds Apple Watch securely in place meaning you don’t have to worry about the magnetic charging cable disconnecting while on the go, ensuring a charge at all times.

With the swivel, you can adjust your Apple Watch to any viewing angle of your preference.


Simultaneous Charging 

One charging point is all you need to charge 3 devices - your Apple Watch, your iPhone and the Pocket's battery.


Power On The Move 

Here’s the important part, the Pocket also comes with a portable battery (attached to the bottom) that provides up to ten full charges for the Apple Watch.

Can't use your Apple Watch cause your iPhone is dead? Don't worry, we have you covered there too. With Pocket you can charge your iPhone too! Our 4200mAh power bank packs enough power to fully charge both your iPhone and Apple Watch once. 


When charging separately, you can power Apple Watch up to eight times or add 150 percent extra power for your iPhone, meaning you’ll never have to worry about your favorite gadgets running out of battery on trips.

And, here’s the best part. The Pocket’s power bank is detachable. Now, that’s magic.

Out for a quick errand and just need to charge your iPhone? Just detach the Pocket's power bank and bring it along. It's a snap.


With its dual USB output, the Pocket's detachable power bank can charge up to two devices, making simultaneous charging of your iPhone and iPad possible.


Pocket Supports Nightstand mode

Pocket can do many things and yes, supporting Nightstand mode for Apple Watch is one of them!


Retailers & Distributors

We have recently received some enquiries from retailers and distributors and we are more than happy to do a product demonstration over Skype for retailers or distributors who are interested to purchase the product. Please contact us if you are interested in a product demonstration.


Available In Two Beautiful Finishes!

Pocket is available in two beautiful finishes, you have seen Black Jaguar, now meet Rose Gold.


Technical Specifications 

  • Built-in environmental-friendly high quality 4200mAh rechargeable Sony lithium polymer
  • Safety features include: over charge voltage protection, over discharge voltage protection,over charge temperature protection, over current protection, circuit protection
  • Battery type: lithium polymer
  • Input: 5V-2.1A - Dual Type A USB Output: 5V - 4.1A (max)
  • Capacity: 4200mAh/22.2wh
  • Self charging time: 2-3 hrs
  • Battery life: 6000hrs
  • Product measurements: 65mm x 97mm x 102mm (2.5” x 3.8” x 4.0”)
  • Product weight: 350g
  • Material: Aluminum, polycarbonate and silicone.

We Are Unity & We Need Your Support

Unity is a start-up of experienced award-winning product designers and product engineers from Australia, Hong Kong, Singapore and Portugal.


Our vision for Unity is to cross modularity, functionality and design to create functionally beautiful products that meet the needs of consumers in a variety of scenarios.

The Unity team holds itself to high standards and pays close attention to detail from the start to finish. With the Pocket, we’ve set out to create the perfect Apple Watch companion.


With its premium design and 6-in-1 features, Pocket is the only Apple Watch Companion worth waiting for.


The next batch of Pocket is expected to ship in Sept 2016 for pre-orders.


Meet The Team

story:
This is a one time limited deal. Meaning that this is the only time you can get SlimStand. And we are offering only a limited amount of perks to raise the money we need.


How can I get SlimStand for free?

- You get 1 free SlimStand for every friend you refer. First you must get SlimStand so we have your e-mail and shipping address. Then for every person you refer you'll get 1 free SlimStand shipped with the ones you purchased. Simply tell your friends to add the line "I was referred by (insert your e-mail address)". 

-Don't forget to first get a perk or we won't be able to send you the free SlimStands.

International shipping is included in the price of every perk!

Hello Indiegogo

My name is Hristo, and I present you SlimStand. An easy to use and carry smartphone/tablet stand. Now your smartphones and tablets can stand on a surface without falling, so you can watch videos, use apps,take pictures,shoot video, etc with ease.
The idea for SlimStand came from my brother one day when we wanted to watch a YouTube video but couldn't get the Iphone to stand. So SLIM was born.

The money we're raising is for a kids orphanage(ages 3-8) in our town. As you know Christmas is coming and we wanted to raise money to get the kids some new clothes, food and toys for Christmas(considering the bad conditions they live in all year round). That's why this is a limited time campaign. 
And that's why the kids need you! Help these abandoned children have a nice Christmas. The one every kid should have - filled with happiness and hope. 
All the money raised (besides for manufacturing and shipping) will go to the kids at the orphanage! And that's why this is limited only till the campaign expires. We only intend to raise money for the kids for Christmas.

Here is how Slim looks and works. (scroll down for information about SLIM, why we need the money, why your should help and the FAQ):



For more check out the Gallery at the top.

Slim's available in a variety of colours. Simply specify what colour you want when you choose a perk. 

Since the process of manufacturing is easy we can manufacture even small amounts of SlimStands at a time. Meaning that we don't need s certain amount of purchases in order to start shipping them to you.


FAQ


When will you start shipping SLIM?

- We will start shipping at as soon as this campaign ends in November.

Does SLIM work on Iphone 5S/5C/6?

- Yes SLIM does work on Iphone 5S/5C/6 and Ipads.


Does SLIM work on Android phones and tablets?

- Yes SLIM has 2 "hooks" one for Iphone phones and one for Android. 


Do you ship internationally?

- Yes we ship to every country.


How can I contribute if I don't have a PayPal?

1. Make sure the "Don't have a PayPal account?" option is selected picture

2. Enter your credit card's data picture:

Address, email & phone number may also be requested depending on your country.

When you are done, click on "Review and Continue".

3. Click on "Pay Now" picture

4. Click on "No, Thanks" to not create a paypal account. picture


 Is there a limit on how many free SlimStands I can get?

- No there isn't a limit. You can get 1000 Free SlimStands if you refer 1000 friends. Basically you get Free SLIM for every perk a friend/coworker purchases.


How does the "Get Free SLIM" thing work again?

- It's simple. First you purchase a perk so we know your e-mail and shipping address. Then you tell your friends/coworkers about SLIM and when they purchase a perk they simply state "I got referred by (they put your e-mail address here)". And we'll know to send you a Free Slim. Then we'll send you how ever many Slim you deserved in with your original perk.


What if I refer lots of people?

- If for example you refer 50 or 100 people or even 1000 and you don't need all those SLIMs, you can e-mail us and instead of sending you all those SlimStands we can send you something else of equal value. This is especially if you have a blog or youtube channel and you refer lots of friends.

What if I miss the time or the perk I want is Sold Out? Will there be more?
- No. Sorry. It's a limited time offer so perks that sell out are gone. We may release a new perk at a higher price if there is lots of demand but we cannot promise. For now it's only the perks you see and the quantity we've listed.

Does Slim make me look cool?

- For what it's worth we think it'll make you look very cool and be envied by all your friends when they see you using Slim. The only problem you'll have is everybody trying to steal your Slim when you're not looking. So be warned!


Can Slim fight crime and save people?

- This might be a bit of a stretch and I think we're getting off topic. Though it'd be cool to imagine it.


Are there other ways I can help? 

- Yes! You can share this campaign with your friends/coworkers and even get free SlimStands. You can share it on facebook/twitter/youtube/etc. 




Don't forget to say hi in the comments. Also feel free to ask any questions you have. I promise to answer and keep you up-to date.

Lets see if we can join together to help the kids for Christmas! 

If you have any kind of questions you can personally write me an e-mail at my personal gmail: ico132@gmail.com

Slim's available in a variety of colours. Simply specify what colour you want when you choose a perk. 

Since the process of manufacturing is easy we can manufacture even small amounts of SlimStands at a time. Meaning that we don't need s certain amount of purchases in order to start shipping them to you.



FAQ

When will you start shipping SLIM?
- We will start shipping at as soon as this campaign ends in November.


Does SLIM work on Iphone 5S/5C/6?
 - Yes SLIM does work on Iphone 5S/5C/6 and Ipads.

Does SLIM work on Android phones and tablets?
- Yes SLIM has 2 "hooks" one for Iphone phones and one for Android. 

Do you ship internationally?
- Yes we ship to every country.

How can I contribute if I don't have a PayPal?

1. Make sure the "Don't have a PayPal account?" option is selected picture
2. Enter your credit card's data picture:

Address, email & phone number may also be requested depending on your country.
When you are done, click on "Review and Continue".
3. Click on "Pay Now" picture
4. Click on "No, Thanks" to not create a paypal account. picture
 Is there a limit on how many free SlimStands I can get?- No there isn't a limit. You can get 1000 Free SlimStands if you refer 1000 friends. Basically you get Free SLIM for every perk a friend/coworker purchases.

How does the "Get Free SLIM" thing work again?
- It's simple. First you purchase a perk so we know your e-mail and shipping address. Then you tell your friends/coworkers about SLIM and when they purchase a perk they simply state "I got referred by (they put your e-mail address here)". And we'll know to send you a Free Slim. Then we'll send you how ever many Slim you deserved in with your original perk.

What if I refer lots of people?
- If for example you refer 50 or 100 people or even 1000 and you don't need all those SLIMs, you can e-mail us and instead of sending you all those SlimStands we can send you something else of equal value. This is especially if you have a blog or youtube channel and you refer lots of friends.


What if I miss the time or the perk I want is Sold Out? Will there be more?

- No. Sorry. It's a limited time offer so perks that sell out are gone. We may release a new perk at a higher price if there is lots of demand but we cannot promise. For now it's only the perks you see and the quantity we've listed.


Does Slim make me look cool?

- For what it's worth we think it'll make you look very cool and be envied by all your friends when they see you using Slim. The only problem you'll have is everybody trying to steal your Slim when you're not looking. So be warned!

Can Slim fight crime and save people?
- This might be a bit of a stretch and I think we're getting off topic. Though it'd be cool to imagine it.

Are there other ways I can help? 
- Yes! You can share this campaign with your friends/coworkers and even get free SlimStands. You can share it on facebook/twitter/youtube/etc. 



Don't forget to say hi in the comments. Also feel free to ask any questions you have. I promise to answer and keep you up-to date.
Lets see if we can join together to help the kids for Christmas! 
If you have any kind of questions you can personally write me an e-mail at my personal gmail: ico132@gmail.com

story:
MeOrb is the world's first self-thinking and most advanced social networking platform.

MeOrb is being developed by a team of enthusiastic and creative students. MeOrb is a platform which is on a mission to create a revolution in Social Networking.

MeOrb is completely a graphically oriented Social Networking platform which definitely mesmerizes everyone on their first look.

It is an upgraded Social Networking site which comes in with a great package. The best of its features include:  

  • Self-thinking. It is so called self-thinking because the complete user interface changes along with the user's surroundings. (*You will best know when you experience it. We promise that you will definitely be amused when you use it*)
  • Anchor is a feature in MeOrb, which is a photo-sharing and work-sharing page where any user, photographer, artist, designer or animator can post their work and create their own portfolios. Any person can share their work which includes pictures and videos.                                                                                                       Every year, our team selects 100 best works and release them in form of a global magazine which gives a greater exposure to all the talents.
  • KreAtive is an another feature in MeOrb. It is a page where students can post their ideas or projects in any field.                                                                   Depending upon the brilliance and excellence of the idea or project, MeOrb provides them with resources and a place to work in our Tech Labs.
  • Voice is an another feature in MeOrb where users can express their own views and opinions on the needs and the functioning of the government of their respective countries.                                                                                                   Users can post their views and opinions on the problems faced in their countries. The best remedies will be published in form of a global magazines and will be sent to the governmental body of their respective countries.
  • Users can enjoy watching videos and listen to any music. We have added a technology where a user can message and simultaneously watch any video without any glitch or pausing the video.
  •  We have introduced a technology where user's voice can directly be converted into text without user typing the message.
  • MeOrb provides updates on Education,Technology,Sports,Celebrities and automobiles. Users can follow any of their own interests.
  • MeOrb has an experienced review team which gives reviews on all technological stuff. (* electronic gadgets)
  • User is provided with a greater security and privacy settings(* which will be revealed at the time of release).
  • M-Band is ultra-modern technology being developed by MeOrb. This is a wearable wrist band which updates user with messages and profile updates. This device can easily be synced with any mobile phone. User can reply and receive messages using the band. We have added a technology where user's voice can directly be converted into a message without any typing.
Why Do We Need 50k:

  • Maintaining MeOrb requires huge number of servers.95% of the amount funded goes in maintaining servers.
  • For Search Engine Optimization(SEO).
  • For Data base building.
  • For Graphical user interface(GUI).

    We have got a whole exciting range of perks. All perks offered are super awesome and we have included perks where you can get a chance to work in MeOrb. 

    And there are perks which gives you a chance to act in our promotional videos. 

    We have given a chance to become the brand ambassador of MeOrb. 

    The best of our perks is to become a board member of MeOrb.

    Our team has successfully finished with the beta version of the website and are conducting various tests and experiments to overcome all the unnecessary errors.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    So people please share this campaign among your friends and family and thank you for your support.

    Contact us at: meorbofficial@gmail.com 

    http://www.meorb.com

    follow us on twitter : https://twitter.com/meorb

    follow us on Google+ : https://www.google.com/+meorb

story:
Extraordinary and Revolutionary 3 in 1 E-Writer Tablet, Power Bank and Wireless Charger.  Stay powered and organized! Say goodbye to paper and phone power shortages.

 

 

 

 

Gadget review:

“I love gadgets that are several devices in one. It helps to lighten our load when we travel. It’s always best to carry a few devices rather than an entire backpack full.”

The Verge:

“An ODD combination. But people like taking notes on the go, and they need to keep their devices charged.”

TrendHunter:

"Boasting a small, smartphone-sized aesthetic,  the Lepow 'Memomate' is a powerful and highly efficient piece of technology for users that will enable them to take notes or sketch to their heart's content whenever the mood strikes."

Steemit:

"Powerbank with its own memo screen"

Bouncy:

"ビジネスや勉強に活用してみては？"( Why not use it for business and study)

 

 

Memomate is professionally developed and designed by writing enthusiasts and paper and pen experts. We managed to make writing on the screen feel the same as writing directly on paper. With the aid of the stylus pen, you can write fluidly on the LCD writing screen and highlight texts easily. You can write smoothly without lagging or disruption. Also, the LCD writing screen won’t make your eyes feel tired.

Besides, it is suitable for taking note and making to-do list. Talking on the phone, you can take quick notes of important information with Memomate e-writer.

 

Memomate gives you the power to bring your writing ideas to life with a smart digital pen that has accurate pressure sensing. It is hassle free, offers the same ease of movement as writing on paper, and requires no charging. It is equally slick like the tablet, thereby giving you the premium digital feel. 

Memomate is ideally equipped with a DEL button. The great feature that helps you delete anything or everything so you can endlessly use the tablet without obstruction.

 

However, without touching on the DEL button, you don’t have to worry about your records being deleted as everything will still be intact!

 

As a trendy e-writer, you do not need to charge or change batteries. There is no other e-writer with such a feature! The device is designed for writing for lengthy periods and taking notes during meetings. Even though many people prefer the e-writer to a keyboard, existing digital notepad products need to be charged or their batteries have to be replaced. The good news is you can continually use Memomate without having to charge at all - a great feature you wouldn't want to miss!

With Memomate Digital E-writer, you can scan your work with your phone or take a picture and upload it to Cloud, Evernote, OneNote, Dropbox, and more. Your meeting notes, masterpieces, and documents will now be manageable and shareable.You are fully secured!

Features two input ports and two output ports. Allow two devices to be charged simultaneously. It is capable of charging an iPhone 8 four times. You couldn't desire a better e-writer with a power source!

A protection case is included in the package box to prevent scratches and keep the device neat. It has a smooth texture and is easy to clean. Spots a wireless charging technology for Qi phones and devices. It's a perfect wireless charging pad on your desk because it can charge your devices and recharge itself simultaneously.    

We perfectly understand that not everyone has a Qi phone, so we have two options for you. A case with a wireless charging function and a normal case. We care about your preferences!

The hardware parts of Memomate E-Writer are constructed with superior quality materials to ensure durability, longevity, and safe use of the device.

 

 

 

 

Dear editors and supporters, feel free to share our Memomate story with your audience. Here is the press kit folder:https://goo.gl/tMGBd2

 

 

Lepow International LLC. is a leading electronic manufacturer established in 2011 in Hongkong, China, and started its branch in the United States in 2013. Its crowdfunding campaign of HiSmart-a smart backpack has achieved great success in 2015. Lepow is dedicated to delivering high-end smart mobile accessories and top-notch user-experience to worldwide customers. Lepow’s portable charger has won the Red Dot Design Concept Award and the CES Innovation Awards HONOREE. Comprised of a team of experts, Lepow will continue to provide better products and customer services to you in the future, so don’t hesitate to contact us for any inquiry or feedback!

A.  Do you offer refunds and warranty?

Ans: Yes, absolutely! You can get a full refund within the first 8 days after you purchase campaign perks. Please go to your Indiegogo contribution tag for the refund. Besides, we offer a three-month manufacturer warranty. In other words, within that period, a full refund is guaranteed for any manufacture malfunction (man-made damage not covered). So, you have nothing to lose!

 

B.  Does Memomate save my records？

Ans: Our team of developers has discussed adding memory to the product. But considering the volume and size of the device, incorporating memory function would inevitably enlarge the device size, increase battery consumption, and increase production costs. Apparently, the core value of Memomate is being simple, functional, and affordable. The easiest and most effective way to save your work is to take a picture or use a scan app.

 

C. When Memomate portable charger has no power, can I still use it as an e-writer?

Ans: Definitely; Memomate does not consume power except when it deletes a file, which only consumes a little power.


D. How can I charge my phone with Memomate?

Memomate supports both plug-in and wireless charging for up to 2 devices at the same time. This means that you can either charge 1 device with plug-in and the other through wireless, or both devices through plug-in charging. The wireless charging function is supported through our wireless charging case. With the wireless charging case, you simply have to place your phone on top of the case and it will be charged.


E. When is it shipped after being ordered?

Ans: Shipment starts from October 2018.

 

F. What is the size of the cases?

The protective case is of 8.1*4.2 inches. 

The wireless charging case is of 9.8*4.8 inches. 

 

G.  Can I use other pens to replace the Memomate pen?

Ans: We highly recommend you the Memomate smartpen as it is designed to protect the LCD writing screen. However, other pointy objects would also work for Memomate.

story:
Orico is the best revolutionary power bank, having a fast charging speed and being compatible with seven protocols. Charge all your devices - iPhone, iPad, laptop, watch, iPod - with the world’s most powerful battery. Orico offers two capacities: 1,0000mAh and 2,0000mAh, and both have a slim body to keep your devices fully charged. Super-fast restorage technology lets Orico get fully recharged super quickly. Orico is the best solution for all your charging needs.

 

Supports seven protocols. Fast charging dream for all devices.

Support seven protocols: Intelligent Device Detection. Works with Apple, Samsung, Kindle and others. The seven protocols can deliver fast charging for QC 2.0 3.0 / BC 1.2 / Apple devices/ Samsung AFC/ MTK PE 2.0 1.1.

18 W fast charging, 50% charge in 30 minutes

Orico could be the world best fast charging devices here. Using fast charge technology, Orico perfectly delives up to 18 watts of power to all your iPhone, iPad and Macbook etc. It’s a convenient, safe, and reliable way to charge and power all your electrical devices 2-4 times faster than the standard power bank.

Unimaginable faster charging for both IOS and Androids 

By utilizing quick charging cable which is compatible with iOS devices, Orico boosts up your battery from 0 to 50% in 30 minutes. Charging your iOS devices at un-thrilled speed by providing 2X the performance of your outlet charger.

iPhone Faster Charging Test Video. Boosts up your battery from 0% to 50% in 30 minutes. 

Orico is built with the latest Qualcomm Quick Charging (QC 3.0) technology allowing it to charge your Android device 4X faster than a conventional charger. It charges your Android phone’s battery up to 80% in 30 minutes. QC 3.0 employs an intelligent algorithm to allow your portable device to determine what power level to request at any time to enable optimum power transfer.

Android Faster Charging Test Video.

 

Colossal capacity comes with slim body

Orico has a colossal capacity of  20000mAh with a slim body, allowing you to charge iPhoneX up to 5 times, iPhone 8 up to 7 times, iPad mini 1.5 times while it is getting fully recharged.

Many power banks do not come with a slim body. Orico is making charging possible from anywhere, with its mini body that fits in your backpack.

Full of power. Seven days of usage per charge

Are you still experiencing an average of 1 day of usage per charge, are you still get troubling that your power bank is always out of power when you need it?  Now let Orico bring you seven days of usage per charge with full of power.

 

Only 2 hours full restorage

Orico is built-in the external battery charger with USB-C/ Type-C and Micro USB ports. Use them to quickly recharge the external battery at 18W quick self-charging speed(5V3A input), and the whole recharge process takes only 2 hours. Or even the Type-C port could let you charge your Apple Macbook being as an output port. 

Offered to be the best valuable power bank, Orico provides you the most power functions at the most affordable price comparing with other charging devices. It was Orico that created the high-quality charging style. Now, Let’s open to a new revolutionary charging world and meet Orico here.

 

Dual USB-A outputs and one Type C output installed in Orico can charge phones, pads, MacBooks or other devices simultaneously (Laptops, Nintendo Switch, GoPro's, USB Lights, Action Cameras, Portable Speakers, Tablets & more). Power up all your devices by one Orico.

Multiple electronic devices are needed in our life, such as iPhone, Watch, iPad, AirPods, laptop. With Orico, you never need to any different chargers, there are three outputs including 2 USB-A and Type-C installed in the Orico. Whether you are the Apple or Android lover, welcome Orico; it’s designed to power up all your devices in one convenient place.

 

 

 

 

 

Orico, as an innovative, national high-tech company that has been studying USB data transfer and USB charging technology for many years, researches and develops innovative products around USB and Type-C technologies. Orico also strives to develop more practical and high-performance products for individuals, families, and businesses with our substantial research and development capabilities, strict production attitude and rich R & D experience. We are committed to building up a reliable, convenient and innovative image well known to most users, and our products are well sold all over the world.

1. What type of smartphones that Orico is compatible with? 

Orico is compatible with any type of smartphones including iPhone X, iPhone 8 , other older models like the 6 and 7, Samsung Note, Galaxy S6/S7, Edge, and LG G5/6 etc. 

2. What are the safety features of the Orico?

Orico is built-in high quality and safe Li-polymer battery. There are multiple security protections, achieving nine layers of protection, overcharge, over voltage, over current, electromagnetic field, short circuit, overheating, overpower, recovery and over discharge protection.

3. Does Orico support QC 3.0?

Yes, Orico supports QC 3.0

4. When will you be shipping Orico?

We will be shipping out our perks in May.

5. How many outputs and inputs does Orico have and what are they?

There are three outputs and two inputs installed with Orico.

6. Does it have Pass-Through Charging? Can I charge this power bank while charging a phone at the same time?

No, you can not. Orico is not equipped to handle Pass-Through Charging.

7. Can Orico charge my Macbook?

Yes, the Orico can charge your Macbook by Type-C at 18W speed. 

8. What is the refund policy for Orico? 

You can initiate 100% refunds within the first 8 days of backing an Indiegogo campaign.

9. What is the return and exchange policy for Orico? 

Please note all sales are final.Contributing to a campaign and claiming a perk on Indiegogo is not the same as buying a product online. 

10.How to quickly charge the Orico?

As long as using 9v/2A charger, you can achieve rapidly storage your Orico at the speed of 18w.

11. Why Orico could achieve fast charging for iPhone X and iPhone 8?

https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT208137

Apple supports safe 18W fast charging by Orico's USB-A port. Use fast charging cable (9V2A) to charge iPhone up to 50 % battery in 30 minutes. Please see the test video above. 

12. How can we contact you by email for customer service? 

Please feel free to contact us through email when you have any questions concerning Orico: oricoteamus@gmail.com.
