Using fast charge technology, Orico perfectly delives up to 18 watts of power to all your iPhone, iPad and Macbook etc. It’s a convenient, safe, and reliable way to charge and power all your electrical devices 2-4 times faster than the standard power bank.Unimaginable faster charging for both IOS and Androids By utilizing quick charging cable which is compatible with iOS devices, Orico boosts up your battery from 0 to 50% in 30 minutes. Charging your iOS devices at un-thrilled speed by providing 2X the performance of your outlet charger.

iPhone Faster Charging Test Video. Boosts up your battery from 0% to 50% in 30 minutes. 
Orico is built with the latest Qualcomm Quick Charging (QC 3.0) technology allowing it to charge your Android device 4X faster than a conventional charger. It charges your Android phone’s battery up to 80% in 30 minutes. QC 3.0 employs an intelligent algorithm to allow your portable device to determine what power level to request at any time to enable optimum power transfer.

Android Faster Charging Test Video.
 Colossal capacity comes with slim bodyOrico has a colossal capacity of  20000mAh with a slim body, allowing you to charge iPhoneX up to 5 times, iPhone 8 up to 7 times, iPad mini 1.5 times while it is getting fully recharged.Many power banks do not come with a slim body. Orico is making charging possible from anywhere, with its mini body that fits in your backpack.Full of power. Seven days of usage per charge Are you still experiencing an average of 1 day of usage per charge, are you still get troubling that your power bank is always out of power when you need it?  Now let Orico bring you seven days of usage per charge with full of power. Only 2 hours full restorageOrico is built-in the external battery charger with USB-C/ Type-C and Micro USB ports. Use them to quickly recharge the external battery at 18W quick self-charging speed(5V3A input), and the whole recharge process takes only 2 hours. Or even the Type-C port could let you charge your Apple Macbook being as an output port. Offered to be the best valuable power bank, Orico provides you the most power functions at the most affordable price comparing with other charging devices. It was Orico that created the high-quality charging style. Now, Let’s open to a new revolutionary charging world and meet Orico here. Dual USB-A outputs and one Type C output installed in Orico can charge phones, pads, MacBooks or other devices simultaneously (Laptops, Nintendo Switch, GoPro's, USB Lights, Action Cameras, Portable Speakers, Tablets & more). Power up all your devices by one Orico.Multiple electronic devices are needed in our life, such as iPhone, Watch, iPad, AirPods, laptop. With Orico, you never need to any different chargers, there are three outputs including 2 USB-A and Type-C installed in the Orico. Whether you are the Apple or Android lover, welcome Orico; it’s designed to power up all your devices in one convenient place.     Orico, as an innovative, national high-tech company that has been studying USB data transfer and USB charging technology for many years, researches and develops innovative products around USB and Type-C technologies. Orico also strives to develop more practical and high-performance products for individuals, families, and businesses with our substantial research and development capabilities, strict production attitude and rich R & D experience. We are committed to building up a reliable, convenient and innovative image well known to most users, and our products are well sold all over the world.1. What type of smartphones that Orico is compatible with? Orico is compatible with any type of smartphones including iPhone X, iPhone 8 , other older models like the 6 and 7, Samsung Note, Galaxy S6/S7, Edge, and LG G5/6 etc. 2. What are the safety features of the Orico?Orico is built-in high quality and safe Li-polymer battery. There are multiple security protections, achieving nine layers of protection, overcharge, over voltage, over current, electromagnetic field, short circuit, overheating, overpower, recovery and over discharge protection.3. Does Orico support QC 3.0?Yes, Orico supports QC 3.04. When will you be shipping Orico?We will be shipping out our perks in May.5. How many outputs and inputs does Orico have and what are they?There are three outputs and two inputs installed with Orico.6. Does it have Pass-Through Charging? Can I charge this power bank while charging a phone at the same time?No, you can not. Orico is not equipped to handle Pass-Through Charging.7. Can Orico charge my Macbook?Yes, the Orico can charge your Macbook by Type-C at 18W speed. 8. What is the refund policy for Orico? You can initiate 100% refunds within the first 8 days of backing an Indiegogo campaign.9. What is the return and exchange policy for Orico? Please note all sales are final.Contributing to a campaign and claiming a perk on Indiegogo is not the same as buying a product online. 10.How to quickly charge the Orico?As long as using 9v/2A charger, you can achieve rapidly storage your Orico at the speed of 18w.11. Why Orico could achieve fast charging for iPhone X and iPhone 8?https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT208137Apple supports safe 18W fast charging by Orico's USB-A port. Use fast charging cable (9V2A) to charge iPhone up to 50 % battery in 30 minutes. Please see the test video above. 12. How can we contact you by email for customer service? Please feel free to contact us through email when you have any questions concerning Orico: oricoteamus@gmail.com.

story:
Featured in :

 

   

WORLD’s FIRST SMART CHARGING MAGNETIC CABLE

Mobile phones play a crucial role in our everyday lives as we heavily rely on them to get past our daily activities. They constantly run out of charge and we are forced to charge them at least twice a day - while travelling, at work, from charging kiosks. In such a scenario it is important for us to have a hassle-free charging experience. MuConnect 2.0 is a product designed for this purpose.

 

MuConnect 2.0 is a smart gadget and a revamped version of its former self, a beautifully designed magnetic charging cable for a faster, safer and convenient mobile charging experience. It supports all Android (micro USB and Type C) and iOS devices.

No more slow charging speeds. No frayed cables. No broken charging sockets.

HOW TO USE MUCONNECT 2.0

Transforming the way you charge your mobile

SMART CHARGING

Do you experience slow charging speeds while charging from laptops (while at work), public charging kiosks (while traveling) or from third-party adapters or USB Hubs?

In such cases, you can use this cable to charge your device 2X Faster!

Our proprietary MuPower technology built with smart ICs, enables MuConnect 2.0 to communicate with the attached devices, exchange information and provide the maximum available and allowed charging current when charging from laptops/charging kiosks/public USB hubs.

Fast charging currents achieved through MuPower technology in our MuConnect 2.0 cables.

SAFE CHARGING

When charging the device from public charging ports or others laptops, there is a chance of unauthorized access to your personal data, photos, important information and a lot more.

This video shows how hackers can put your device at risk when charging via public charging ports.

MuConnect’s fast charging mode protects your device from data theft and malware installations, as it disables data sync. You can now safely charge your devices anywhere when you are on the go.

MAGNETIC CONNECTION

With MuConnect, connect your charger magnetically to your device with ease. No pointless fiddling.

Easy plug and easy detach helps to simply connect your device to the charger.

It also reduces stress on your cables and mobile charging sockets to a great extent, thus protecting them.

When the user accidentally steps on the cable it disconnects easily from the phone, thus preventing broken phone screens due to impact by fall.

SINGLE CABLE FOR ALL ANDROID AND IOS DEVICES

MuConnect 2.0 cable is cross compatible across all Android and iOS devices with micro USB, Lightning and Type C ports.

 

No need to carry your multiple cables everywhere!

 

The MuConnect 2.0 set consists of a Cable and a Pin.

Using MuConnect 2.0 consists of the following steps -

1. Insert the respective micro USB/iOS/type-C Pin inside the phone

2. Bring the cable near the phone. It aligns, attaches itself to the device and charges away!

MuConnect 2.0 allows you to disable data synchronization and enable 2X faster charging from laptops/charging kiosks/third party adapters/public USB Hubs - all with the simple slide of a button.

MuConnect is for everyone who uses a mobile device - phones, tablets, iPads alike - whether you are an iOS or an Android user

Converts a Micro-USB into a reversible connector

 

Makes connecting devices a breeze

 

Smarter and Fast charging

 Strongest Neodymium magnet let the cable stay connected to the device all the time - even while using your phones.

 Cross compatible across multiple devices. 

While the 'Cable' is universal for all micro USB/iOS/type-C devices, we have separate 'Pins' for each of these phone types.

 

LED Charging Indicator

 

 At a glance

 How MuConnect is different

 

 

N52 Grade Neodymium Magnets to provide superior magnetic strength

18K Gold Plated Contacts for better conductivity

Apple Grade Cable Material - TPE Cable Jacket, PC+PBT Plastic Cover

Shielded cables suppress electrical noise and provide ESD protection.

Electrical Specs

  • Compatible with Quick Charge adapters
  • Current rating of 2.4 Ampere
  • Compatible with BC1.0, 1.1, 1.2, YD/T-1591 spec, Samsung, Apple iPhone and iPad Fast charging standards.

Dimensions :

 

MuConnect 2.0 can be used for any devices with a micro USB or a lightning port or a USB-C

.

We are currently in the final stages of prototyping and finalizing our tooling. We are working closely with our manufacturing partners to ensure the best of quality in terms of materials, finish and performance.

Our beautiful Type C pins have just arrived from our factory.

There are many magnetic cables available in the market but MuConnect 2.0 is unique in the fact that it is “smart”.

It is the world’s first fast-charging magnetic cable for mobile devices. It has the capability to detect the type of device it is connected to (Samsung/ iPhone/ iPad etc) and adjusts the charging current accordingly to give maximum current possible to the device.

This feature allows for 2X faster charging from laptops/kiosks/USB hubs when the device is switched to “Fast Charging Mode” with the simple slide of a button. This mode also allows for Data Protection from unauthorized access or malware installations when connected to public kiosks/USB Hubs.

MuConnect 2.0 cables have a very high magnetic strength and are cross-compatible across micro USB, Lightning and Type-C devices.

 

  

We have filed 2 Patents - one Utility Patent (Pat Appl No: 15/485,859) and one Design Patent (Pat Appl No: 29/560,181) with the USPTO to protect our idea and technology.

How we will use your funds :

MuConnect 1.0 was a magnetic fast charging 'connector' launched through Indiegogo in Feb, 2016. We had an amazing response with over 5700 backers from 102 countries and sold over 17000 products worldwide. The support and warmth we received from the community in making this project a success was overwhelming. Unlike multiple crowdfunding campaigns which had failed to ship the products, we had delivered on our campaign promise and delivered the product to everyone.

Check out our previous campaign here.

We thank all our backers who had given us good feedback which we transformed into MuConnect 2.0.

To show our gratitude to our backers of MuConnect 1.0, we are providing a free MuConnect 2.0 product to them, which they can avail by emailing us at muconnect@gmail.com

We want to bring MuConnect 2.0 to you so that it can make your life a bit more comfortable. But as a new startup, we need your help to spread the word about our product to everyone and to enable us to achieve our dream of placing our product in as many hands as possible.

We are currently working with our partners, consolidating production and assembly plans and coordinating international logistics. However, we would still like to inform you of certain risks and challenges.

International Logistics Risk - The speed of the shipping may vary based on country and delivery location.

From our previous campaign experience, we have observed that, since MuConnect 2.0 is a magnetic cable it will take a couple of days for the users to adapt to this new way of charging.

We charge a  nominal amount of 6$ for shipping the product. The mode of shipping is through postal service, which takes about 3-4 weeks to be delivered.

Once the campaign ends a survey will be sent to all the backers to fill in their shipping information as required by our fulfillment partner. You will also be able to choose the choice of your cable and pins for your perk.

You can also:

 

Like us on                  Facebook      

Follow us on            Twitter         

Follow us on            Instagram    

Subscribe to us       Subscribe  

 

FAQs :

Does MuConnect 2.0 support data transfer?

Yes. Make sure that the switch is in data sync mode and you are ready to go!

Does MuConnect 2.0 support data transfer during fast charging?

No. You need to switch it to data sync mode for data transfer.

What is fast charging in MuConnect 2.0?

Our proprietary MuPower technology enables MuConnect 2.0 to communicate with the attached devices, exchange information and provide the maximum available and allowed charging current when charging from laptops/charging kiosks/public USB hubs.

How to choose the type of product?We will send you a survey once the campaign is over. You can select your choice then
Does fast charging work with my AC adaptor too?No. Fast charging feature works only when connected to laptops, car chargers, third-party adapters or public USB hubs.
Is MuConnect compatible with Quick Charge 3.0?

Yes.

What are the technical specifications of the product?

Maximum Current Rating - 2.4 A
Maximum Power Rating - 29 Watts
Data transfer speeds - 480 Mbps

How can I select lightning or micro USB or Type-C pins for my pledge?

We will send out a survey at the end of the campaign where you can select which one you want.

Will MuConnect 2.0 support USB C?

Yes

Is there any patent infringement with Apple?

We have done our due diligence and found out there isn't any infringement on any patent.

How is MuConnect 2.0 water resistant?

The pin which goes into the phone will be reinforced with a silicon ring, so as it covers your port all the time, water and dust can not enter.

Will the Type-C works with a laptop?

No definitely not.

How is MuConnect 2.0 smart?

Different mobile devices have different proprietary standards to enable fast charging (like BC1.0, 1.1, 1.2, YD/T-1591 spec, Samsung Fast charging standard, Apple iPhone/ iPad Fast charging standard etc). MuConnect can automatically detect which device is connected to it and sets the standard, thus signalling the device to take maximum power. That is why MuConnect is smart.

What is the refund policy?

We will accept requests for refund upto two weeks after the campaign ends . Once the period get's finished no longer accept any refund requests.

How can we trust this campaign seeing that many crowdfunding projects have failed to deliver their products?

1.As you can see in our product video and various images in the campaign page, we have already made the final lookalike working product and are doing rigorous testing on it. We also have our manufacturers in place for making this product. 2.We had already launched MuConnect 1.0 on Indiegogo last year and had also delivered the products to our previous backers. Many of our previous backers have opted for this second version and backed this campaign too. We are committed to serving our consumers better and to deliver high quality product as promised.

story:
Wireless power transfer is around for years, wireless energy transmitted to  electrical load from a base or transmitter. Energy is sent through waves and on other end  an inductive coupling to electrical device, which can then use that energy to charge batteries or run the device. There are some drawbacks are in this technology like power loss and distance limitations but still that's enough for the magic.

Magnetic levitation or magnetic suspension is a method by which an object is suspended in the air with no support other than invisible magnetic fields. Magnetic force is used to counteract the effects of the gravitational acceleration and any other accelerations.

The two primary issues involved in magnetic levitation are lifting forces: providing an upward force sufficient to counteract gravity, and stability: ensuring that the system does not spontaneously slide or flip into a configuration where the lift is neutralized



 By Combining the Induction Charging and Magnetic Levitation we got OvRcharge.

A Wireless Levitational Charger, that is not only suspend the device in the mid air and holds its altitude, but also charge and rotate it as well.


  OvRcharge stops charging the phone when battery is full but still levitate and rotate the device until it is removed.

 You can use it to charge your phone or just to float it.


 To achieve altitude and be able to charge wirelessly, phone requires a special case. that consists of two main parts, electricity receiver from the base and a Magnet to hold its position mid air. so we design ultra thin case to not only protects your investment but to go some levels and also powers it up all at same time. This case has a magnet that will help it to levitate & it also has induction receiver for charging without cables.

**We offer most popular model's cases but it is not possible at the moment to carry all types of cases, in this case we are offering third party attachment to work with your own case and supplied magnet (so generally speaking it works with all kind of phones or most of em).  

**Choice of Color and Phone model will be asked after the campaign ends

 **Incase of newer phone model arrival you just have to purchase the extra case from us & you are covered.


Apple

Iphone 6,6s, Iphone 6Plus, 6s Plus, Iphone 5,5S, IPhone 5C, Iphone SE

Samsung

Galaxy S7, S7 edge, Galaxy S6, S6 edge, Galaxy J7,J2, Galaxy Note 5 & will be for Note7

Sony

Xperia E5, Xperia XA, Xperia X, Xperia Z6, Xperia M5

LG

X Skin, X5, X Power, V10, Nexus 5X, G5

Huawei

Honor Note 8, Honor 8, Honor 5A, Nexus 6P

HTC 10, ONEPLUS 3

(More models will be added later)



Charging base is the thing behind all the science, it is made of wood and has two functions Magnetic levitation and wireless charging. This unit is powerful enough to levitate 600 Grams unit and charge it, 

 ***The only difference between two models beside size is the output current rate, as OvRcharge ~500mAh and OvRcharge Ultra ~700 mAh. Both Models are Fully compatible with all of our cases and/or receivers.

story:
Short Summary

Hi

My name is Craig Brett. I'm a Canadian product designer and owner of Hip Product Factory based in Singapore. 

Over the last year I have taken a long look at the workhorses of the tech accessory market - cord wraps - and come up with a design that I think takes this concept to the next level. 

TWIG is fast, protects the earbuds and never leaves the volume control sticking out at awkward angles. 

It looks pretty good too.

What We Need & What You Get

TWIG is already designed and the mechanical engineers have signed off on the prototypes. We've even come up with some great packaging. 

But now is the expensive part. Production. We need a mold for the TWIG itself as well as a subsidiary mold to meld the individual components together in a process called ultrasonic. 

We are looking for $7000 to get us over the top and start producing this innovative new product. 

We are targeting a ship date of July 15. For shipping you will have a choice of from within the US or from Singapore.


The Impact

With so many cord wraps on the market there was always a danger that were reinventing the wheel. But I think TWIG is so original and functional that it will completely transform this market. Or at least make people smile. 

So, how does TWIG work exactly?

First, we need to set it up. It's easy. Just slide the left cord into the left branch and the right into the right. TWIG then slides down to rest naturally at the V. This resting position can be adjusted by moving the little clip higher or lower.

To wrap, just slide TWIG up until the earbuds lock into place, and then wind 8 times. The volume control is perfectly aligned every time. It's quick and neat, with the buds tucked up all nice and tight.

TWIG is designed to work with Apple Earpods and Samsung's earbuds. 

This is our second product after the ION, a phone stand that supports phones up to the size of the Galaxy Note in both vertical and horizontal views. And here's the cool part - it then folds into the shape of a credit card to slip easily into your wallet. 

The ION was a great success and we see big things for TWIG as well. It's been a great project so far and we just need to get it to the next step.

Other Ways You Can Help

One of the downsides to designing on your own as I do is that you don't get the constant feedback to improve your product. I have been getting some great suggestions but would love to hear from more people. 

And of course publicity is oxygen to any new product. The more people who spread the word about TWIG, the more likely we will hit our fundraising goal and make this happen.

Thank you everyone for reading. 

Craig Brett

story:
Our Story

We are a technology start-up from South Florida who have pioneered and developed a new concept in advertising. It's called a "bouncerAd," bouncerAds are engineered for public wireless networks -- in other words, Wifi. With bouncerAds we can turn any public wireless network into an income producing asset.  To understand our company you have to understand the creative minds behind it. My name is Tony Colindres, co-founder and president, I am a consummate entrepreneur who was originally a business major. The first semester into my junior year at Florida International University's School of Business, however, I learned that the last thing I needed to be an entrepreneur was a business degree. I was inspired to start studying computer science, and as the saying goes, have not looked back since. I then met Rene Santiago, who was a senior in information technology. Rene not only understood high- and low-level programming languages, but also understood the networking aspects. At first we interned each other. Rene would intern me in business and sales and I would intern Rene in technology. The whole reason I gave up studying business was because all of the business graduates I knew could not find jobs in their field simply because of the economic downturn; because of this I was inspired to create a way to help businesses. That was when we were inspired to use our skills and resources to make bouncerAds. It took 8 months of working 100+ hours per week and it was trial and error from the very first day. At times it was overwhelming, but what started as a logistical nightmare became orchestrated chaos.

We want to help businesses all over the world optimize their margins, we also want to create an incentive for large commercial centers to offer free internet. We have made a lot of headway but we need your help. Please support our Indiegogo campaign.

Sincerely,

Co-founder, President
Tony Colindres


What are we doing? 

We're a technology start-up based out of Pembroke Pines, Florida that is monetizing public WiFi by advertising on it. Any location that has or wants to have WiFi can do business with us and become one of our hotspots. Any advertiser that wants to advertise with us can become one of our advertisers. We take the ads our advertisers provide us and place them on our hotspots. To put it simply, we advertise on WiFi.

Why are we doing this?

We are doing this for three primary reasons. We found

  1. that there are not a lot of places for people like you and I - whether indoors or outdoors, to just sit, have a cup of coffee, and enjoy free public WiFi;
  2. that a large number of businesses - restaurants, gyms, bakeries, coffee shops, retail stores, hair salons, barbershops, arcades, etc., do not offer WiFi, and those that do are not making any revenue by offering it;
  3. that there is a huge discrepancy in the advertising industry: if an advertiser wants to reach a large number of people, it has to pay a hefty price, and if it can't pay this price, then it won't reach a large number of people. The industry also has trouble engaging its audience. In other words, people don't pay attention to the ads. 

We offer a solution to all three: 

  1. The more we grow the more people are going to be able to enjoy free public WiFi - indoors or outdoors.
  2. Each one of our hotspots will receive a monthly income from us for simply allowing us to host our advertisers' ads on their WiFi.
  3. Our advertisers will be able to reach a large number of people of people by advertising at our hotspots, and only at a fraction of the price they would pay to reach that same number of people if they were to use conventional advertising. They will also be able to reach specific demographics - given we are in the process of developing software to provide them with valuable information and analytics, and provide their users quality advertising tailored to them.

How are we doing this?

We are able to do this because we've developed firmware that allows our users to access WiFi only if they have first watched an ad. This is similar to how a bouncer only allows you to get into a nightclub only if you are a certain age and pay the amount required. Oddly enough, we refer to these ads as bouncerAds.

Advertising Plans

As of the moment, since we're just beginning, we offer one plan.

The Exclusive: The advertiser pays a flat monthly rate for placing an ad on one of our hotspots. This ad will be the only ad hosted on the hotspot, and so our hotspot will be exclusive to the advertiser. For instance, a coffee shop may want to advertise at a bookstore, and with The Exclusive it will be the only advertiser with an ad at the bookstore.


In the upcoming months, however, we will be working towards enabling advertisers to place their ads on multiple hotspots, allowing them to upgrade their plans with add-ons, etc. We also believe that hotspots will want to advertise as well. A hotspot such as a bookstore may want to advertise at a local coffee shop because it may bring in new customers. We believe that most places, if not all, will be hotspots as well as advertisers, or adspots - short for advertising hotspots. Essentially, we would have a web of interconnected adspots, advertising hotspots all advertising at other adspots.



Who benefits?

The advertiser will benefit because it will not only have a larger market reach, but be able to target specific demographics by choosing to advertise at particular hotspots. The hotspot will benefit because it will not only be obtaining the hosting income from us, but an influx of new customers willing to user the free WiFi. And most importantly, you will benefit because as the customer, you'll have access to reliable internet access, free of charge, at all of your favorite places. The more we grow, the more places you will have to work, play, and socialize at any of our hotspots.

Login to Any One of Our Hotspots

And most importantly, you will benefit because as the customer, you'll have access to reliable internet access, free of charge, at all of your favorite places. story:
Pattern & image recognition module with neuromorphic learning for all your maker projects.

Robotics fans, drone pilots, hackers & data-miners - rejoice!

The BrainCard is an open source hardware platform featuring the worlds only fully functional and field-tested Neuromorphic Chip containing 1024 silicon neurons. It is able to learn and recognize patterns within any dataset generated by any source, from the physical (sensors), to the virtual (data). Offered here, for the first time, to makers in a format compatible with nearly all other popular electronics platforms — from Raspberry Pi to Arduino and Intel Edison —  we aim to help you add cognitive perception to any electronics project.

Add a brain to: Robots, toys or an old GoPro. Give them the ability to recognize and recall almost anything... You can also add a brain to any digital cameras including dash cams. Vision not your thing? The same technology can recognize patterns in data like that packet of code you're looking for in a sea of C++, a phrase in an eBook (regardless of the books length), even real time data: Build your own biosensors!  Make any appliance you like “smart”, like a coffee pot that recognizes you and starts making your coffee the way you like best. 

Simply put; make it think. 

Cannot wait for technical details?

Before we carry on, for those of you that are quick studies and/or already know everything, we thought you might like to skip straight to the specs so here you go:

 BrainCard Specifications (Hardware and API) 

For everyone else - please read on... 

Unfamiliar with Neural Networks or Neuromorphic Chips? Watch this:


(If you want some more background info, click here)

Now back to your

 project...

The BrainCard™ is a small electronics board with a NeuroMem® CM1K device plus a FPGA (Field Programmable Gate Array) chip to connect to platform buses and sensor inputs. There is even an optional image sensor featured on the BrainCard 1KIS (Image Sensor) version. It can be connected to almost any popular electronics platform including Arduino/Raspberry Pi/Intel Edison and enables users to massively boost any devices capability by creating a brain-like system architecture – hence the name.


The CM1K chip(s) on the BrainCard essentially acts as a right-brain hemisphere ready to learn, recognize and recall patterns/images/sounds/inputs from any incoming data stream. This allows the accompanying MPU device to concentrate on what it’s good at — left-brain functions such as logic, procedural computing and as a communications and I/O interface. 

The key to success is teaching BrainCard as you would a child: Teach it too conservatively and it will not generalize enough; too moderately and it could get confused. It is not like traditional programming and we have found that part of the fun in building projects with the BrainCard is in this new learning parameter.

It’s really quite simple: Show the BrainCard what it must recognize and assign the example a category. So: This face is John, that voice is Emma, this vibration is made by your cat purring and so on.

Getting started:

The BrainCard is delivered with a default configuration which can communicate with either one of the proposed controllers (Arduino, Raspberry PI or Edison) through a same communication protocol over their SPI lines.  Access to generic pattern learning and recognition functions using the CM1K chip are made through a simple API delivered for the different IDE (Arduino and Eclipse). More specific function libraries will be released shortly after and we hope to start a repository of your libraries too! 

  1. Install and connect the BrainCard to the MPU/Device of your choice. View the hardware datasheet
  2. Install the API in the IDE of your choice (Arduino, Eclipse). View the BrainCard API preliminary datasheet
  3. Now, you can program to teach the BrainCard using examples previously collected and saved to disk (waveforms, images, movies). Or you can program some GPIOs to trigger teaching (bush buttons, keyboard inputs and even voice control! As illustrated in the following video, teaching amounts to selecting examples and sending one of more signatures of this example to the neurons of the BrainCard. The neurons will decide if the example is worth learning based on what they already know. If applicable, some neurons will autonomosuly correct themselfves if they contradict the teacher and never repeat this mistake again.
  4. Recognition is the same as learning except that this time, your program monitors the response of the neurons to the incoming signatures instead of sending them learning commands. Your program can then act based on what is recognized using the wealth of GPIOs available through Arduino Shields, as well as  DeviceToDevice or DeviceToCloud communications, and more. 

 

So what can it do?

This is a great question, as even we have not fully explored the full range of the BrainCard/CM1K’s capabilities. Almost every day we are coming up with new applications for the technology, which is one of our quandaries, and is where YOU come in. It’s also why we are choosing to announce ourselves to the world via Indiegogo.

A simple list of known capabilities 

Object recognition

Using the KIS vesion or an off-the-shelf image sensor of your own and teach your BrainCard to recognize shapes, colors, objects, signs, people and animals.


Stereoscopic vision

With two image sensors attached, along with a CPU, your project can work in stereoscopic vision! The processor can triangulate distance and the CM1K can recognize what it’s looking at. Add some motors to the image sensors and it can track things too.


Audio Recognition

Attach a microphone and teach the BrainCard to recognize a noise, a voice, YOUR voice or other audio signals like a bird song or a dog.

Vibration and motion

Attach a MEMS (Micro Electrical Mechanical Systems) device and teach the BrainCard to recognize vibrations or physical motion.

Bio signals

 BrainCard can recognize data from any Bio-signal source – such as:      

Electroencephalogram (EEG), Electrocardiogram (ECG), Electromyogram (EMG), Mechanomyogram (MMG), Electrooculography (EOG), Galvanic skin response (GSR), Magnetoencephalogram (MEG).


Text and Numbers

You can run your data through the BrainCard in any form — from text to binary to DNA sequences — and teach it to recognize patterns, which will allow it to detect anomalies, identify clusters and make predictions.

There are MANY MORE applications we just haven't tried yet...

Flexibility

If you go crazy while teaching and fill all 1024 neurons on a chip, don’t panic. BrainCard provides an expansion bus to stack more CM1K chips in boards of two, thereby increasing the number of modules (subject to availability) you can teach by increments of 2048 (1x CM1K equals 1,024 neurons). This expansion can be done at any time to its maximum of 8,192  (plus the original 1024 on the BrainCard), and will not impact your teaching allowing you to experiment to your heart’s content.

Maturity

The NeuroMem CM1K technology has already found many applications in industry and has been working in the real world since 2007 – so we know everything we’re claiming above is 100% true, because most of these applications have been built somewhere.

What we need, and what you get

This Indiegogo campaign has been launched with one aim: To generate the volume and revenue we need to manufacture the maker version of the CM1K technology — the BrainCard.

By supporting this Indiegogo project you will be a part of the first chapter of a much bigger story: We aim to change the way the world computes with neural network technology. We're looking to raise at least $200k to start manufacturing in volume, which will make the BrainCard as cheap as possible. 

We're beginning with 1000 chips that we already have in inventory which were originally ordered by an industrial client. After that, we will aim to start manufacturing on a mass production line, and this will take approximately six months. So, those first 1000 purchasers will be the only ones able to experience the unique capabilities of the BrainCard until mid-2015.

The first 1000 BrainCard's will cost $199 and are what we call IWIN (I Want It Now), or $219 for a version including an image sensor (the IS version) - so 500 of each version.

If we don't reach the goal, all the money raised will be aimed at manufacturing as many BrainCards as we can, so that it can be more affordable for the masses.

This is why we're turning to the maker community — we'd like to crowdsource our research and development through YOU!

The impact 

Neural networks should be everywhere by now, in your phone, in wearable technology. The NeuroMem technology is mature and the market needs exist. This project has the ability to propel neuromorphic technology into the mainstream consciousness by showing electronics manufacturers what can be done with it.  

This is why we're turning to the maker community — we'd like to crowdsource our research and development through YOU!

Risks and challenges

The core of the NeuroMem/NeuromorThings team has been in place for 16 years and has plenty of research and industrial customers already using the CM1K chip, so this is not a typical “prototype” project.

We have a full supply chain already in place for both the board and for mounting the chips. We also have a wealth of knowledge in developing board-level and semiconductor technologies — all of which makes the risks to you a bare minimum. 

We just need your support to complete prototyping/testing and to begin volume manufacturing. The first 1000 IWIN BrainCards will have exclusive access to the technology for the three months it takes us to make the new batch of chips. 

Once we begin mass manufacturing the BrainCard, we will begin our long development roadmap on its successors and other neuromorthings. 

After the first run of IWIN devices, the rest of the time will be dedicated to mounting the chips to the boards and testing them. With enough support we can get production runs up to very large numbers per month very quickly.  

Shipping

Shipping a technology product is fraught with issues like export restrictions. We've tried to make it as simple as possible and built shipping as a perk. 
In the US, Mexico and canada? included
Rest of World? $30 Shipping & Packing 
Due to the technical nature of the BrainCard it can be liable to Export Restrictions in certain countries under United States Law. If you are unsure if you are effected - please contact us at: info@neuromorthings.com and put "Export" in the subject line and we'll do everything we can to help. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't buy a BrainCard? How about giving us a High $5? High 5'ers will all feature on the website and be written into NeuromorThings lore... it's a program for those interested in the technology and who want to help but who can't spring for their own BrainCard. 

Got no cash at all? No problem - simply SPREAD THE WORD! Tell everyone you know about us and help us that way instead, on Facebook, on Twitter - wherever. 

Every little bit helps!

Export regulations:

It might occurs, in certain rare cases that your country is under export embargo and we cannot ship because of the nature of the technology included in the BrainCard.If this exceptional situation occurs your money will be fully refunded.

If you go crazy while teaching and fill all 1024 neurons on a chip, don’t panic. BrainCard provides an expansion bus to stack more CM1K chips in boards of two, thereby increasing the number of modules (subject to availability) you can teach by increments of 2048 (1x CM1K equals 1,024 neurons). This expansion can be done at any time to its maximum of 8,192  (plus the original 1024 on the BrainCard), and will not impact your teaching allowing you to experiment to your heart’s content.






Maturity
The NeuroMem CM1K technology has already found many
applications in industry and has been working in the real world since 2007 – so
we know everything we’re claiming above is 100% true, because most of these
applications have been built somewhere.







What we need, and what you get
This Indiegogo campaign has been
launched with one aim: To generate the volume and revenue we need to
manufacture the maker version of the CM1K technology — the BrainCard.
By supporting this
Indiegogo project you will be a part of the first chapter of a much bigger
story: We aim to change the way the world computes with neural network
technology. We're looking to raise at least $200k to start manufacturing in volume, which will make the BrainCard as cheap as possible. 
We're beginning with
1000 chips that we already have in inventory which were originally ordered by an industrial client. After that, we
will aim to start manufacturing on a mass production line, and this will take
approximately six months. So, those first 1000 purchasers will be the only ones
able to experience the unique capabilities of the BrainCard until mid-2015.
The first 1000
BrainCard's will cost $199 and are what we call IWIN (I Want It Now), or $219
for a version including an image sensor (the IS version) - so 500 of each version.
If we don't reach the
goal, all the money raised will be aimed at manufacturing as many BrainCards as we can, so
that it can be more affordable for the masses.


This is
why we're turning to the maker community — we'd like to crowdsource our research
and development through YOU!The impact Neural networks should be everywhere by now, in your phone, in wearable technology. The NeuroMem technology is mature and the market needs exist. This project has the ability to propel neuromorphic technology into the mainstream consciousness by showing electronics manufacturers what can be done with it.  This is why we're turning to the maker community — we'd like to crowdsource our research and development through YOU!



Risks and challenges
The core of the NeuroMem/NeuromorThings
team has been in place for 16 years and has plenty of research and industrial
customers already using the CM1K chip, so this is not a typical “prototype”
project.
We have a full supply chain already in
place for both the board and for mounting the chips. We also have a wealth of
knowledge in developing board-level and semiconductor technologies — all of
which makes the risks to you a bare minimum. 
We just need your support to complete
prototyping/testing and to begin volume manufacturing. The first 1000 IWIN
BrainCards will have exclusive access to the technology for the three months it
takes us to make the new batch of chips. 
Once we begin mass manufacturing the BrainCard,
we will begin our long development roadmap on its successors and other
neuromorthings. 

After the first run of IWIN devices, the rest of
the time will be dedicated to mounting the chips to the boards and testing
them. With enough support we can get production runs up to very large numbers
per month very quickly.    ShippingShipping a technology product is fraught with issues like export restrictions. We've tried to make it as simple as possible and built shipping as a perk. In the US, Mexico and canada? includedRest of World? $30 Shipping & Packing Due to the technical nature of the BrainCard it can be liable to Export Restrictions in certain countries under United States Law. If you are unsure if you are effected - please contact us at: info@neuromorthings.com and put "Export" in the subject line and we'll do everything we can to help.   Other Ways You Can Help Can't buy a BrainCard? How about giving us a High $5? High 5'ers will all feature on the website and be written into NeuromorThings lore... it's a program for those interested in the technology and who want to help but who can't spring for their own BrainCard. 
Got no cash at all? No problem - simply SPREAD THE WORD! Tell everyone you know about us and help us that way instead, on Facebook, on Twitter - wherever. 
Every little bit helps!

Export regulations:
It might occurs, in certain rare cases that your country is under export embargo and we cannot ship because of the nature of the technology included in the BrainCard.If this exceptional situation occurs your money will be fully refunded.

story:
Meet RoamYo

RoamYo is our handbag hero. He is a portable phone charger and power bank who:

  • Charges iPhones, iPads and Androids. 
  • Gives you 2½ charges of an iPhone.
  • Comes with a multi-adaptor.
  • Charges your friends devices at the same time. 
  • Perfect size and weight for your pocket or bag ensuring maximum 'roamability'. 
  • A meaningful % of your purchase will go to 'Womankind Worldwide', to help transform the lives of women around the world.

                                        


But what makes him REALLY different?

He's not another boring corporate commodity.
He's part of a brand that cares about your safety and confidence to roam wherever you want, whenever you want. 
Feel free to join the conversation with us on social media:
  @RoamYo
  facebook.com/roamyo.official


Our Cause               

'In no country in the world do women enjoy the same rights or opportunities as men. Every day women and girls face discrimination, poverty and violence just because they are female. Womankind is working to change that.'

                    


The RoamYo Team whole-heartedly support the empowerment and independence of women and will be donating 20% of product sales to Womankind, as well as lending our voices to the cause. 

Womankind are also currently running their own crowd funding campaign, so please take a look if you want to help them out.


The Product

RoamYo Classic: $40／£26 / €38

A travel-friendly, stylish power bank that keeps your phone charged all day and night, so you'll never be stranded in an emergency. The built-in light also makes it easy for you to find your keys and get home safely. 


This product is in development with our supplier but please let us know if you think the Guardian is an idea you would be interested in by taking part in our quick poll.


Get to know our RoamYo

Spec.

                  


                                 


Fitted with a multi-adaptor that is compatible with a wide variety of devices and supports 'sociable charging' (charge your friends' devices at the same time!)


                                          


RoamYo's Journey to You


  


Colours

Aside from our signature 'Gold', we can offer a variety of colours depending on your personal style and preferences (although our pink option is 'Limited Edition').



DIDN’T SEE YOUR FAVOURITE COLOUR? 

Get in touch and let us know if we're being too colour blind!

We're always happy to get feedback.


Why RoamYo?

Portable phone chargers are not a new product.

But the market seems to be saturated with boring, brandless, corporate commodities and we wanted a product with a little more life and more personality. 

Something we would be happy to give as a gift for her or him that wouldn't look out of place next to us on the train, on a desk, or perching on a table at a bar. We wanted a product that could roam with us everywhere.


So, as a result, Tisa Tech was created by 6 young entrepreneurs who met during a Masters course at Cass Business School and decided to create a product that we personally would want to own ourselves.


Why We Need Your Help

We're genuinely passionate about this product but as a young start-up trying to make our mark in a very competitive market, we really do need your help to get this product off the ground.

Your contribution will give us the start-up capital required to break those big corporate entry barriers and get RoamYo to those who want or need him.


The Greater Impact

It's a very real and very global problem that people, especially young women, do not feel as confident as they should when out and about. Parents and friends often worry about the safety of their loved ones, especially at night.

       

                        


We all know that sinking feeling when you're out and suddenly in an uncomfortable situation and without a phone to call for help.

We hope the RoamYos will help give back people the confidence to roam where they please. 


About our Partner Charity: 

Since Womankind was founded 25 years ago, it has helped more than 18 million women and their families. They support women to transform their lives and their communities by working in partnership with women's rights organisations in Africa, Asia and Latin America.

Womankind aims to end violence against women and girls, ensure women have a say in the decisions that affect them and enable women to take control of their own livelihoods.

Find out how you can help empower a woman today at www.womankind.org.uk

                                   



Risks & Challenges

Shipping
Due to the nature of the campaign, we aren't able to 100% predict the duration and cost of the fulfillment process. We want to get your RoamYos to you as efficiently as possible but we hope you'll understand if any future time constraints emerge.

Other Ways You Can Help 

We know money is tight, but if you can't contribute then please consider helping us in other ways, we'd really appreciate if you would:

  • Share us on Social Media!
  • Refer us to a friend who you think would like it :)
  • Here are those symbols again...

   @RoamYo

   @RoamYo



FAQs

Q. How do I charge my phone with RoamYo?



Q. How do I charge my RoamYo when he is out of battery?



Q. What happens if RoamYo breaks or stops working?

A. We take customer service very seriously and we are currently negotiating the best warranty solutions with our suppliers for all our power banks.


Q. Where is it suitable to use RoamYo?

A. We believe you can use him anywhere. Whether you want a stylish accessory at the office or travel companion to trek across borders, he's the perfect rucksack or handbag accessory. He'd even look great all wrapped up as a gift for her, or him.


Q. What happens if you don't reach your target on Indiegogo? Can I get my money back?

A. We wish to fulfil any RoamYo orders placed by contributors, however if you have simply contributed money on indiegogo this will still go towards the costs of running our business and you have our big thanks.

story:
Support iStart new tab page for chrome(tm) and become part of the revolution of your browser experience

an awesome new tab page, turns your new tab into an Desktop for the web!

The vision behind iStart:

The most impact new tab page for chrome with revolutionary functions. Easy to use and for everybody useable! Open Source and advertising free! This new tab page will change your way to interact with your browser.

 

The financial sponsor has quit the support for iStart, iStart is an fulltime project, now i cant finance the development of  the new version of iStart anymore. Please help to building revolutionary functions for an new tab page. 

 

 

with your help we can develop the features "cloud control", "live tiles" ,  API and many more and kickstart iStart to the next level! iStart is advertising free and for everyone avaiable. 

 Watch the basic version on the chrome webstore

 HALL OF FAME AND UNLOCKED FEATURES!

Thats me: Kay Schneider, developer of iStart for chrome(tm):

 

iStart new tab page is an awesome new tab page for chrome wich saves your time as user and is fully customable!

 

Watch an preview screenshot of the new iStart:

Short facts in wich features the money will be spend:

There are some steps you can unlock by supporting this project :)

All the goals are reached in an timeline by 2 months if the funding will be a success, if we can fund only a part of the goal, i can implement some features. Every $ is needed and really important

Unlock an new feature pack!:

if we get 100$ or less (feature pack A):

* You will be able to add an image as an background for an tile & add your own icon

!

 

if we get 101$ to 500$ (feature pack B):

*  Support for open the "pages" in an new tab! 

*  Support for open pages in the "incognito" mode of chrome

 

if we get 501 to 999$ (feature pack C):

* localisation, adding translations of the app in different languages wich languages you decide with your support  :) 

* Drag & Drop will be rewritten so that it will comes much easier to drag tiles around

 

if we get 1000$ to 3000$ (feature pack D):

* An open API for all developers, its easy and free to use

* You can add other apps to iStart! And these apps can show you information, like news or something else

* Drag & Drop an picture direct to the background! No need to enter for this action the "settings" menue

 

if  we get 3001$ to 5000$ (feature pack E):

*cloud sync ( Save all your settings local & in the cloud, and sync the settings on every device you use chrome for free )

* More Animation on the iStart Desktop! So you have an real "live" feeling

 * You can watch news, tweets, facebook feed in "live tiles" direct on iStart ( tweets, facebook and one news live tile will be implemented by me ( kay schneider )

 

if we get 5001$ to 6000$ (bonus level 1):

* lastfm live tile!

* ebay auction watcher "live tile"

* facebook photo watcher "live tile"

 

With cloud control iStart is your everywhere desktop for chrome. Customize iStart on one device and with cloud magic sync it with all your devices where your run chrome! Its like magic, but it isnt. :)

 

"live tiles" are your information ants! They give you the information you like to see on your desktop. You can add the live tiles like extensions or apps in chrome. See it in the chrome webstore install it and add it to iStart!

The live tiles are the animated part of iStart. It runs with HTML5 support. The live tiles are at the moment in an alpha state and needs a lot of hours to ship it to you. 

 

Scroll down to learn more about the awesome new features.

That is iStart - new tab page for chrome in action:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

iStart is your desktop for chrome! Manage your chrome installed apps, insert own bookmarks/links. Its easy and awesome.

 

Stop wasting your time by searching for an chrome app or bookmark! Use the fast access bar:

Type some letters of your app, link/bookmark you like to visit and let iStart search them for you! Its awesome easy and fast, and way better than clicking and searching arround.

It`s like an desktop in metro style, for your chrome!

Watch the customers reviews of the beta version:

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/istart-new-tab-page-in-me/lkgdlmlmcijgnglfcophfjhafiafhkae/reviews

 

That was an short overview what iStart is and what it can be if you support this project!

Some information about me:

Im Kay Schneider , i worked as software developer on different companys. Based on software for the web. From Online Games to internet agencys wich build websites for large world wide operation companys.

In the year 2011 i was one of the top submitter on the "google developer contest - doodle your way to gdd".

After these 8 years experience i tink that it is time for something new. It is time to build an awesome software product wich is shipped mostly for free to all the people over the world. 

And after the success i had in the google contest, where i have developed a demo for html5 fetaures with javascript, i mostly programmed at my free time in javascript. And also on work i started focus on javascript.

 

 

installed Apps, Bookmarks/links, and information in realtime from everywhere - live tiles - cloud control - 

 


Now i have developed "iStart" in an based Version wich gives the users an good userexperience. I released the Software at the end of january in 2013 after a week endless developing. After that, i released a few features so that it becomes more comfortable for the users. Im raising money to developing the features "live tiles", API, cloud control.

 

You can still see the base version in the chrome webstore

 

It was a success. Without all features. There are over 3000  active users. Awesome. And now I need the support of the users for developing awesome features for you! Please help and keep this project alive!

 


But to finished the work i need more time than i have. To ship iStart with all the features there is still need two months of hard work. 

 

What we need and what you get?

I need still 15k to developing iStart ready with all features and spread it to the world. The money will be used that i, Kay Schneider, can spend a fulltime development on iStart without having troubles with the billings like yet.

This helps me, to stay focused on the users needs and the new core features for iStart, "live tiles" and the API. And i need a little bit time to travel to some developer meetings to speak about iStart and the API ( that needs time and money I have time, but no money )

The money will be completly spend covering expenses during that time, and to spend a little bit money to build extra graphics for iStart , as well as rewards for you, our supporters.

If I dont reached the goal I spent so long fulltime development on iStart, as the money will it allow. But than it will take longer to bringing these cool features to life :(

Look at the things you will become when supporting my project :)

More about the new features:

 

live tiles:

live tiles combined with the open API are a big and great feature for the users. With live tiles you become realtime information about everything, when there is an extension for that. Example. Currently im working on an weather live tile for iStart. Wich shows you with an nice animation the weather current and the forecast for the next few days direct on an tile!

Planed are extensions for iStart with these "live tiles" support:

facebook feed, facebook pictures, instagram feed, twitter feed, news feed rss reader, mp3 NAT streaming information..... and much more

 

API:


The API is an important feature for the live tiles. The live tiles are implemented by the API of iStart. Any of these cool and awesome live tile can be installed directly on the chrome webstore!

Thats really easy for the users. They search only for [istart] and see some extensions and apps that works for or with iStart.

The API allows also third party developers to integrate their own app or extension into iStart. So it become more relevant for the users, because they see the app everytime they opened a new tab!

 

Thats a great deal for other developers and for the users of iStart. With the API you can easy developing an live tile. Dont be scared about create an animation for the live tile. These features will be ready to use. Only provide your content and the rest will be done by iStart!

 

Its much more easyer as you think. If you have an working app or extension for chrome. You can add "live tile" support in 30minutes! ( If your app already using live data or using data by itself )

 

API for endusers, explanation: this feature allows other developers to create "live tiles" for you in a few minutes of time. So you will become more information on iStart for free!

 

Cloud Control:

Save all your settings in the cloud and that for free! Awesome and great feature. This will be shipped if i reached the goal at the end of 2013-04. This allows all users to save their settings on the cloud and sync it with all computers they use, ( i will love this feature also ).

 

 

Im a one man - javascript ninja - mini company! I developing, bugfixing, support the users 7 days a week for happy users all over the world! I have the vision to create the best "new tab page" ever seen. Im a javascript expert and i know what it means to bring an project ready to fits the users need. Im open for feedback for everyone! You can still send me an mail and i answer 100% the most time in 5h :)

 

What you can do to help?

If you can, donate! :) That will be great. If you cant, spread the world with the indieGoGo share tools! Share it with your friends and the world. Because iStart is an nice part of Software wich needs support by users, friends of free Software and all other people around over the world wich share the passion about an "new tab page" that fits your needs and gives you an awesome user experience you neve seen bevore ( when its feature complete )

 

 

Visit iStart [beta] on the chrome webstore:

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/istart-new-tab-page-in-me/lkgdlmlmcijgnglfcophfjhafiafhkae

 

Thanks for your support evey $ is needed to bring great features to life. I wont take money, but if i can pay with good user feedback my billings, this will be great ! :) Support iStart free aweseome software project

 

 

Supporters of iStart receive this awesome Shirt!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

And it`s HTML5 inside the app!

Im Kay Schneider , i worked as software developer on different companys. Based on software for the web. From Online Games to internet agencys wich build websites for large world wide operation companys.
In the year 2011 i was one of the top submitter on the "google developer contest - doodle your way to gdd".
After these 8 years experience i tink that it is time for something new. It is time to build an awesome software product wich is shipped mostly for free to all the people over the world. 
And after the success i had in the google contest, where i have developed a demo for html5 fetaures with javascript, i mostly programmed at my free time in javascript. And also on work i started focus on javascript.
 
 

installed Apps, Bookmarks/links, and information in realtime from everywhere - live tiles - cloud control - 

 
Now i have developed "iStart" in an based Version wich gives the users an good userexperience. I released the Software at the end of january in 2013 after a week endless developing. After that, i released a few features so that it becomes more comfortable for the users. Im raising money to developing the features "live tiles", API, cloud control.
 
You can still see the base version in the chrome webstore
 
It was a success. Without all features. There are over 3000  active users. Awesome. And now I need the support of the users for developing awesome features for you! Please help and keep this project alive!
 
But to finished the work i need more time than i have. To ship iStart with all the features there is still need two months of hard work. 
 
What we need and what you get?
I need still 15k to developing iStart ready with all features and spread it to the world. The money will be used that i, Kay Schneider, can spend a fulltime development on iStart without having troubles with the billings like yet.
This helps me, to stay focused on the users needs and the new core features for iStart, "live tiles" and the API. And i need a little bit time to travel to some developer meetings to speak about iStart and the API ( that needs time and money I have time, but no money )
The money will be completly spend covering expenses during that time, and to spend a little bit money to build extra graphics for iStart , as well as rewards for you, our supporters.
If I dont reached the goal I spent so long fulltime development on iStart, as the money will it allow. But than it will take longer to bringing these cool features to life :(
Look at the things you will become when supporting my project :)
More about the new features:
 
live tiles:
live tiles combined with the open API are a big and great feature for the users. With live tiles you become realtime information about everything, when there is an extension for that. Example. Currently im working on an weather live tile for iStart. Wich shows you with an nice animation the weather current and the forecast for the next few days direct on an tile!
Planed are extensions for iStart with these "live tiles" support:
facebook feed, facebook pictures, instagram feed, twitter feed, news feed rss reader, mp3 NAT streaming information..... and much more
 
API:
The API is an important feature for the live tiles. The live tiles are implemented by the API of iStart. Any of these cool and awesome live tile can be installed directly on the chrome webstore!
Thats really easy for the users. They search only for [istart] and see some extensions and apps that works for or with iStart.
The API allows also third party developers to integrate their own app or extension into iStart. So it become more relevant for the users, because they see the app everytime they opened a new tab!
 
Thats a great deal for other developers and for the users of iStart. With the API you can easy developing an live tile. Dont be scared about create an animation for the live tile. These features will be ready to use. Only provide your content and the rest will be done by iStart!
 
Its much more easyer as you think. If you have an working app or extension for chrome. You can add "live tile" support in 30minutes! ( If your app already using live data or using data by itself )
 
API for endusers, explanation: this feature allows other developers to create "live tiles" for you in a few minutes of time. So you will become more information on iStart for free!
 
Cloud Control:
Save all your settings in the cloud and that for free! Awesome and great feature. This will be shipped if i reached the goal at the end of 2013-04. This allows all users to save their settings on the cloud and sync it with all computers they use, ( i will love this feature also ).
 
 
Im a one man - javascript ninja - mini company! I developing, bugfixing, support the users 7 days a week for happy users all over the world! I have the vision to create the best "new tab page" ever seen. Im a javascript expert and i know what it means to bring an project ready to fits the users need. Im open for feedback for everyone! You can still send me an mail and i answer 100% the most time in 5h :)
 
What you can do to help?
If you can, donate! :) That will be great. If you cant, spread the world with the indieGoGo share tools! Share it with your friends and the world. Because iStart is an nice part of Software wich needs support by users, friends of free Software and all other people around over the world wich share the passion about an "new tab page" that fits your needs and gives you an awesome user experience you neve seen bevore ( when its feature complete )
 
 
Visit iStart [beta] on the chrome webstore:
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/istart-new-tab-page-in-me/lkgdlmlmcijgnglfcophfjhafiafhkae
 
Thanks for your support evey $ is needed to bring great features to life. I wont take money, but if i can pay with good user feedback my billings, this will be great ! :) Support iStart free aweseome software project
 
 
Supporters of iStart receive this awesome Shirt!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
And it`s HTML5 inside the app!

story:
Hello! Welcome to my Indiegogo campain!


My name is Ben Anderson, or as some of you may know me, "Boe6Eod7Nty", or "RandomBlocksBB". I am a 16 year old guy, going through high school, just trying to go through life. As you probably know from the title of this campaign, I am trying to raise money for a new, custom built, PC tower computer. This PC will be what I use to replace my currently barely-operating Laptop. I will be using this PC for years, as I will be upgrading as I need, but the initial cost is too big for what I can currently afford.

As you would probably be wondering, why do I need this money? Well, let me explain my situation,  I have been using computers for over 5 years, (I know this doesn't sound like a lot to most, but that’s 1/3rd of my life) and I don't know what I would do if I was unable to use one on a regular basis. My life currently revolves around my computer. A large majority of my closest friends are on the internet. If I was unable to keep in touch with these people, I would be a much lonelier person. Another thing I love about my computer, is how I am able to do what I truly love doing with my time. My favorite activities consist of; creating Youtube content, playing video games, and website development. I have been saving up for this computer for over 2 years, and at this rate, it won't be funded for another 3 years. My parents would love to help, but unfortunately, there hasn't been any income in my household for over 6 years. So my parents are just unable to help me out.

Here's a video that I made about a Minecraft Economy:



My current Computer:

Now you're wondering, "Well, why do you need a New computer?", and I do have very good reason. My current PC is a 7 year old Toshiba Satellite A135-S4467, purchased in 2008.
The specs:
-Intel Core 2 Duo T5200 Processor
-4 GB of RAM
-Intel GMZ 950 Video Card
-1280 x 800 (WXGA) Display.
This computer is currently available for sale on Amazon.com, for the price of $40.00 USD.

Now specs are all good and dandy, but how does it operate? Well, for an old laptop, pretty good, when it actually works, but that's not saying much. Every time I turn it on it takes around 5-7 minutes to bring up the desktop. Then I have to wait another 3-5 minutes for all the programs to start (skype, task manager, Teamspeak, etc). This is a major hassle every time I need to turn it on, which is daily. Now in additon, I also experience semi-frequent computer crashing. These can be in many forms, Screen locks (including mouse), Blue screen of death, or sometimes it will just completely shut off on its own (for no apparent reason, usually 1-2 times a day).

Now, having that old brick isn't cutting it anymore. As I mentioned earlier, what I love doing on this computer involves making videos, video games, Skype, and programming. Now due to my current snail-speed computer, I am barely able to use skype and an internet browser at the same time, let alone play video games, make high-quality videos, and program (effectively at least). My life practically revolves around my PC, and when that PC is as bad as mine, it is all-around annoying and aggravating. This is why I want a new computer.


The New PC:

The new computer I am looking at is going to cost approximately $620, including box and monitor. As I assume some of you are interested, so here are the specs:

CPU: AMD FX-4300 3.8GHz Quad-Core Processor  ($92.00)
Motherboard: Gigabyte GA-78LMT-USB3 Micro ATX AM3+ Motherboard  ($44.99)
Memory: G.Skill Ares Series 8GB (2 x 4GB) DDR3-1866 Memory  ($70.98)
Storage: Seagate Barracuda 1TB 3.5" 7200RPM Internal Hard Drive  ($47.89)
Video Card: XFX Radeon R9 270X 2GB Double Dissipation Video Card  ($157.99)
Case: Thermaltake Commander MS/I Snow Edition (White/Black) ATX Mid Tower Case  ($44.99)
Power Supply: Corsair Builder 500W 80+ Bronze Certified ATX Power Supply  ($44.85)
Monitor: Acer G226HQLBbd 60Hz 21.5" Monitor  ($109.99)
Total: $613.68
(Prices as of 2-25-2015, all prices in USD)

PCPartPicker Link for those that are interested in more info: http://pcpartpicker.com/p/bLFTD3


Funding:

Now we come to the interesting part, paying for this computer. As of posting, I currently have $250 saved up from various places over the last 2 years. But this computer won't last the 3 years it will take to finish saving up. This is why I need you. I need a grand total of $400 to pay for this in full (with some extra to pay for shipping of course).

Now obviously I don't expect you to just donate because I am some kid wanting a new PC, as there are tons of these posts, and I need to have a bit of an edge if I wish to be the one that succeeds. So that is why I have some interesting perks for those that donate! Feel free to check those out, as I am willing to provide incentives for you funding this project!

I would also like to mention that the project is set at $500, as that is Indiegogo's minimum. So if I get over $400, I will fund other computer-related things, such as a desk chair. :)



Finally, I would just like to thank you for even taking the time for reading this entire post, it really does mean the world to me, thank you!
