story:
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/uncia-299-but-not-an-fdm-3d-printer/x/6094774


(Please see the Update and Gallery for the latest news update)

An affordable, high quality 3D printer for all the people to bring creativity into your life.

Thanks for the amazing Indiegogo campaign! The next chapter of 3D printing is just beginning.


Are you frustrated that low-end 3D printers don’t have the quality to make the true beauty of your designs real? Do you dream of having the power and resolution of a truly professional machine on your desktop? We’ve created an easy-to-use system that rivals the output of high-end printers at a fraction of the cost.



High quality 3D printer on your desktop

We’ve been hard at work for over a year, and with your help, we’re ready to take the Uncia 3D Printer into full-fledged production. By supporting this effort, you’ll be the first to get your hands on an amazing 3D printer and help usher in a new era of 3D printing - an era in which your creative output is no longer limited by price or dauntingly complex machines.


Here is what makes Uncia different:

Read on for more details on what you’ll help bring into the world (and onto your desktop) if you support this effort.

Size matters:

the Uncia can print layers as thin as 100 microns (0.004 in) in a build volume of 102 x 77 x 180 mm (4.02 x 3.03 x 7.09 in). This means you can print complex geometries with the exquisite details and beautiful surface finish that will make your creations stand out.

Speed:

Whether you're rapid prototyping or simply impatient by nature, speed is king. Using DLP technology and specially formulated materials, Uncia can hardens an entire 0.1 mm layer all at once, without the typical moving heads or lasers that do nothing except waste your precious time.

Resolution:

Uncia can print layer heights at 100 microns , but adjustable from 150 microns all the way down to 50 microns. This leads to impressive results.

Here’s the comparison of 3D printed products by FDM (in red) and DLP (in yellow) with the same resolution of 100 microns and images enlarged by 25 times.

Here’s the comparison of 3D printed products by FDM (in red) and DLP (in yellow) with the same resolution of 100 microns and images enlarged by 25 times.


Here’s the comparison of 3D printed products by FDM (in red) and DLP (in yellow) with the same resolution of 100 microns and images enlarged by 35 times.



All researchers can contact us for more detailed pictures.

Hardware:

For most designers, the extruded plastic (i.e. FDM) of low-end printers is simply not capable of the high resolution and quality surface finish necessary for professional work. So, we decided to go straight for the real deal: a stereo-lithography printer with DLP technology we call the Uncia.

Stereolithography (SL) is the gold standard for accuracy and resolution in the 3D printing world, reaching layer thicknesses and feature sizes that are worlds ahead of what is possible with FDM, and DLP technology is based on SL but has many more advantages. The process is pretty straightforward - a DLP projector is used to draw on the surface of a liquid plastic resin that hardens when exposed to a certain wavelength of light. The light draws and hardens a layer at a time until the entire model is built. It’s simple, reliable, and quiet.


After a great deal of research, engineering, and experimentation, we’ve figured out how to do it at a much, much lower cost, making this premium technology available to everyone.

Software：

Great hardware is only half the battle. We painstakingly designed our Uncia software to have a simple, intuitive user experience that streamlines the process of importing .STL models and even sliced JPG images.


Technical specs:

Footprint: 350x210x700 mm (13.78x8.27x27.56in)

Speed: 5-10 seconds per Layer

Build Volume: 102x77x170 mm (4.02x 3.03x6.69 in)

Z-Motor resolution: 100 microns (0.004 in)

Typical layer height: 100 microns (0.004 in)

Minimal Feature Size / XY-resolution: 100 microns wihtin a 102x77x180 mm build area (Makers could achieve 50 microns when they adjust the projector, even the Z axis can be adjusted, please notice that is not our official initial set.)


Materials：

When the Uncia 3d printer is released, it will come with our colorful materials – yellow, red, green, blue, violet, gray, etc. Possible to be used as a base color for painting.

After a successful launch (thanks to your support!), we will continue development of an entire palette of materials for your printer. A variety of colors, transparency, flexibility, and even burnout capability for lost wax casting processes are all possible with Uncia.


Accessories: Uncia Finish kit:

With any 3D printing process, there are key finishing steps to get your print into its final and ready-to-use form. With Uncia, each part comes out of the printer with a small amount of liquid resin on its surface.Accessories: Uncia Finish kit

We’ve designed the Uncia Finish kit - a finishing kit with tools and accessories set to assist you and keep your workspace clean and organized during this process.

After printing, all you need to do is remove the build platform from the printer, set it into a tray and use a rinsing basket to clean the print for final use.

About us:

We have engineers, designers, and leaders in our team, the CMO joined the QSQM International Corporation in 2012 and began to build Uncia team. Uncia 3D printer team is under the Bureau of International Service of QSQM International Corporation.

We reinvented the light-curing machine with our passions and our visions. We are presenting you the best desktop 3D printer with high resolution and low cost !

Risks and challenges:

Similar to many Indiegogo projects, we face some risks:

ENGINEERING

We do have some remaining risk regarding the right packaging and shipment so that your printer makes it to you safely. However, we are confident we can solve this by using experienced experts in shipping.

LOGISTICS

We might encounter unexpected logistics / customs clearance issues in some countries which we need to learn how to deal with when / if they occur.


ATTENTION:

This program is provided by QSQM International Corporation. QSQM has branches all over mainland China and close relationships with our partners all over the world.

Uncia online store will launch on March 2nd in sharp. You can purchase Uncia 3D Printer in our online store. All the coupons will be delivered on time. The retail price is always $999. You can redeem your coupons when you get them from the perks you've chosen.

Uncia costumer service email: uncia3d@gmail.com

Official website of Uncia Program: www.uncia3d.com

Official website of QSQM Factory: www.syqsqm.com

International Service Bureau:

Tel: 0086-24-83893551

Email: bd@qsqm.com.cn


Q&A:

1. Q:  $499? $699? Is it real ?

    A: We are a legal company in China. We have laboratories, machine shops, retail branches and distributors all over China. Please notice, the $499($100 perk) and $699($50 perk) coupons are in a limited quantity, our retail price is $999.


2. Q: What are included in the Uncia 3D printer kit?

    A:  The whole machine with a high-resolution projector, a resin tank, an instruction brochure. If you contribute the $30 perk, you will get one more tool kit, with tiny useful tools. If you contribute the $50 perk, you will get the tool kit plus an UV lamp for the finishing steps.


3. Q:  When can we redeem the coupons ?

    A: Our online store will open on March 2nd, you can redeem your coupons after March 1st. But please send us your email address when you contribute a perk.


4. Q: How long is the delivery period ?

    A: We will send out the machine within a week after we receive your payment.  If you are from East Asian countries, packages are normally delivered in one or two weeks. If you are from North American, West European or Australian countries, packages are normally delivered in two or three weeks. Other countries, packages are normally delivered in three or four weeks.


5. Q: How many payment methods do you have?

    A: You can purchase and pay on our online store with Paypal or Credit Card via Paypal. If you buy in quantity, you can wire transfer the funds directly to our bank accounts in China.

6. Q: Which suppliers' UV resins are adaptable to Uncia 3D printer?

    A: For your convenience, it is better to buy resin locally. You can purchase UV resins from Makerjuice(North America) or Spot-A-Materials(Europe), they have the B9Creator-adaptable-resins which are also adaptable to Uncia. Here are the websites: 

http://spotamaterials.com/product/spot-ht-for-b9creator-and-similar-1kg/ (EURO)

http://spotamaterials.com/product/spot-gp-for-b9creator-and-similar-1kg/(EURO)

http://makerjuice.com/product-category/resins/b9resins/ (USA)
story_txt:
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/uncia-299-but-not-an-fdm-3d-printer/x/6094774(Please see the Update and Gallery for the latest news update)An affordable, high quality 3D printer for all the people
to bring creativity into your life.
Thanks for the amazing Indiegogo campaign! The next chapter
of 3D printing is just beginning.Are you frustrated that low-end 3D printers don’t have the quality to
make the true beauty of your designs real? Do you dream of having the power and
resolution of a truly professional machine on your desktop? We’ve created an
easy-to-use system that rivals the output of high-end printers at a fraction of
the cost.High quality 3D printer on your desktop
We’ve been hard at work for over a year, and with your
help, we’re ready to take the Uncia 3D Printer into full-fledged production. By
supporting this effort, you’ll be the first to get your hands on an amazing 3D
printer and help usher in a new era of 3D printing - an era in which your
creative output is no longer limited by price or dauntingly complex machines.Here is what makes Uncia different:
Read on for more details on what you’ll help bring into the
world (and onto your desktop) if you support this effort.
Size matters:
the Uncia can print layers as thin as 100 microns (0.004 in)
in a build volume of 102 x 77 x 180 mm (4.02 x 3.03 x 7.09 in). This means you
can print complex geometries with the exquisite details and beautiful surface
finish that will make your creations stand out.
Speed:
Whether you're rapid prototyping or simply impatient by
nature, speed is king. Using DLP technology and specially formulated materials,
Uncia can hardens an entire 0.1 mm layer all at once, without the typical
moving heads or lasers that do nothing except waste your precious time.
Resolution:
Uncia can print layer heights at 100 microns , but
adjustable from 150 microns all the way down to 50 microns. This leads
to impressive results.Here’s the comparison of 3D printed products by FDM (in
red) and DLP (in yellow) with the same resolution of 100 microns and images
enlarged by 25 times. Here’s the comparison of 3D printed products by FDM (in
red) and DLP (in yellow) with the same resolution of 100 microns and images enlarged
by 25 times.Here’s the comparison of 3D printed products by FDM (in
red) and DLP (in yellow) with the same resolution of 100 microns and images
enlarged by 35 times.All researchers can contact us for more detailed pictures.
Hardware:
For most designers, the extruded plastic (i.e. FDM) of
low-end printers is simply not capable of the high resolution and quality
surface finish necessary for professional work. So, we decided to go straight for
the real deal: a stereo-lithography printer with DLP technology we call the
Uncia.
Stereolithography (SL) is the gold standard for accuracy
and resolution in the 3D printing world, reaching layer thicknesses and feature
sizes that are worlds ahead of what is possible with FDM, and DLP technology is
based on SL but has many more advantages. The process is pretty straightforward
- a DLP projector is used to draw on the surface of a liquid plastic resin that
hardens when exposed to a certain wavelength of light. The light draws and
hardens a layer at a time until the entire model is built. It’s simple,
reliable, and quiet.After a great deal of research, engineering, and
experimentation, we’ve figured out how to do it at a much, much lower cost,
making this premium technology available to everyone.

Software：

Great hardware is
only half the battle. We painstakingly designed our Uncia software to have a
simple, intuitive user experience that streamlines the process of importing
.STL models and even sliced JPG images.
Technical specs:
Footprint: 350x210x700 mm (13.78x8.27x27.56in)

Speed: 5-10 seconds per Layer
Build Volume: 102x77x170 mm (4.02x 3.03x6.69 in)
Z-Motor resolution: 100 microns (0.004 in)
Typical layer height: 100 microns (0.004 in)
Minimal Feature Size / XY-resolution: 100 microns wihtin a
102x77x180 mm build area (Makers could achieve 50 microns when they adjust the projector, even the Z axis can be adjusted, please notice that is not our official initial set.)
Materials：
When the Uncia 3d printer is released, it will come with
our colorful materials – yellow, red, green, blue, violet, gray, etc. Possible
to be used as a base color for painting.
After a successful launch (thanks to your support!), we
will continue development of an entire palette of materials for your printer. A
variety of colors, transparency, flexibility, and even burnout capability for
lost wax casting processes are all possible with Uncia.
Accessories:
Uncia Finish kit:
With any 3D printing process, there are key finishing steps
to get your print into its final and ready-to-use form. With Uncia, each part
comes out of the printer with a small amount of liquid resin on its
surface.Accessories: Uncia Finish kit
We’ve designed the Uncia Finish kit - a finishing kit with
tools and accessories set to assist you and keep your workspace clean and
organized during this process.
After printing, all you need to do is remove the build
platform from the printer, set it into a tray and use a rinsing basket to clean
the print for final use.

About
us:
We have engineers, designers, and leaders in our team, the CMO joined the QSQM International Corporation in 2012 and began to build Uncia team. Uncia 3D printer team is under the Bureau of International Service of QSQM International Corporation.
We reinvented the light-curing machine with our passions
and our visions. We are presenting you the best desktop 3D printer with high
resolution and low cost !
Risks and challenges:
Similar to many Indiegogo projects, we face some risks:
ENGINEERING
We do have some remaining risk regarding the right
packaging and shipment so that your printer makes it to you safely. However, we
are confident we can solve this by using experienced experts in shipping.
LOGISTICS
We might encounter unexpected logistics / customs clearance
issues in some countries which we need to learn how to deal with when / if they
occur.ATTENTION:This program is provided by QSQM International Corporation. QSQM has branches all over mainland China and close relationships with our partners all over the world.Uncia online store will launch on March 2nd in sharp. You can purchase Uncia 3D Printer in our online store. All the coupons will be delivered on time. The retail price is always $999. You can redeem your coupons when you get them from the perks you've chosen.Uncia costumer service email: uncia3d@gmail.comOfficial website of Uncia Program: www.uncia3d.comOfficial website of QSQM Factory: www.syqsqm.comInternational Service Bureau:Tel: 0086-24-83893551Email: bd@qsqm.com.cnQ&A:
1. Q:  $499? $699? Is it real ?    A: We are a legal company in China. We have laboratories, machine shops, retail branches and distributors all over China. Please notice, the $499($100 perk) and $699($50 perk) coupons are in a limited quantity, our retail price is $999.2. If you contribute the $30 perk, you will get one more tool kit, with tiny useful tools. If you contribute the $50 perk, you will get the tool kit plus an UV lamp for the finishing steps.3. Q:  When can we redeem the coupons ?    A: Our online store will open on March 2nd, you can redeem your coupons after March 1st. But please send us your email address when you contribute a perk.4. Q: How long is the delivery period ?    A: We will send out the machine within a week after we receive your payment.  If you are from East Asian countries, packages are normally delivered in one or two weeks. If you are from North American, West European or Australian countries, packages are normally delivered in two or three weeks. Other countries, packages are normally delivered in three or four weeks.5. Q: How many payment methods do you have?    A: You can purchase and pay on our online store with Paypal or Credit Card via Paypal. If you buy in quantity, you can wire transfer the funds directly to our bank accounts in China.6. Q: Which suppliers' UV resins are adaptable to Uncia 3D printer?    A: For your convenience, it is better to buy resin locally. You can purchase UV resins from Makerjuice(North America) or Spot-A-Materials(Europe), they have the B9Creator-adaptable-resins which are also adaptable to Uncia. Here are the websites: 
http://spotamaterials.com/product/spot-ht-for-b9creator-and-similar-1kg/ (EURO)
http://spotamaterials.com/product/spot-gp-for-b9creator-and-similar-1kg/(EURO)http://makerjuice.com/product-category/resins/b9resins/ (USA)

story:
Design Concept of iFOUND Key & iFOUND Card !

  • We believe the technology shall make the life ease and better

  • Have you always spent time to find your car key and purples before leaving your house for the party in the last moment

     

  • To keep your valuable belongings by your side and secure kids and pets in range

  • An exquisite and brilliant gadget along with your wallet, purses, phones and keys

 

How does the iFOUND Key and iFOUND Card Work?

 


iFOUND Key and iFOUND Card are your guardian to secure your valuable belongings. And make your dream come ture!

 

iFOUND Key & iFOUND Card Images:

 

  • Features:

  • Bi-directional Calls

  • Location log of disconnection

  • Setting of connection range

  • Motion detect

  • Beep/buzzer alarm

  • LED indicator

  • Vibration alert

  • Low battery alarm

  • Customization -   Naming & Image for iFOUND

Compatible with iPhone 5/4S, iPad 4th/3rd gen, iPad mini, iPod Touch 5th gen. iOS version : iOS 5 / iOS 6 or later

iFOUND App supports Android 4.3 will be released in Jan., 2014

 

Products updated:

iFOUND Key and iFOUND Card passed Safety FCC, CE and NCC after pilot run, that means the products you get will be in stabel performance and good ality.

We need your supports and funding for runing the 1st mass prodcution, the Perk prices we post here will be pre-order special prices to thank you your supports to iTOMO.


ABOUT iTOMO

iTOMO is the new brand we built base on our management philosophies are
continuously to innovate development and to stabilize performance for
high-quality and fantastic peripherals of mobile devices, as well as to
aggressively raise our competitiveness and advantage in the market by (new)
product developments so that users’ operation experience can be enhanced as a
result. As a manner of act, our wide-ranged technical support also prevails.

story:
EASY SETUP

All the source code for the demo application will be disclosed in the reference pages.You can start development work right out of the box by downloading the SDK.



A funding campaign was held for the Ovrvision 1 on Indiegogo last year as the first dedicated VR stereo camera in the world.

The targeted amount of funding could not be reached at that time, but being strongly supported by all of you, we were able to deliver more than 1,000 units to 21 countries all over the world, and the number of shipped units as of February 2015 far exceeded the original reservation of 72 units.

We received various requests during sales of the Ovrvision 1.

In addition to use for VR, applications we never imagined included medical wearable devices, robots, architectural simulations, onboard purposes and many others.

At the same time we have frequently received requests for increased specs. Because the current design of the Ovrvision 1 does not have any potential for increased specs or extensibility, we have decided to produce the Ovrvision Pro.

The Ovrvision Pro will be developed into a high-performance stereo camera that reflects your opinions and requests.

 Hand Tracking 

Chroma key

Outlinus

Ovrvision+Robot

Special Thanks: hecomi


Risks and challenges

Downsizing is not very difficult, but to avoid noise caused by the wiring layout, a geometry change may take place in the range of influence from infrared rays.

The design will be finalized in the beginning of June.


Special Thanks

query-chan(unity free aset)

story:
Moontrans


"Moontrans" - it's a video game. Its action takes place on the moon in 2191. It is a powerful industrial world in which machines live. It locomotives, heavy quarry equipment and space vehicles. All of them are controlled by Sarah - the latest generation of artificial intelligence. Their task - to finally bring humanity out of a deep energy crisis in the world via production of helium-3.



Origins


Moontrans started as a final project for a game design course, but during the development of the game we decided to go ahead and create a wider universe. At the same time, work was completed on the script and it just convinced us of the right of the chosen solution.
So, here we are.




More about game


The player takes on the role of the last employee on the moon - a man who himself drives a locomotive.

The main feeling that the player must be born during the passage, is the sense of the flow of continuous movement through the web of lunar industrial railways.

Also, for us it was very important to reliably convey a sense of control locomotive, so the simulation received significant attention. As well as the accuracy of the visual.

During this journey the player will make the choice for themselves - whether he wants to know anything about the world or not, depending on his choice - the final will have different effects on the player.

The more the player communicates with Sarah, the more the whole picture formed in his mind, in the end, he realizes that he is now involved in the most ambiguous route on the moon in his life. And the end of his journey will have an impact at all. Whatever choice he has done.




Who are we?


We are a small independent team consisting of two people at the momet.
My name is Zhan and iam game designer on this project. Also, I have been creating 3d models and I am responsible for the art and visiual designe of the game.
I work with a programmer who is the only person who is able to make our ideas work properly. His name is Vladislav.

We both have experience in the industry with a few finished projects. Now it's time for something more impressive. And we need your help for this.





Where is the money going?


Because we are an independent team of two people, we need your support to stay strong and not to deviate from the chosen path.
With you, we can work on the project full-time, not seeking out additional work and easy to pay rent.
Of cource we need to license software.
In the further development we need to expand our team and take advantage of outsourcing. Like additional work on 3d modeling and sound designe.
Translation of the game in different languages.
Also, with your help we’ll be able to purchase proper equipment for development and finally play Witcher 3.





Stretch goals


The game world and its functionality is very scalable. So, If the campaign target is reached, the extra contribution will go for development extra content. Such as additional stations to explore, more "every day routine" quests. Like controlling lunar mining excavator with first person view. And more non-locomotive cab quests - feel free to explore the lunar surface.
Also, guys, it will be great if you will use the indiegogo share tools. We appreciate that contribution too.





Help make it happen

For MOONTRANS and the team!

story:
About this project

What is it?

Have you imagine that you could print any thing showed on your smart phone's screen, like messages, web page or image? Now you can!


droPrinter is the world’s first and only phone printer solely designed for smart phone. Using thermal paper (the paper used by many thermal printers), droPrinter could print any thing showed on your smart phone's screen. 

droPinter

droPrinter is compact and easy to use, you just turn it on, one step to connect the smartphone, and it could start printing anything within seconds. We designed droPrinter to be super simple. After the first time, droPrinter will pair automatically to your smart phone.

droPrinter ID Sketching

We designed it portable , so the size of it is small enough to your bag.

droPrinter & iPhone 5s

droPrinter Technical Specs


What can I print with droPrinter?

You could print tips, photos, website, image, etc. Every thing showed on your smart phone you always could print them by your droPrinter.

Shopping List

Daily Happy Tips

One more thing:

droPrinter is very durable, the rechargeable battery will last for more than 120 hours, or 7 hours if you want to print continuously. That’s a lot of printing! 


What People are Saying:


The Paper of droPrinter:

droPrinter is the best low-cost & efficient accessories for your smart-phone. Just 2 cents for each printing.

we use standard thermal paper, you can purchase it at any office supply or big box store. and the paper is very cheap too. 

Snapshot of Thermal Paper on Amazon.com


Long-Style-Printing: 

These rolls have 85 feet of paper for you to print as many context as you can. And you can easily stick the paper to the wall with adhesive tape or tidy them up with clamps. 


Why droPrinter has no face?

We have think about droPrinter boy face for a thousand times, but then, finally, we decide to put this right into your hands. You could print any face you like to stick it on droPrinter.

Your droPrinter, Your Choice.


the App

We have developed the demo Android and iOS App for droPrinter. They all work very well functionally. In this case, you could control the droPrinter via your smart phone to print a lot of amazing things.

droPrinter's APPs is quite user-friendly. We’ve already optimized droPrinter’s performance, leaving only a few straightforward settings so you can easily print at real-time. 

droPrinter App UI Design


Funny Stuff

You also could have fun with the QRcode function in the Droprinter APPs.

Just type the context you want, and generate the QR code.

then, Print it and share to your friend.

they would know what you want to say when they scan it.

Scan Me



Time Line

Here is the time line of droPrinter project.


Last but not least 

We have a lot things want to tell you about droPrinter and our story, so we’ve created an extensive FAQ to answer all of your questions. And we’re on standby to respond to any other queries you may have!

*Thanks for the help of Beijing Maker Space in Beijing, China. Without hacker-spaces like this, projects such as droPrinter could not happen. They do give us a lot help when we made the demo of droPrinter and also introducing us many suppliers of droPrinter parts.  We believe with their support, we could produce more droPrinter much earlier . 


Risks and challenges

We've been working on droPrinter for almost a year and had initially intended to launch in June 2014. We held back so that we could ensure the prototype worked perfectly (check out the video, it does!) and so that we could speak to the factories (and make related visits to China). Comfortable that we can deliver this, we’re now launching droPrinter!

Below are a couple of the main challenges we will tackle:

Choice of Factory:

We put a lot of work into designing and building the prototypes, and we know there is some risk in hardware produce, but during this time, we have already found many reliable suppliers, such as the supplier of droPrinter’ case, this factory used to produce 10000 PCS Raspberry Pi Cases in only 5 days and ship them. And the electronics supplier, they would help us to improve our electronics design, in that case, droPrinter could past the test and approved by various independent agencies. Besides, they also could help us to choose the good quality battery for droPrinter.

Choice of Shipment:

We also have do a lot of research of international shipping. Because when we search the shipping issue in Indiegogo campus, lots of people got stuck in this step. But we have already made a plan about shipping.

For example, we ship a large bulk of droPrinters to EU third party warehouse,and the staff of warehouse would resend the stock by domestic delivery. Then it could make the shipping more accuracy and safety. We have contact many warehouse and ask for a good price. So we need to ship many droPrinters, otherwise, this method is more expensive than express.

Anyway, we would try our best to control the risk, and make every thing settle down. Of course, we promise to keep you updated every step of the way!

This is about getting the best possible droPrinter into your hands ASAP. So please go back to the top of the page and pledge now.

Thanks!

You could print any face you like to stick it on droPrinter.Your droPrinter, Your Choice.the AppWe have developed the demo Android and iOS App for droPrinter. They all work very well functionally. In this case, you could control the droPrinter via your smart phone to print a lot of amazing things.droPrinter's APPs is quite user-friendly. We’ve already optimized droPrinter’s performance, leaving only a few straightforward settings so you can easily print at real-time. droPrinter App UI DesignFunny StuffYou also could have fun with the QRcode function in the Droprinter APPs.Just type the context you want, and generate the QR code.then, Print it and share to your friend.they would know what you want to say when they scan it.Scan MeTime LineHere is the time line of droPrinter project.Last but not least We have a lot things want to tell you about droPrinter and our story, so we’ve created an extensive FAQ to answer all of your questions. And we’re on standby to respond to any other queries you may have!*Thanks for the help of Beijing Maker Space in Beijing, China. Without hacker-spaces like this, projects such as droPrinter could not happen. They do give us a lot help when we made the demo of droPrinter and also introducing us many suppliers of droPrinter parts.  We believe with their support, we could produce more droPrinter much earlier . Risks and challengesWe've been working on droPrinter for almost a year and had initially intended to launch in June 2014. We held back so that we could ensure the prototype worked perfectly (check out the video, it does!) and so that we could speak to the factories (and make related visits to China). Comfortable that we can deliver this, we’re now launching droPrinter!Below are a couple of the main challenges we will tackle:Choice of Factory:We put a lot of work into designing and building the prototypes, and we know there is some risk in hardware produce, but during this time, we have already found many reliable suppliers, such as the supplier of droPrinter’ case, this factory used to produce 10000 PCS Raspberry Pi Cases in only 5 days and ship them. And the electronics supplier, they would help us to improve our electronics design, in that case, droPrinter could past the test and approved by various independent agencies. Besides, they also could help us to choose the good quality battery for droPrinter.Choice of Shipment:We also have do a lot of research of international shipping. Because when we search the shipping issue in Indiegogo campus, lots of people got stuck in this step. But we have already made a plan about shipping.For example, we ship a large bulk of droPrinters to EU third party warehouse,and the staff of warehouse would resend the stock by domestic delivery. Then it could make the shipping more accuracy and safety. We have contact many warehouse and ask for a good price. So we need to ship many droPrinters, otherwise, this method is more expensive than express.Anyway, we would try our best to control the risk, and make every thing settle down. Of course, we promise to keep you updated every step of the way!This is about getting the best possible droPrinter into your hands ASAP. So please go back to the top of the page and pledge now.Thanks!

story:
Bring MagSafe Feature Back to Your MacBook

MagSafe was one of Apple’s most ingenious designs, but this genuinely useful and creative feature was removed from the latest MacBooks when they switched to USB-C charging … until now, with the launch of Bolt magnetic cable.

Featured in

World's First USB-C Magnetic Cable for Your 15'' MacBook and Phone

With the same breakaway feature that was a trademark of the MagSafe, the Bolt will prevent your MacBook, or any other device such as smartphones, from tumbling to the floor which can provide extra protection for your devices.  

Bolt is the world’s first magnetic cable that fully supports 87W USB-C power adapter charging for 15-inch MacBook Pro and any other USB-C devices. No fuss, no mess and no more fumbling around to plug your cable into the right place.

Transform Your USB-C Cables into a Magnetic USB-C Cables

To optimize your charging experience, we also designed Bolt Magnetic USB-C Adapter packed full of features. With 4.3 A charging, it provides the safest and fastest way to charge your new MacBook and any other USB-C devices. Simply attach the adapter to your existing USB-C cable, then you can transform your USB-C cable into a Magnetic USB-C cable and take advantage of the MagSafe feature!

Main Features

 

Bolt provides the easiest way charge your 15-inch and 13-inch MacBook Pro, MacBook, laptops, tablets, and smartphones with a quick and secure connection. Equipped with strong magnetism, this innovative design will perfectly avoid pointless fiddling to plug in cable even in the dark. Now you can spend less time plugging in and have more time enjoying the convenience that Bolt brings to you.

As the world’s first USB-C magnetic cable to properly charge your 15-inch MacBook Pro, the Bolt achieves a max current range of 4.3 Amps with its 87W USB-C power adapter. With a superior built-in chipset, it is faster and more stable while charging your 12-, 13-, 15-inch MacBook, and more.

When Bolt Magnetic Cable is tugged or pulled, it detaches instantly, preventing your device from flying off the table when someone trips over the cable.

Unlike other USB-C connectors, the magnetic tip of Bolt is very small with only 2.2mm which is ⅓ smaller than the tiniest magnetic tip size on the market. It's so small that you'll hardly notice it. You can use it as a dust resistant plug to prevent dust from entering the charging port.

Bolt also supports PD safe charging for your quick charge smartphone which will increase your charging efficiency by 38% from the previous generation that will fully juice up your device safely, quickly and conveniently with black and silver colors for option. 

We know your devices take a lot of daily abuse; that's why we made the Bolt extra durable. Premium neodymium magnets have been added to ensure instant connection, while each cable is put through the tensile test 4,000 times to make the Bolt more durable than any other cable on the market.

With an intelligent recognition system, the Bolt adapts to the different voltages in various USB-C devices. In addition to the MacBook and MacBook Pro, it’ll flawlessly charge your smartphone, speakers, tablets, etc.

Reward

Spec

  • Product Name: Bolt
  • Material: Magnets and TPE
  • Color: Black/Silver
  • Length: 78.7 inches (about 2m)
  • Weight: 1.2 ounces (about 34g)
  • Output: 5.2V 2.4A/9V 3A/20.2V 4.3A
  • Maximum Current: 4.3A
  • Charging Port: USB-C
  • Operating Environment: -3° to 45℃
  • Compatibility: 15-inch MacBook Pro / 13-inch MacBook Pro / MacBook/     USB-C laptops, Tablets, Smartphones, Speakers etc.

        

 

Timeline

Our Team

As Mac users for more than 10 years, we all love the convenience of the MagSafe, however, this useful feature is no longer available in the new MacBook series. Inspired by our frustrations, we wanted to bring back the MagSafe feature to the lines of MacBooks. For us, the design not only makes life easier but also brings us joy. With years of experience in design, marketing and manufacturing, we are building a cable that is both functional and durable. Thanks to the Indiegogo community, we are proud to introduce the world’s best magnetic cable for the MacBook Pro.

Why We Need Your Help

Rather than having a power cable that locks into the laptop that needs to be carefully plugged in every single time, we wanted to make magnetic cables for the new 15-inch MacBook Pro with the same breakaway feature of the MagSafe. Initially, we thought this would be easy to accomplish, but over the last few months, we learned how hard it was to make a magnetic cable that is minimalistic, stable and durable. That’s why you see that other magnetic cables for 87W MacBook Pro on the market are often bulky. In order to make Vinpok Bolt tiny yet functional, we used miniature components to create its incredibly small size of the tip only with 8.8mm. Every component has been highly integrated into and optimized with the design. After multiple rounds of designing and prototyping, we were capable of creating the Vinpok Bolt.  We wanted to share our creation with everyone out there.

There is still a lot of work to be done in manufacturing this magnetic cable, but we couldn't be more happy with how our prototypes have turned out. Your strong support will give us the needed affirmation to place a larger component order and start mass production. With your support, we can bring the Bolt to new MacBook users worldwide. Your contribution will help to fund:

- Mass production tooling

- Necessary components preparation

The Bolt that you see in the above videos is a real, working prototype that operates the same as the final mass production product unit. We have confidence in delivering the best Bolt as promised.

Help us by Sharing Bolt with Your Friends

 

FAQ


Will Bolt support my device?
Bolt is a USB-C magnetic cable. It’s compatible with USB-C devices like MacBook Pro 15-inch, MacBook Pro 13-inch, MacBook 12-inch, Samsung S8, Sony Xperia X, Google Pixel/Pixel XL, LG G5, Moto Z, Huawei P9/P10, HTC 10, Xiaomi Mi 6S, Lumia 950/ 950 XL, Samsung Galaxy Book, Googlebook Pixel, HP Spectre360/13, Lenovo ThinkPad, Huawei MateBook, Dell XPS etc.

Does Bolt support data transfer?
No, Bolt doesn’t support data synchronization.

Will Bolt support my phone case?
Most major branded cases made according to USB-C specs should be fully compatible with our cable. Given the vast amount of cases available in the market, we cannot possibly test every single case in the market. We are confident that our cable should be compatible with most of the mainstream cases.

What’s the shipping cost?
Vinpok offers free shipping for all U.S.A orders. If you reside outside of USA, it’ll cost you US$3 for worldwide shipping.

When will you ship the item? 
You’ll find your estimated shipping time via View Order Details. To do that, please login to your Indiegogo account and click your name at the top right of the page. In the menu that drops down, choose My Contributions, then click on View Order Details. You'll now see all of the details of this contribution

How will my order be shipped?
We will use different couriers or services to ship Bolt to you depending on where you are. Each order will have a shipping notification and tracking information. Due to the changes in courier regulations on magnetic products, our shipping methods are subjected to change.

Do I have to pay VAT and duty?
For backers living in countries with import duties and taxes, these costs will have to be covered by the backers at delivery. We'll try our best to avoid duty and VAT. However, we cannot reassure that you won't pay VAT and duty. 

Remote area shipping cost.

Shipping costs do NOT include extra costs that may incur for shipment to areas defined by DHL as remote. Customers may check here: http://raslist.dhl.com/jsp/first.jsp with your city’s postal code (make sure you use your city’s postal code, otherwise, it will not be accurate)

Some reminders that you should pay attention to:

  • Please DO NOT connect and detach Bolt cable repeatedly in a short time period as this could cause damage to the cable.
  • Please TURN OFF power adapter first before switching/converting Bolt cable from LAPTOP to smartphone, or the rapid voltage and current changes might break down your phone.
  • Bolt is the world’s first magnetic cable that fully supports 87W USB-C power adapter charging for 15-inch MacBook Pro and any other USB-C devices. In order to have a better user experience and quality assurance, we also recommend you to use the original power adapter that comes with your devices.

story:
HoverCharge is a Qi Wireless Charger

For your Car

Home

& Office.

No Magnets. No Metal Plates. No Nano-Suction Tape. No Problem.  

Magnets mounts require metal plates on your phone, blocking NFC payments (Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay), and damage your device if the metal plate is removed. Nano-Suction tape lose their grip after just a few uses. Our epoxy based mount grips to your phone like a magnet, without the magnet. No metal plates required, NFC payments not blocked. No residue left on your device.   

HoverCharge continues to hold its strength again and again. We tested the same prototype for over a year and it holds any phone, no matter what size, bare skin or bulky cases, with the same strong grip.

HoverCharge can Handle any Road

or Driver.

Works with or without a Case. 

Portrait or Landscape.

Supports 7.5W Qi Fast Wireless Charging for iPhones.

 

And 10W Qi Fast Wireless Charging for over a dozen Android Phones.

Each HoverCharge Kit Includes:  

  • 1 x HoverCharge
  • 1 x Long-Arm Suction Mount
  • 1 x Vent Mount
  • 1 x 3M Mount
  • 1 x Table-Top Mount
  • 1 x Car Power Adapter w/ USB
  • 1 x Wall Power Adapter

 

We worked on building a design that was minimal, iconic, but invisible when in use. Using the highest quality materials, we housed a Qi Standard wireless charger in a body that doesn't overheat, with fixed frequency so nothing interferes with your phones touchscreen, compass or Face ID, in one of the most compact form for a wireless charger. The HoverCharge can be tilted 360° with the four separate mounts provided, so you can use your charger practically anywhere!  

Long-Arm Suction Mount

Vent Mount

3M Mount

Table-Top Mount

*Samsung S9 & S9+ also supported

 

Phone Case Demo

So far the HoverCharge has able to handle every case we have tested. If you have any case suggestions, please leave a comment or send us a message and we will test it out. Here are a few cases we have tested already:

 

 

Production

About Us

We at MATRYX focus on creating & designing new and innovative tech solutions. HoverCharge represents our love and passion for creating a consumer product that we hope will become a part of your everyday life. 

Our goal was to create a minimal but iconic design. We focused on providing a consumer solution which doesn't exist in the market today. We stressed the fact that the best technology is one that feels invisible. Finding that every other in-car wireless charger on the market is either bulky or contains numerous shortcomings, HoverCharge's goal was to become the wireless charger that rules them all. Magnet-mounts with their metal plates hinder NFC payments & cause damage to the device, cradle based mounts require you to strap in your phone using both hands, gravity based mounts only work in portrait mode and nano-suction tape mounts last only a few uses before they stop holding your device. 

Our epoxy based mount is unlike anything on the market. Not only does it work with or without a case, without metal plates, and without any cradles, but our mount holds your device stronger than a magnet, allows portrait or landscape mode, allows for NFC payments and unlike nano-suction tape, never loses its grip, strength or power. The same prototype from a year ago continues to hold even the heaviest and bulkiest cased phone in the roughest driving conditions till this day! 

Putting that together with the most compact wireless charger together created the best wireless charging solution on the market, which isn't just perfect for your car, but also your home, office or practically anywhere with a power outlet! 

HoverCharge is the only 3-IN-1 wireless charger which provides you the solutions for all your wireless charging needs! 

Contact Us:

Website: hover-charge.com

Facebook : @hoverchargetech 

Twitter : @hoverchargetech

Instagram : @hovercharge

Email: info@hover-charge.com

Risks and Challenges

We spent over a year in working out any hiccups or road bumps and only launched our Kickstarter when we became fully confident in our team to finally begin mass producing. 

We have sufficient means to manufacture around 40,000 units in a month. Anything above that will take another week to a month depending on quantity. We are at the stage where everything is set-up for mass production but need your contribution to keep product costs to a minimum. 

For your support we want to promise guaranteed shipping or your money back.

We will create an atmosphere of transparency throughout the process and will provide video updates on every step of the way. and for any requests, questions or comments can be reached directly at info@hover-charge.com.

story:
The Matter and Form 3D Scanner - The world’s first truly affordable 3D scanner for anyone!

Shipping since mid-2014, the Matter and Form 3D Scanner is available throughout the world and is the #1 consumer rated 3D scanner under $3,000. 

Matter and Form  Inc. (formerly Matterform) was founded by designers and programmers who needed a high-res 3D scanner but couldn’t afford it. So we built one. With your help, we launched a record-breaking Indiegogo campaign in 2013 and were backed by designers, archivists, architects, hobbyists, gamers, teachers and creative families worldwide. 

Combining superior performance with intuitive usability, the Matter and Form 3D Scanner is an affordable, high resolution 3D scanner that is compact, portable, fully assembled and easy to use right out of the box. At the heart of our patented technology is an HD camera that produces accurate, detailed color scans at resolution qualities that match or top what more expensive scanners can achieve. It works with almost any 3D printer or online printing service, and it allows users to scan solid items to create a digital 3D model. It is also capable of producing intricate, high-resolution, 3D representations.

We’ve been developing the 3D scanner hardware and software from scratch since 2012 and will continue to provide free software updates to all users. What's more, the scanner is compatible with both Windows (7+) and Mac (OS 10.9+) and saves/exports the following file formats: STL, OBJ, PLY, XYZ and PTX. 



Who Currently Uses the Matter and Form 3D Scanner?


Who We Are.

Drew Cox (CEO):  I've been an entrepreneur since I was 18, and making things since I could move my hands. The many jobs I have had over the years are what make me who I am. Professionally I have been a programmer, artist, art director, and graphic designer. Unprofessionally I am an inventor, hacker, and mad scientist. My career path has led me to help build huge brands like Labatt, Budweiser, Audi, Honda, Coca Cola. My hobbies and passion has brought me to respect the names of Prusa, Sherline, Arduino, and every person who has ever contributed to open source projects.

Trevor Townsend (CTO): I've had a diverse career path, including roles in software development, IT consulting, business analysis, and music. I've written software used by multinational corporations including ArcelorMittal, Home Hardware and Staples to manage employee time. I've authored reports on IT requirements for the manufacturing, retail and reinsurance industries, and co-authored a web gaming system capable of supporting millions of simultaneous users. I have also written and performed music which has been sold and reviewed around the world. I'm pleased to be part of the senior leadership team at Matter and Form, an organization with a great team of people who make great decisions and great products.

Paul Banwatt (COO and General Counsel): Paul Banwatt is a lawyer licensed to practice in New York and Ontario. Before joining Matter and Form Inc., Paul was an associate at Gilbert’s LLP in Toronto. Paul has regularly lectured on 3D printing and scanning law, including for the Intellectual Property Institute of Canada and the Licensing Executives Society. Paul is also the founder and main contributor for the 3D printing and scanning law blog Law in the Making, which is featured in the March/April 2014 issue of Landslide, the intellectual property magazine of the American Bar Association. Paul has also had a successful career as a musician. Paul’s bands (The Rural Alberta Advantage, Woodhands) received two 2012 Juno nominations, charted on the Billboard U.S. Top 200, played at the 2011 Coachella Music Festival, and have been featured in numerous publications including Spin, NME, Playboy Magazine, and The New York Times.


Let's face it, we wouldn't be here if it wasn't for Indiegogo and our original backers. The least we can say is THANK YOU, you've made this all a reality! 

To contact us outside of indiegogo, please use info@matterandform.net
story_txt:
The Matter and Form 3D Scanner - The world’s first truly affordable 3D scanner for anyone!

Shipping since mid-2014, the Matter and Form 3D Scanner is available throughout the world and is the #1 consumer rated 3D scanner under $3,000. 
Matter and Form  Inc. (formerly Matterform) was founded by designers and programmers who needed a high-res 3D scanner but couldn’t afford it. So we built one. With your help, we launched a record-breaking Indiegogo campaign in 2013 and were backed by designers, archivists, architects, hobbyists, gamers, teachers and creative families worldwide. 


Combining superior performance with intuitive usability, the Matter and Form 3D Scanner is an affordable, high resolution 3D scanner that is compact, portable, fully assembled and easy to use right out of the box. At the heart of our patented technology is an HD camera that produces accurate, detailed color scans at resolution qualities that match or top what more expensive scanners can achieve. It works with almost any 3D printer or online printing service, and it allows users to scan solid items to create a digital 3D model. It is also capable of producing intricate, high-resolution, 3D representations.
We’ve been developing the 3D scanner hardware and software from scratch since 2012 and will continue to provide free software updates to all users. What's more, the scanner is compatible with both Windows (7+) and Mac (OS 10.9+) and saves/exports the following file formats: STL, OBJ, PLY, XYZ and PTX. Who Currently Uses the Matter and Form 3D Scanner?

Who We Are.Drew Cox (CEO):  I've been an entrepreneur since I was 18, and making things since I could move my hands. The many jobs I have had over the years are what make me who I am. Professionally I have been a programmer, artist, art director, and graphic designer. Unprofessionally I am an inventor, hacker, and mad scientist. My career path has led me to help build huge brands like Labatt, Budweiser, Audi, Honda, Coca Cola. My hobbies and passion has brought me to respect the names of Prusa, Sherline, Arduino, and every person who has ever contributed to open source projects.Trevor Townsend (CTO): I've had a diverse career path, including roles in software development, IT consulting, business analysis, and music. I've written software used by multinational corporations including ArcelorMittal, Home Hardware and Staples to manage employee time. I've authored reports on IT requirements for the manufacturing, retail and reinsurance industries, and co-authored a web gaming system capable of supporting millions of simultaneous users. I have also written and performed music which has been sold and reviewed around the world. I'm pleased to be part of the senior leadership team at Matter and Form, an organization with a great team of people who make great decisions and great products.Paul Banwatt (COO and General Counsel): Paul Banwatt is a lawyer licensed to practice in New York and Ontario. Before joining Matter and Form Inc., Paul was an associate at Gilbert’s LLP in Toronto. Paul has regularly lectured on 3D printing and scanning law, including for the Intellectual Property Institute of Canada and the Licensing Executives Society. Paul is also the founder and main contributor for the 3D printing and scanning law blog Law in the Making, which is featured in the March/April 2014 issue of Landslide, the intellectual property magazine of the American Bar Association. Paul has also had a successful career as a musician. Paul’s bands (The Rural Alberta Advantage, Woodhands) received two 2012 Juno nominations, charted on the Billboard U.S. Top 200, played at the 2011 Coachella Music Festival, and have been featured in numerous publications including Spin, NME, Playboy Magazine, and The New York Times.

Let's face it, we wouldn't be here if it wasn't for Indiegogo and our original backers. The least we can say is THANK YOU, you've made this all a reality! To contact us outside of indiegogo, please use info@matterandform.net

story:
Hello

My name is Brandon Nadeau and I'm currently living in Bali with my beautiful wife, our four rescue dogs, and one rescue cat. We came to Bali to have more time to pursue our creative passions and to try and make a living doing what we love.

My wife, Shayna, is an amazing digital designer and photographer and the majority of her work is done online. She uses mostly illustrator and photoshop for her work, but her 6 year old Macbook has decided to stop working right at this crucial time where she is building her brand.

It is her birthday in two months, and I know she would be blown away if I could surprise her with a new Macbook Pro for her business. I wish I could say I could afford this on my own and give her everything she deserves, but unfortunately that's just not the reality of our financial situation.

By contributing to this, not only will you be helping me surprise my wife, but more importantly your contribution will help keep the entrepreneurial dream alive, and confirm to us that it is not a mistake to follow your passions.

What We Need & What You Get

For my surprise to be a success,  I need to raise  $1500 to buy a new 13 inch Macbook Pro and enough to cover the 9 % fee for indiegogo.
 
The Total to cover these two expenses would be : $1,635
 
I hope to get this by her 28th birthday on April 4th, 2013.
 
Now on to the good stuff: What you Get. I know my wife, and anyone who contributes, no matter what the amount, will get a personalised thank you note from her. Depending on what you contribute the other perks are professional photographs from our travels in Asia, Photo Calendars, Large Canvas prints of my wife's photos, proffesional photo editing, custom digital designs, custom logos, custom headers for websites, and custom Facebook timeline designs.
 
Anything above and beyond the amount mentioned will go to building a much needed professional website for my wife.
 
Anything less then our goal would go to a down payment on a Macbook Pro and then we would attempt to get financing on it to pay the rest over time.
 

The Impact

I believe in having the courage to follow one's dreams, and I beleive in my wife, as a designer, a photographer, and as an amazingly caring human being. By contributing to this, my wife will be able to at least have a shot at her entrepreneurial dreams, and her dreams won't be crushed by the lack of a working computer.Not only will this money help her with her design and animal photography business, but it will allow her to continue her work with the animal shelter, BARC, here in Bali.

At BARC, she does photo shoots with the animals to improve their adoption rates,and she helps them shoot animal photos for their new fundraising campaigns. By contributing to this cause, my wife will be able to continue the work with animals she feels so passionately about.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that not everyone is in a position to contribute monetarily at this time, but if you believe in my cause and would like to suppport my wife's small business you can:

 1.    Leave a Happy Birthday message in the comments section of this campaign and show your love that way.

2.     Tell your friends about the campaign and her site http://www.etsy.com/shop/thepaperpegasus

3.     Spread the word about the Paper Pegasus and if you know anyone who needs custom design work, photo editing, or photography services please tell them to contact her shaynapitch4@gmail.com. Just don't mention this campaign, we don't want to ruin the surprise.

4.  “Like” her Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/ThePaperPegasus

story:
"HOT KIMONO"

The "HOT KIMONO Digital Photo Book (App)" and a Printed "2014 Kimono Calendar" mailed to YOU from Japan! … but you can get all kinds of amazing “Only-From-Japan” items! But First!...
=======================================================

 

The What & How of “Hot Kimono” Photo Style?
We decided to use a projector and computer graphics on a Kimono model. The patterns of the Kimono and Lights seemed to merge and flow together and ....."Hot Kimono" was born!

 

One Day, we suddenly lost our sponsor - and have struggled to make everything ourself. We just need the money so we can hire an app designer, and pay for calendar printing.

Support the project, and get amazing perks! (See below) ======================================================

What We Need & What You Get


COSTS

1/. Production: Photo Editing/Lay-Out: $400

2/. App Production Total**: $2100

**Includes:
Android App: $300
iPhone App: $300
iPad App: $300
PC App: $300
Mac App: $300
Web-site: $300
Mobile-Web (BlackBerry/Windows Mobile,etc): $300

3/. 2014 Full Color Calendar Printing: $1000
=======================================================

Production, App and Calendar Production TOTAL: $3500


 

WHAT YOU GET:
By Pre-Ordering the HOT KIMONO app and Calendarand get amazing perks - See below for just a few of the Perks!

$5 Pledge
APP & THANKS

Get the Digital Version of the Photo book - The Hot Kimono (Deluxe) App*** with Your name in the Thanks on the app and the Web-Site!

***(App - on any platform:Android, iPad, iPhone, Mobile Web [Blackberry, Windows Phone, etc], PC, Mac or Web-Site) =======================================================

$15 Pledge

APP, THANKS, & BEHIND THE SLIDING DOORS!

Get the App, Credit and Behind the Scenes!

Get the Deluxe App*** (Digital Version) of HOT KIMONO, PLUS GO Behind the Sliding Doors and access the exclusive online Video: "The Making of Hot Kimono (Behind the Sliding Doors)". . . from Photos, to Contracts with Models, to Lighting Techniques Used including the "HOT KIMONO" lighting style and software references reveal! Get all the insight into how HOT KIMONO was made, from beginning to end!

=======================================================

$20 Pledge

CALENDAR & APP

Get the Full Color Printed Calendar and the Deluxe App*** with Your name in the "Thanks" on the app and Web-Site!

 

(Or Gift this to someone - and you or they get a name in the "Thanks to"!)

(Orders outside of Japan add $15 shipping charge.)

=======================================================

$30 Pledge

BONUS PHOTO, CALENDAR & APP

Get your Choice of one of three 8 x 10 Pledge Photos, signed by Kris (inventor of the "HOT KIMONO" photo Style).

Plus the printed Kimono Calendar mailed from Japan, Deluxe App*** (with Your name in the "Thanks")

 

(Or Gift this to someone - and you or they get a name in the "Thanks to"!)

(Orders outside of Japan add $15 shipping charge.)

=======================================================

$40 Pledge

KIMONO BOOKMARK & PHOTO PLUS PACKAGE

Receive a Piece of authentic Kimono material which you can use as a "Kimono Bookmark", plus get your Choice of one of three 8 x 10 Pledge Photos, and get the printed Kimono Calendar mailed from Japan, "The Making of Hot Kimono (Behind the Sliding Doors)" online video access, and The Deluxe App with your name in the "Contributors"

 

(Orders outside of Japan add $15 shipping charge.)

=======================================================

$50 Pledge

GEISHA PACKAGE!

Get 5 packages of Geisha Sweets! Traditional Japanese candies, cookies, and other treats!

Plus, Receive a Piece of authentic Kimono material which you can use as a "Kimono Bookmark", plus get your Choice of one of three 8 x 10 Pledge Photos, and get the printed Kimono Calendar mailed from Japan, "The Making of Hot Kimono (Behind the Sliding Doors)" online video access, and The Deluxe App with your name in the "Contributors"

(Orders outside of Japan add $15 shipping charge)

=======================================================

$50 Pledge

SAMURAI PACKAGE!

Get 5 packages of "Samurai Snacks!" (traditional salty snacks), plus, Receive a Piece of authentic Kimono material which you can use as a "Kimono Bookmark", plus get your Choice of one of three 8 x 10 Pledge Photos, and get the printed Kimono Calendar mailed from Japan, "The Making of Hot Kimono (Behind the Sliding Doors)" online video access, and The Deluxe App with your name in the "Contributors" 

 

(Orders outside of Japan add $15 shipping charge.)

 

[Duty may apply, check your countries Duty/Taxes yourself when ordering])

 

=======================================================

$100 Pledge

WARRIOR PACK!

Get 5 Geisha Sweets plus 5 Samurai Snacks (salty), plus, an 'Emperors Fan' (traditional asian style fan), plus Receive a Piece of authentic Kimono material which you can use as a "Kimono Bookmark", plus get your Choice of one of three 8 x 10 Pledge Photos, and get the printed Kimono Calendar mailed from Japan, "The Making of Hot Kimono (Behind the Sliding Doors)" online video access, and The Deluxe App with your name in the "SILVER SPONSORS"

 

(Orders outside of Japan add $20)

=======================================================

$100 Pledge

NINJA WARRIOR PACK!

Receive a T-Shirt with your choice of photo printed on it, plus an 'Emperors Fan' (traditional asian style fan), a Piece of authentic Kimono material which you can use (or gift) as a "Kimono Bookmark", plus get your Choice of one of three 8 x 10 Photos, and get the printed Kimono Calendar mailed from Japan, "The Making of Hot Kimono" online video access, and The Deluxe App with your name in the "SILVER SPONSORS"

(Orders outside of Japan add $20 shipping charge)

=======================================================

$250 Pledge

TOKYO TOUR - MEGA PACK!

Get all the items from both SPONSOR Packages, plus a fun, custom hello video from Kris in Japan - holding up white board with "Thank-You" + plus your name on it in 7 cool places in Tokyo!

Plus:

+ 2 Kimono Calendars

+ 1 Deluxe App (on any platform!)

+ 1 HK T-Shirt

+ 1 'Emperors Fan'

+ 1 '8x10' Photos

+ 5 Geisha Sweets

+ 5 Samurai Snacks

+ "The Making of Hot Kimono" online video, and

+ YOUR NAME in The Deluxe App as "GOLD SPONSOR"

(Orders outside Japan +$25 shipping charge)

=======================================================

$400 Pledge

DATE WITH A KIMONO MODEL!

It's a Date - With a Kimono Model! We'll co-ordinate with you a (25 minute) Skype Video Date. Either an English speaking Model -or- a Japanese speaking model with a translator present.

Plus:

+ 2 Kimono Calendars

+ 1 Deluxe App (on any platform!)

+ 1 HK T-Shirt

+ 1 'Emperors Fan'

+ 1 '8x10' Photos

+ 5 Geisha Sweets

+ 5 Samurai Snacks

+ "The Making of Hot Kimono (Behind the Sliding Doors)" online video, and

+ YOUR NAME in The Deluxe App as "GOLD SHOGUN SPONSORS"

(Orders outside Japan +$25 shipping charge)

=======================================================

...and more - check the official PERKS list on the Indie Go Go Campaign Page (to the right) !

 

=======================================================

About Reaching Our Goal:

If we don’t reach our goal - then I'll do one-off's of the Calendar and try to make the apps slowly, step by step, which will take forever!

 

==================================

After this?

Please note - this is the first part of a series of photos, videos, interviews, music, and art, I'd like to share with you, that's very unique and original - from Tokyo, Japan!!

If this Campaign is a success, then we can release even MORE photo books and calendars of things like: DJ SiSeN, Cosplay UnderGround Raves, Robots and much much more!

=======================================================

Order Today! - for a Friend or Yourself - the first part of this massive collection of cool Tokyo photos and videos: HOT KIMONO !

story:
Let's Get to Know Each Other

My name is Lad Ferian and I am the founder and CEO of DF Consumer Products, Inc.  We are a privately-owned consumer products company located in Berea, OH - just west of Cleveland.  We have been in business since 2006 and have manufactured household cleaning products under private label for niche retailers around the World.  Until recently, 90% of our products have been exported to retail customers throughout Europe, Asia, Australia and South America. Our newest product, Mobile Clean & Go, is our first foray into building our own consumer brand (with a really great product).  I need your immediate help in funding new packaging for Mobile Clean & Go so that we can proceed with our retail launch and grow our company.

What Is Mobile Clean & Go?  Take a look at your cell phone or tablet right now.  Do you see all of those fingerprints, smudges, dirt and grime?  Gross, right?  Mobile Clean & Go is a product with a mission -- it eliminates germs, fingerprints, smudges and cosmetics from electronic screens; keeping you and your family healthier.

Product Applications

  • TV Screens
  • Laptops
  • Mobile Phones
  • Tablets
  • MP3 Music Players
  • GPS Touch Screens
  • Automotive Touch Screens
  • Marine Gauges and Electronics

What is unique about Mobile Clean & Go?  For starters, the entire kit is smaller than your mobile phone so you can easily take it with you and use it.  Who wants to carry around large bulky cloths and huge bottles of cleaning liquid?  We offer a unique Flat spray bottle that is about the same footprint as a credit card.  Plus, we offer a dual-sided microfiber cloth utilizing our exclusive dual-hybrid technology.  It is two cleaning surfaces in one, offering quick cleaning action and precision polishing in one conveniently sized cloth. Mobile Clean & Go is slim, trim and TSA Approved for Air Travel.  Slip it in your pocket, purse or glove box so that it's always within reach keeping your screen crystal clear and sparkling clean.  

  • Eliminates over 99% of germs on mobile phone and tablet screens
  • TSA Approved for Air Travel
  • Slim, flat spray bottle delivers over 250 sprays of safe cleaning liquid
  • Cleaning formulation is pH neutral and independently verified to be safe on electronic screens, anti-glare and anti-smudge coatings
  • Dual-Hybrid Microfiber Technology offers two cleaning surfaces in one cloth
  • So easy to use, it takes only 10 seconds to be germ free - check out this video.



Cell Phone Germs -- Seriously?


Mobile Clean & Go Eliminates 99% of Germs on Your Cell Phone

Before Cleaning                                                 After Cleaning with Mobile Clean & Go

We put our product to the test.  An independent laboratory swabbed three random cell phones.  The phones were then cleaned with Mobile Clean & Go using the procedure that we outline on our product package.  The three phones were swabbed again.  All of the cultures were incubated for 24-hours.  The left side of this photo shows the germs collected from the cell phones before cleaning. The right side of this photo shows the germs collected after cleaning.  Testing showed a reduction in bacterial colonies of over 99% after cleaning with Mobile Clean & Go.



Mobile Clean & Go will eliminate those germy finger prints....or paw prints!


It Sounds Like a Great Product.  What is Missing?

Mobile Clean & Go is a great product.  It is Made in the USA.  It is safe on all electronic displays.  It effectively reduces germs by up to 99% on a phone surface.  It removes fingerprints, cosmetics, smudges, dirt and grime from electronic screens.  It is so compact, you don't even realize that it is in your pocket.  It's wonderful.  So, what is missing?  Packaging.  The current packaging does not do a great job of telling the World how incredibly wonderful Mobile Clean & Go really is.  We need a face lift.


We Need Your Help and We Will Reward You

Mobile Clean & Go was launched online in May of 2013 and we have gotten a great response from the media and more importantly our online customers.  We have a great product and now it is time to introduce our product to retailers around the country.

Now we are Dressing for Success - We need a new fresh look, through packaging that jumps off the store shelf, in order to start our retail initiative in the United States. This is where you come in.  The money that we raise through our first Indiegogo campaign will be used to create new packaging for Mobile Clean & Go - A bright, vibrant look that will attract consumers to this innovative new product.

We will reward you for your participation by offering product perks.  These perks represent HUGE discounts off of the published retail pricing available through our online store and other online retailers.  After you choose a sponsorship package, you will immediately receive product in our existing packaging.  Our larger sponsorship perk packages $30+ all include Mega Value Packs in our NEW PACKAGING.  It will take a little longer for us to ship those items to you because the packaging will be manufactured after our Indiegogo campaign ends, using the sponsorship funds that you contributed. Never fear - you will receive the existing packaged product right away and we will keep you updated as to when you will receive the newly packaged portion of your Perk.  We anticipate that the NEW PACKAGING will be available in early June.

With your help and sponsorship, the existing product packaging shown above will be given new life with a fun, vibrant character that will be sure to jump off the store shelf. 


The Impact of Your Sponsorship

Everyone is aware of the challenges faced by small businesses in this difficult economic climate. We are proud that we have survived over 8 years in the most challenging economy since the Great Depression.  Not only have we survived, we have attempted to put a small dent in the trade deficit by actually exporting American-Made goods all over the World to destinations including China, Korea and other portions of Asia.

As Americans, we all need to do our part to support locally made goods and build jobs right here in America.  All of the products at DF Consumer Products, Inc are manufactured and assembled right here in Berea, OH and our workers live within 10 miles of our facility.  We are creating jobs here in Cleveland.

Your sponsorship and support will allow us to invest in new packaging and jump start our retail initiative.  Any growing business needs ongoing financial support and we are excited about our growth potential.  Your sponsorship funds will be directly used to invest in new packaging for our product line and you will be a direct part of our success as we launch our retail distribution program. We appreciate your support and thank you for considering us for sponsorship. 

Mobile Clean & Go marketing associate, Samantha, at the 2014 Cleveland Mid-America Boat Show.

Help Us Grow our Social Media Presence

If you can't contribute to our "Dress for Success Campaign" at this time, that is OK and you can still help us.  Please Like Us on Facebook and Follow Us on Twitter. Tell your friends about Mobile Clean & Go and help us to build our social media following.  You can also Subscribe to our email list.  We'll send you a monthly newsletter updating you on our progress.  The newsletter will also contain a valuable coupon code each month that can be redeemed at our web store. Subscribe to our Newsletter Here.
story_txt:
Let's Get to Know Each OtherMy name is Lad Ferian and I am the founder and CEO of DF Consumer Products, Inc.  We are a privately-owned consumer products company located in Berea, OH - just west of Cleveland.  We have been in business since 2006 and have manufactured household cleaning products under private label for niche retailers around the World.  Until recently, 90% of our products have been exported to retail customers throughout Europe, Asia, Australia and South America. Our newest product, Mobile Clean & Go, is our first foray into building our own consumer brand (with a really great product).  I need your immediate help in funding new packaging for Mobile Clean & Go so that we can proceed with our retail launch and grow our company.What Is Mobile Clean & Go?  Take a look at your cell phone or tablet right now.  Do you see all of those fingerprints, smudges, dirt and grime?  Gross, right?  Mobile Clean & Go is a product with a mission -- it eliminates germs, fingerprints, smudges and cosmetics from electronic screens; keeping you and your family healthier.Product Applications
TV Screens
Laptops
Mobile Phones
Tablets
MP3 Music Players
GPS Touch Screens
Automotive Touch Screens
Marine Gauges and Electronics
What is unique about Mobile Clean & Go?  For starters, the entire kit is smaller than your mobile phone so you can easily take it with you and use it.  Who wants to carry around large bulky cloths and huge bottles of cleaning liquid?  We offer a unique Flat spray bottle that is about the same footprint as a credit card.  Plus, we offer a dual-sided microfiber cloth utilizing our exclusive dual-hybrid technology.  It is two cleaning surfaces in one, offering quick cleaning action and precision polishing in one conveniently sized cloth. Mobile Clean & Go is slim, trim and TSA Approved for Air Travel.  Slip it in your pocket, purse or glove box so that it's always within reach keeping your screen crystal clear and sparkling clean.  
Eliminates over 99% of germs on mobile phone and tablet screens
TSA Approved for Air Travel
Slim, flat spray bottle delivers over 250 sprays of safe cleaning liquid
Cleaning formulation is pH neutral and independently verified to be safe on electronic screens, anti-glare and anti-smudge coatings
Dual-Hybrid Microfiber Technology offers two cleaning surfaces in one cloth

So easy to use, it takes only 10 seconds to be germ free - check out this video.

Cell Phone Germs -- Seriously?Mobile Clean & Go Eliminates 99% of Germs on Your Cell PhoneBefore Cleaning                                                 After Cleaning with Mobile Clean & GoWe put our product to the test.  An independent laboratory swabbed three random cell phones.  The phones were then cleaned with Mobile Clean & Go using the procedure that we outline on our product package.  The three phones were swabbed again.  All of the cultures were incubated for 24-hours.  The left side of this photo shows the germs collected from the cell phones before cleaning. The right side of this photo shows the germs collected after cleaning.  Testing showed a reduction in bacterial colonies of over 99% after cleaning with Mobile Clean & Go.Mobile Clean & Go will eliminate those germy finger prints....or paw prints!It Sounds Like a Great Product.  What is Missing?Mobile Clean & Go is a great product.  It is Made in the USA.  It is safe on all electronic displays.  It effectively reduces germs by up to 99% on a phone surface.  It removes fingerprints, cosmetics, smudges, dirt and grime from electronic screens.  It is so compact, you don't even realize that it is in your pocket.  It's wonderful.  So, what is missing?  Packaging.  The current packaging does not do a great job of telling the World how incredibly wonderful Mobile Clean & Go really is.  We need a face lift.We Need Your Help and We Will Reward YouMobile Clean & Go was launched online in May of 2013 and we have gotten a great response from the media and more importantly our online customers.  We have a great product and now it is time to introduce our product to retailers around the country.Now we are Dressing for Success - We need a new fresh look, through packaging that jumps off the store shelf, in order to start our retail initiative in the United States.
