story:
Electronics since 1979

reads in my resume. I did design computers using CAD tools on a workstation I had soldered together from integrated circuits obtained from the black market. When my 11 years old son asked me: "Dad, can we make a computer?" I realized that it has been maybe over 20 years since I designed and made a computer.

Why? What excuses can I possible have to not build a computer with my son, for him and other children and all of us who want to discover things and do something exciting?

Because electronics and computers are not exciting anymore? This is not true.

Because nobody understands electronics and computers? This can be changed.

Because? No, there is no excuse.

I must do it!

This was the birth of DADSON-1

But what if I not only design one computer but write a book about how it was done?

So I started to write the book and started to design a computer - from scratch using the latest and greatest technologies available today. I am writing down the process of making the computer, the design choices and design methods. From the idea to working prototype all steps will be described.

What We Need & What You Get

I am launching the campaign for one reason - to pay for the prototype production costs in a way that makes me eager to finish the book and make it available to all readers in the world.

To be honest, I could use "household" budget or funding from single commercial investor, in both those cases my interest to "share" the design process in final book form would be small. But if the funding comes from the crowd - I would feel delighted to share it. To show that designing and building computers is possible to everyone even more today than it was twenty years ago.

If the funding goal is not reached, I will still finish the book and most likely also be able to build the prototypes. With less funding it will just take more time.

The Impact

I sincerely hope that there will be some kid around the globe who takes the book and says to his dad: look we can build a computer if we want, see read here..

Look they did it, they really did, why cant we? 

And if there will be at least one new computer DESIGNED by someone somewhere then I think its already a very good achievement.

What is most exciting, designing computers is possible with zero investment, you can do it all using free tools, you just have to know it is possible.

Today my son is dreaming of "surprising NASA" he twiddles around with some ideas how to build "micro rockets" that would be able to take small loads to the orbit. I think his current concept is a model airplane that uses atmosphere thermal flow to get as much altitude as possible with least fuel used. This airplane carries an "shuttle" like second stage. I think the second stage uses solid fuel acceleration at first then continues with main engine.

I have made model rockets as a kid, we did it all from scratch including the engines. The guy who was leading the model rocket club in the house of young technicians was only 20 years old. The most what he valued was "decision courage", or at least that is what I remember.

In my hometown there is a modern monument made from stone and steel tubes at the seashore road. The steel tubes are a visualization of the ropes from the parachute at landing. In the stone it reads: "To whom with courage and will to act". At the opening ceremony there was an accident with small sports airplane. The pilot was my dad. I have met only once in my life. I am glad of that because 1 is more than 0.

Impact?

I do not know if there will be ever successful space ready micro-rockets ever made, but if I compare the computers I did build as a kid, to DADSON-1 computer then the difference is enormous. I would say its almost as much as an model rocket to the first space rockets.

We can not imagine what our children are capable to design when they grow up. But whatever technical things they invent, they have to know the basics of computers. The 0's and 1's - the language the computers speak as native tongue.

There is no better way to learn computers as by designing them.

At this point of enhancing the campaign I collected all my courage and pushed the "go live" button...

story:
Hi Everybody!

My name is Gábor Hermann.

The device :


Let's talk about the shifter a bit.
Why is this good or better than the others?
- It's made of 39 metal pieces.
- It has a few hundreds of bolts in it.
- So it can easily be fixed, repaired even at home.
- Every parts of it is changeable. It does not contain glued, welded pieces.

It sounds good, doesn't it?

Moreover the feeling of shifting is the best as possible.
Little castors are rapped around the gear stick so you can feel it perfectly when you put it in gear.
-Dimensions 105mm x 280mm x 165mm Weight: 1350g
-Driver is not required, plug it in USB port 2.0/3.0 and it works.


-It works with almost all the operating systems. 
 (Tested with 32/64bit Microsoft Windows OS) 
-It has 6 speeds and a reverse.


 (I don't know any cars with manual shifter in it that has more speeds but if any exists it must me very  rare.)
-The knob is duroplast ball (d=45mm) It can be taken off any time and changed into an conversial shifter knobs for cars.


-It works with every known Simulator Software, and it was tested with them.
(Assetto Corsa, Project Cars, IRacing, Raceroom, rFactor, Dirt Rally, etc...)

How to set it?
- Turn on the automatic natural speed ()
- Set the 7 gears in game.
- And Play! :)

Negative facts:

I checked the prototypes and I found some negative facts about them. 
-  IT'S LOUD!
This is a fact. It's loud because the parts are made of metal. Only testers said this is a negative thing, to me it's not very because I like to hear when I switch. DTM's or  Rally's  shifters have sounds too.
- In natural it's kind of loose. I will change this soon, because it really wobbles.
- The fixing is not that pretty, but it's very strong. It has 2 steel retainers, these are unbreakable. The shifter is chargeable, it can even take the excessive force also.
- The fitting of the covers is not exact. This is only an inaccuracy on the prototypes. After it they are made of a curved plate and the top and bottom edges are made of one piece of molded plastic.

Perks Details:

People who support me with a 100 or 115€ or more will get a H's P Standard or H'sP Modding H-shifter.


Who support me with less, I'll add their name to my website which is under preparation.

What happens if I won't have that much money:

If I don't achieve my goal I will not be disappointed, I'll still send the perks to each and everyone of you. To me there will be only a few hurdles and obstacles if I can't reach enough money, I'll reach my goals later, and I'll have to buy things one at a time.

Hurdles:

My biggest problem is the manufacturing because I don't have capacity for buying the parts of it. This is why I have to wait until the campaign's end. 
The campaign takes 10 days, + until I get the funds is 15, + 3-4 weeks to get materials, + around 1 month for manufacturing, + shipping time.

Some things about me:

I built enormous iron manual shifter two and a half years ago.
This year I got to a point where I could start to perfect it, I bought some metal industrial machines and I built a new aluminium prototype. Which turned out so great that I left university for it. I saw my future in this project.
A lot of website found and interviewed me. They also tested the shifter. Everyone encouraged be to deal with this, and only this.

How it started:

I started from bottom, I got to this point with the help of friends and family and student loan.
Not every circumstance is given yet, for me to only deal with this and to improve more simulator parts.
Plans are already set. (pedals, hand break, sequential shifter)


Why now:

I have already been perfecting the aluminium shifter for five months.
Now it is ready to be brought to global market.
Why does it cost this much and where does this money go:
20,000€ would be enough for a lot of shifter's completion. (200 pieces)
From the left over money I could build the prototypes of the parts written above.

What I achieved by now:

Not long ago I started a crowdfunding in Hungary. Then there only were plans of the prototypes, there were no machine that I could have worked with . In Hungary this kind of support or funding is not really know so I did not have a lot of success with it.
After the prototype was finished I got 26 pre-orders for more, I finished half of that by this time. I built this myself without machines or without any company's help.
Since then I contacted turners, molders and laser cutters and now they help me with everything.



FAQ:

Q.: How do we know where the project is ?
- Just as before on my facebook page I give all information about the exact situation at the time. Even about what I'm buying that week, things like that.

Q.: Why is it inexpensive ? Other shifters are more expensive ?
- To me it was important and major for the shifter to be given for a good, available price. At the beginning the cost of the parts were 75 Euro-t, I already decreased this. Moreover only because I do this by myself I'm satisfied with a smaller profit. Besides this it's only the introductory price because soon I'll have employees and I want to give them an acceptable salary. So the price of the shifter will increase 50-70%.

Q.: How much duty is there ?
- I don't have a lot of information about this because it's different on every country. Inside the EU, there is no duty. Although outside the EU there is duty, I would ask everyone to check how much the duty is in their country and share it.

Q.: Does it work with every game ?
- Those which support separated shifter, those games can work with it. Specifically where you can set all the speeds.

Q.: If I don't have a clutch pedal can I still use the shifter ?
- Yes but it's better if you have a clutch.  Because for ex.: Assetto Corsa is not very indulgent, without it shifting is a bit complicated but not impossible.

Q.: Does it only work with a computer or it works with a console too?
- The shifter only works with a computer.

Q.: How long is the USB cable?
-1,8m long.

Q.: If it falls off the table/desk can it break?
- Once I threw down the prototype from the 5. floor and nothing happened to it. So most likely there will be nothing wrong with it.

Q.: If I accidentally pour water in it what should you do ?
-In this case I'll send the back plate to you. Which has all the electronics on its back  (The change of this is 5 Euro)

Q.: What happens if I don't like the shifter and I want to send it back ?
- I can't buy it back because I gave it as a gift for the funds, for the support in exchange.

Q.: Do the LED's always light or you can turn it off?
- There is a switch for this on the back.

Q.: Is the shifter dangerous ? Do I recommend it for kids/children?
- I consider the shifter dangerous, it has small moving parts so you should be careful with it. DO NOT LET CHILDREN OR KIDS USE IT WITHOUT THE PRESENCE OF AN ADULT
It's rather made for teens or adults than kids!
IMPORTANT, this is a metal device , it's not dangerous by normal use, but it's recommended to store it safely. (take it off the desk after us).
You should also be careful with the temperature. You shouldn't keep the shifter in a place where the temperature is boiling or frosty.

Q.: Can I disassemble it ?
- Yes, you can because it's a homemade device but I can't take responsibility if you don't put it together correctly. Every part has it's own place. The changing of these could even ruin the shifter.

Q.: After a lot of use can it wear out ?
- Sometimes it's useful to daub the parts where the moving parts are at. It's going to take a long time for the shifter to wear out but after a while it can get stuck but in that case you just have to grease it.

Q.: So you have to maintain it like a car ?
- The secret of the longevity is the maintaining. You should keep it clean.

Q.: Can I get an electrocution while I take the shifter apart when it's plugged in ?
- No because it only works with 5V, but still pay attention to not touch the inside of it and don't take it apart under power.

If you have any more questions, just write me and I will answer in a few days !

Thank you for checking out my page !

If you guys have time please share it in every website, that deals with this or focuses on this!

Thanks, Gábor (Herry)


http://www.dutycalculator.com/hs-code-duty-rate...

Q.: Does it work with every game ?
- Those which support separated shifter, those games can work with it.
Specifically where you can set all the speeds.
Q.: If I don't have a clutch pedal can I still use the
shifter ?
- Yes but it's better if you have a clutch. 
Because for ex.: Assetto Corsa is not very indulgent, without it
shifting is a bit complicated but not impossible.
Q.: Does it only work with a computer or it works with a
console too?
- The shifter only works with a computer.
Q.: How long is the USB cable?
-1,8m long.
Q.: If it falls off the table/desk can it break?
- Once I threw down the prototype from the 5. floor and nothing happened to it.
So most likely there will be nothing wrong with it.
Q.: If I accidentally pour water in it what should you do ?
-In this case I'll send the back plate to you. Which has all the electronics on
its back  (The change of this is 5 Euro)
Q.: What happens if I don't like the shifter and I want to
send it back ?
- I can't buy it back because I gave it as a gift for the funds, for the
support in exchange.
Q.: Do the LED's always light or you can turn it off?
- There is a switch for this on the back.
Q.: Is the shifter dangerous ? Do I recommend it for
kids/children?
- I consider the shifter dangerous, it has small moving parts so you should be
careful with it. DO NOT LET CHILDREN OR KIDS USE IT WITHOUT THE PRESENCE OF AN
ADULT
It's rather made for teens or adults than kids!
IMPORTANT, this is a metal device , it's not dangerous by normal use, but it's recommended to store it safely. (take it off the desk after us).
You should also be careful with the temperature. You shouldn't keep the shifter
in a place where the temperature is boiling or frosty. 
Q.: Can I disassemble it ?
- Yes, you can because it's a homemade device but I can't take responsibility
if you don't put it together correctly. Every part has it's own place. The
changing of these could even ruin the shifter.
Q.: After a lot of use can it wear out ?
- Sometimes it's useful to daub the parts where the moving parts are at. It's
going to take a long time for the shifter to wear out but after a while it can
get stuck but in that case you just have to grease it.
Q.: So you have to maintain it like a car ?
- The secret of the longevity is the maintaining. You should keep it clean.
Q.: Can I get an electrocution while I take the shifter
apart when it's plugged in ?
- No because it only works with 5V, but still pay attention to not touch
the inside of it and don't take it apart under power.
If you have any more questions, just write me and I will
answer in a few days !
Thank you for checking out my page !
If you guys have time please share it in every website, that
deals with this or focuses on this!
Thanks, Gábor (Herry)http://www.dutycalculator.com/hs-code-duty-rate...

story:
Have you ever dropped your phone while rummaging through your bag to get your keys?

Have you ever dropped your phone when you get out of your car because your phone was on your lap?  

Have you ever dropped your phone simply because it slipped right through your fingers?

We have all been there!

 

So who are we?

We are a small company from St Paul, Minnesota filled with average Joes and everyday Janes. We have used various phone cases - thick, protective ones to the slimmest basic silicone cases you can find in the market. Yet, we have gone through cracked phone screens, spending an additional couple hundred of dollars just to get the screen fixed (or some of us will just leave it and use with cracked phone screen). But we want to do that no more!

 

Inspired by the lives of many adults and parents out there, we came up with the idea of a phone case that solves our everyday need; a protective case with multiple functions all jam-packed into one single stylish design. No more bulky wallets, exposed credit cards, or another accessory just for a kickstand. Introducing Vena vCommute.

Featured In:

story:
All-New DASUNG Paperlike E-ink Monitor — Now with Touchscreen and Front-light

 

 

Why we all need a Paper-like E-ink Monitor

         

■ Do your eyes hurt when you look at a computer screen?  
■ Do you have children or elderly relatives who are sensitive to the glare?      
■ Are you an office worker who stares at a computer 10 hours a day?

 

In the information age, we look at our computers and smartphones for more than 12 hours a day. The LCD displays greatly impact our eyes and overall health. Bright light and screen flash can cause dry eyes, inflammation, nearsightedness, dizziness and headache, which is called Computer Vision Syndrome. We urgently need a paper-like monitor to save our eyes.

DASUNG’s E-ink monitor has retina display, high contrast, fine quality, no flashing and no glare. It’s the perfect eye-saver.

Unlike emissive display like LCD where backlight is projected toward your eyes, E-ink display reflects ambient light from the environment. Therefore, E-ink feels much like real ink and paper eliminating eyestrain and glare.

 

 

We are DASUNG

The Inventor of E-ink Monitor

DASUNG is an innovative group founded in March 2014 by science fiction writer Dong Gong, Dr. Ray Chen, and Hiro Gong. Our team members come from China Aerospace Corporation, Chinese Academy of Sciences, MIT, Belarusian State University, and other top academies.

In the last 5 years, DASUNG has developed and launched multiple generations of Paperlike E-ink Monitor that users in 70 countries can’t live without. And we never stop innovating!

  • Paperlike, the World's First E-ink Monitor invented by DASUNG, 2014.
  • Paperlike Pro, the World's First E-ink Monitor with HDMI, developed by DASUNG, 2017.
  • Paperlike 3, High resolution of E-ink monitor, 2017.
  • Paperlike Pro-FT & Paperlike HD-FT, the World's First E-ink Montior with Front-light & Touchscreen, 2019.  It's pre-order on Indiegogo now.

 

 

13.3” Large E-ink Display

Maximum 2K High-Definition

 

 

Powerful

Fast Speed & Minimal Delay

New Paperlike E-ink monitor is equipped with DASUNG Turbo 2019, our latest high-speed refresh technology.

We have invested vigorously in redesigning video-stream signal processing, storage scheduling, and E-ink drive. We are proud to say the new Paperlike Pro Touch outperforms all other E-ink monitors in response rate.

You can do so much more with the new Paperlike Pro Touch, web browsing, typing, coding, reading, seamlessly playing videos… It is as fast as LCD screen.

 

 

Front-light

The World's First Large Size E-ink Device with Front-light

For the first time, we applied front light to large-size E-ink device. Our frontlit E-ink monitors support white light & warm light modes and adjustable brightness for all-day use.

 

 

Touchscreen

The World's First E-ink Monitor with Touchscreen

Paperlike Pro-FT and Paperlike HD-FT are featured with capacitive touch screen. Use your fingers for more precise and easier operation just like an ultra-fast large tablet.

* Touchscreen only supports Windows and Linux systems (Mac, iOS does not support touchscreen)

* Paperlike Pro-F and Paperlike HD-F are two upgraded models with frontlight but without touchscreen.

 

Universal

Compatible with Most Devices

Paperlike E-ink monitor can connect with any device that outputs video contents via HDMI, such as iPhone, iPad, HUAWEI P30, etc.

 

 

Smartest

Multi-dimensional Optimization of E-ink

DASUNG is committed to optimizing the quality of E-ink for more than four years. Paying attention to every detail. Respecting each of our users. Through the cross adjustment of the three dimensions of “grayscale”, “ink drop blackness” and “contrast”, the speed and image quality can be optimized, which can meet your different needs in office, entertainment and learning to protect your eyes well.

 

Versatile

Mirror Display or Extend Display

Vertically or Horizontally

We have professional E-ink monitor with HDMI connection. It can display horizontally or vertically and mirror or extend the content on your primary computer screen.

 

 

Paperlike Series of E-ink Monitor

 

Spec

story:
Ultra-tough cables support fast charging and data transmission. Lauco™ comes with 2 different types: USB-C to USB-C, USB-C to Lightning cables. These two types of super cables are designed for your devices, supporting fast charging and data transmission into the next level.

 

 

Teteu Tutors - Impressive! THESE USB CABLES ARE VERY RESISTANT!

 

 

Lauco™ USB-C to USB-C & USB-C to Lightning cables are designed for different types of devices, providing slim and safety connection:

  •  USB-C to Lightning cable: For all iPhones, iPad, and AirPods.
     
  •  USB-C to USB-C cable: For New version of MacBook, Android phones, and iPad Pro.

 

 

LEATHER CABLE TIE

Printed with Lauco™ logo, this cable tie was designed with imported leather, which gets your cables away from tangled up. With this tie, you can package your cable in two different ways:

 

NON-SLIP DESIGN

Lauco™ cable uses ergonomic design (finger print) to make it non-slip. Make it easy to plug and unplug.

 

 

Fast charging and data transmission, durable design, all feature the most user-friendly user experience.

 

FAST POWER DELIVERY

Lauco™ cable supports power delivery up to 100W, providing fast charging for your MacBook Pro.

 

4K DISPLAY

Lauco USB-C to USB-C cable supports 4K@ 60Hz display, providing the smooth connection between your devices and screen

 

SUPER DATA TRANSMISSION

Embedded with the industry-leading solution- USB 3.1 Gen 2 tech, Lauco™ USB-C cable enable fast data transmission up to 10 Gbps, it's 20x faster than USB 2.0.

 

 

This cable features the most compatible and durable cable for your Apple appliances.

 

 

WHAT IS APPLE MFi CERTIFIED?

 

MFi Certified is short for ‘made for iPhone/iPad/iPod’ Certified, which is the official certification from Apple. Accessories like Lauco™ cables that own MFi certification will not damage your Apple devices or cause any danger such as electric leakage. Lauco™ cables will be safe to use on all of your Apple iOS devices.

 

At the heart of this cable is C94 connector, which enables fast charging through this cable for your Apple devices. The new chip C94 also now enables fast charging through USB-C for select iPhones and iPads. Which is twice charging speed as 18W charger.

 

 

 

 

Due to the high performance of Kevlar® out braided material, Lauco™ cables feature the ultra-tough usage experience. The Kevlar® out braided is made of 400D bullet-proof fiber, it can bear high tension to pull a car and owns stunning heat resistance features, make it available after a long period of burning.

 

 

ULTRA-STRONG & DURABLE

Lauco cables can bear up to 500KG. With these cables, you can pull a car, lift a tire without even break it.

  • Pulling 2.5 tons of cars

  • lift a tire

 

HEAT RESISTANCE

 

ANTI-BENDING DESIGN

Lauco™ cable works reliably after 5,000 multi-directional flexes at the USB-C connectors.  

 

 

At the beginning of Lauco Technology Limited, we set Lifetime Warranty service policy to make sure that every customer could receive the good products to use them for years. This reminds us that every process and every component should be strictly tested before bringing products into markets.

We are confident in the quality of our cables, and we want all backers to have faith in us too. So we provide this Lifetime Warranty service to all of you, any broken caused by non-artificial factors, we will send you a new one. Once for all.

 

 

Lauco Technology Limited is a company promoting the concept of global environmental protection. All the packages for our products are 100% recyclable, reusable, degradable. Our team not only focus on good products, but we are also improving the way people who are trying to protect our environment. Lauco™ is undergoing innovative tech to reduce the damage to our plant. We could do better!

 

Lauco™ is the first cable that equips this environmental-friendly package with recyclable paper. We first designed this pull box, for well storing your cables in a unique way.

 

 

USB-C to USB-C (Compared) 

 

USB-C to Lightning (Compared) 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Who we are?

Lauco Technology Limited was founded by a team of passion and creativity. We are specialized in designing and manufacturing USB-C accessories. Mainly focus on Apple appliances, USB-C laptops, Tablets, Phones, and Display devices. We aim to be one of the worldwide hardware brands, to provide notable products, and customer services.

 

 

We currently design a different series of products to provide all-round service for our customers:

 

  •  Lauco cables – Super durable, powerful and fun cables(USB-C to USB-C 100W Cable / USB-C to Lightning Cable / Thunderbolt 3 Cable 40Gbps / USB-C to HDMI Cable / USB-C to HDMI Adapter / Magnetic USB-C Cables)
  •  Lauco Hubs – World smallest USB-C Hub with wireless charging (Coming soon)
  •  Lauco Power – High-powered GaN USB-C charger(Coming soon)
     

 

Why we do?

We strongly believe that technology should be developed to service people and easy our life. At Lauco, we come up with leading solutions and quality products over the industry, to provide convenience usage experience according to the fast-paced lifestyle in the whole society. Pursuing high efficiency and original design is the key to make our team unique. Every product is made of the quality material and stunning manufacturing process so that our customers could get better products and services.

 

Contact us

story:
We are scholars at IPS’s Gambold Preparatory Magnet High School and are members of the Robotics Team.  We are trying to raise money for our program.  Last year, we placed third at the VEX Robotics City Tournament and were invited to attend the national competition but did not have the funding to go.  We are a group of highly intelligent, driven students who are determined to be invited to Nationals again.  This time we will be prepared.  Donations help us fund not only transportation for competitions throughout the year but also the funds to build, repair and maintain our competitive and practice robots for this year and next.


What We Need & What You Get

Team Budget for 2 Robots

$1000 – Robot cost

$100 – VEX yearly robot registration

$125 – Approximate for robot spare parts and repairs costs

$250 – Team travel and competition costs 

$3200    ($1600 / robot )

$1600 Nationals Transportation costs and start up cash for next year

__$4800____  Team Fundraising Goal

    The Impact

    Donations not only fund this year's team but next year's as well.  Any donation directly contributes to the education and betterment of a team of highly motivated and intelligent public school kids.

    You could be supporting the next Bill Gates or NASA scientist through your donation as Gambold High School contains the best and brightest of all of IPS.  

    Last year the Gambold Robotics Team not only place third in the VEX Robotics City Tournament, but was also invited to Nationals.


      Risks & Challenges

      We do not have the funding that kids at private schools have access to.  Because Gambold High School is a public school, there is very little funding for this program.  We are dedicated to reaching our goal, not just through crowd funding but by running a Video Game Championship for the other students at Gambold, selling T-Shirts and hosting dine in nights at local restaurants.  

        Other Ways You Can Help

        Can't make a cash donation?  Please help us spread the word by inviting people who you think can donate to the Team.

story:
Ziro lets you design, build, and animate your robotic inventions, control them easily with the lift of a finger or a flick of the wrist. Made for robotics enthusiasts and creative newbies alike, Ziro is the perfect platform for bringing your 3D creations to life.





Upon receiving Ziro, you’ll have your creations brought to life within minutes. You can make your own hand-controlled toys - a fun trike with the starter kit or a really cool rover and a trike with the pro kit right out of the box.

    


Once you get the hang of making rover and trike with Ziro, you can expand your creative skills with a rich variety of pre-made toy kits from ZeroUI. You will be able to choose from toy kits made out of variety of materials such as plastic or cardboard etc. To get a taste of this, choose our Creator Bundle Perk to get pre-made cardboard kits to make humanoid robot and robotic dog.

       



Feeling more adventurous? Ziro is the perfect thing for you. Make your own designs or download them from our wide repository of designs at ZeroUI website and build your own 3D printed or cardboard cutouts right at home. You could even repurpose old toys to bring them to life. After all, Ziro is the perfect companion for those curious makers.

       



CHILDREN/STUDENTS
When making and playing with Ziro, students learn the fundamentals of robotics, engineering, physics, and design.

Education has become so hyper focused on results that it no longer cares about the process and the experience of learning. Students should be in a safe environment where they can make mistakes and learn.

We believe in the concept of failing forward, where failing should be seen as a part of success. Failures are opportunities for creative problem-solving, reflection, innovation, and growth.


MAKERS & TINKERERS
Ziro is a powerful tool for makers and tinkerers of all ages to quickly prototype their ideas. They can combine it with their custom 3D printed designs and program Ziro to experiment in robotics, home automation and other pet projects. The development kit would support Arduino and give makers full control and access to the power of the smart modules, each having a powerful microcontroller, motor and capable of hosting it’s own WiFi hotspot. With Ziro, making connected gizmos, smart robots, and other pet projects has never been easier.



Ziro is a robotics kit that let's you build robots that you can control using your hand. It's simple, fun, engaging and anyone can use it. 

Ziro is modular and untethered, made up of individual wireless motors that are controlled by a wireless connected smart glove. Ziro can be expanded to included up to 8 modules.



Get started using our pre-made kits or assemble your own personal designs. Ziro’s modular design enables free-form robotics construction, allowing you to build virtually anything. 

Ziro enables building robots using non-plastic and eco-friendly materials such as cardboard boxes. Put your Amazon boxes to good use!



ATTACH THE MOTOR MODULES

Motor Modules can be animated in a hinge or 360º rotational movement, adding versatile dynamic movement to your robot. These modules are wireless, so they can be placed anywhere you want!! Attach your modules to your designs and see your creations come to life. You can even use them with 3D printed designs, store-bought toys, or virtually anything that you want to bring to life.


CONFIGURE WITH ZIRO'S SMART PHONE APP

Use the smartphone app to configure the motor modules using the pre-made programming templates or input your own custom commands.

Use Ziro’s free smartphone app to pair hand gestures to the movement of each module. Once connected, your smart glove movements will animate the modules.

 

CONTROL WITH SMART GLOVE
Animate your robot using hand gestures synced to the smart gloves, no coding necessary. Control your creations wirelessly using the Ziro smart glove. Your hand gestures send commands to the modules so that when you move, they move.



Ziro's story begins in the fall of 2013, when we sat down and ideated on how to control physical objects with your hand gestures. This led to the idea of creating a hand controlled modular robotics kit. By early January 2014 we created the FDM prototypes. These were basic 3D printed prototypes that were a proof of concept. We created 8 of them. The electronics inside were all off the shelf components, which we hand soldered and packaged in big black box.


We wanted to explore more with the electronics so we 3D printed another set of modules and fitted with new electronics. We also improved our firmware which was now faster and efficient. Later we conducted studies among 150 users to evaluate the new kit. Thus by Jan 2015, we completed the development of our second batch of prototypes. We got them SLA printed to get a better sense of the mechanical stability of each module.


Finally after Jan 2015, Ziro went under complete transformation. We started developing the kit as a product with the intention to commercialize it. This involved evolving our research prototype into actual product users will love! The modules then went through a Industrial Design cycle where we paid special attention to aesthetics and functionality of the design. All the off-the shelf electronics were converted into a small 2cmX5cm PCB. Thereby redefining the design and form factor of the module. The current state of module design constantly evolved over 2.5 years.

The glove went through a similar design cycle over 2.5 years. When we started out, we got a winter glove from Supermart, tore it open and slid in our sensors. We then printed a casing of the same FDM material and prepared a large box which housed all the electronics. This box sat on the top of the hand and housed all our hand soldered electronics. This was Jan 2014 and it was prototype 1.



Our second prototype was more about cleaning up the firmware. We got a better fitting and better looking glove, prepared the same electronic box which housed our off-the -shelf electronics. We later conducted studies with this glove and tested our system out with 150 users. By Jan 2015 we finalized our firmware and system architecture. 

Finally after Jan 2015, we got a fashion designer to help us with the ergonomic and aesthetic design of the glove. She came up with around 60 design options from which we selected the current one which we loved! In parallel we were woking on shrinking the electronics from the big box into a small 5cmX7cm PCB. The glove we have right now has electronics which is barely noticeable. Finally Ziro glove was ready for prime time! 

We paid special attention to the color scheme of the kit. Our learning sciences advisor gave us expert advice on green and white combination as it is a very gender-neutral scheme. It appeals equally to both boys and girls. Also this color scheme projects more energy to the user.






We’re a team with a lot of experience in creating things and delivering them.

We'll do everything in our power to leave our backers well looked after, and their rewards on-time or early.

We've given a conservative estimate of of delivery dates. We are committed to keeping you informed of our progress in the months following the campaign. Our promise to deliver will be challenged at all times by the known complexities of manufacturing, production scheduling, shipping, and more.

Therefore, in the event that unexpected issues arise in the delivery schedule, we will do our utmost to minimize the impact on our supporters and dedicate ourselves to providing the best, most honest, experience.

What does each Ziro kit come with?

Ziro comes with a smart wireless glove controller, actuator modules, charging station, connectors and access to our mobile app. The “Starter kit” comes with two modules, while the “Pro Kit” comes with four!

Who is Ziro for?

Ziro is perfect for anyone above the age of 8 who wants to experiment with robotics, prototype new toys and inventions, or just play around and have fun! This includes big kids, small kids, adults, educators, artists, and storytellers. We think that Ziro is the best way to help people of all ages excited in the burgeoning field of robotics.  

Do I need to know how to code to program Ziro?

Nope! Ziro robots does not require any coding. Configuration is done using a visual mobile app that works on iOS and Android. Ziro is so easy, your child can teach YOU how to do it!

I ordered the Starter Kit, but I would really like the Pro Kit. 

Can I upgrade my perk?

Sure thing! Any perk claimed during the campaign can be upgraded to a higher priced perk before the campaign ends. Instructions for doing this can be found here.

Where will you ship?

Ziro will be shipped worldwide. International shipping charges apply.

When will I receive my Ziro kit?

Ziro is expected to ship in January 2017. We’ve done our homework and believe this to be a conservative estimate. In the event that unexpected issues arise in the delivery schedule, we will do our utmost to minimize the impact on our supporters and dedicate ourselves to providing the best, most honest, experience.

Does Ziro have a mobile app? What does it do?

Yes, Ziro has a mobile app, which is used for one-time configuration of the robot/toy. The app contains a simple visual user interface with which the user configures his or her robot.

Do I need a Wi­Fi network to use Ziro?

No. Ziro connects with the smart glove via local wifi hotspot that it creates by itself. No home Wi-Fi network required for playing with Ziro. A home Wi-Fi network is needed for software updates and for remote control from any location.

What type of batteries do Ziro actuator modules use?

The modules use internal rechargeable Li-ion 9 volts 880 mAh batteries

How much play time do the batteries give?

The Ziro module batteries offer 7 hours of play time (depending on play) before needing to be recharged. The smart glove can be used up to 4 hours before needing some juice.

How do I charge the Ziro batteries in each of the motors?

Module batteries are charged using the charging station that comes with the kit.

How do I charge the smart glove?

The smart glove can be recharged using the mini-USB cable supplied with the kit.

Can I get a refund?

Any backer can get a full refund on their contribution during our campaign. Instructions for doing this can be found here.

I’m having trouble claiming a perk. What should I do?

We’re sorry to hear that! If you’re having trouble claiming a perk, please email support@indiegogo.com. One of their payment specialists will respond to your request within 24 hours.

Winner Announced!

The winner is Rhonda P! We'll reach out to you directly to coordinate sending you your free Ziro! If you didn't win, you can still take advantage of our VIP discounts today!
story_txt:
Ziro lets you design, build, and animate your robotic inventions, control them easily with the lift of a finger or a flick of the wrist. Made for robotics enthusiasts and creative newbies alike, Ziro is the perfect platform for bringing your 3D creations to life.








Upon receiving Ziro, you’ll have your creations brought to life within minutes. You can make your own hand-controlled toys - a fun trike with the starter kit or a really cool rover and a trike with the pro kit right out of the box.



    




Once you get the hang of making rover and trike with Ziro, you can expand your creative skills with a rich variety of pre-made toy kits from ZeroUI. You will be able to choose from toy kits made out of variety of materials such as plastic or cardboard etc. To get a taste of this, choose our Creator Bundle Perk to get pre-made cardboard kits to make humanoid robot and robotic dog.
       





Feeling more adventurous? Ziro is the perfect thing for you. Make your own designs or download them from our wide repository of designs at ZeroUI website and build your own 3D printed or cardboard cutouts right at home. You could even repurpose old toys to bring them to life. After all, Ziro is the perfect companion for those curious makers.
       





CHILDREN/STUDENTSWhen making and playing with Ziro, students learn the fundamentals of robotics, engineering, physics, and design.
Education has become so hyper focused on results that it no longer cares about the process and the experience of learning. Students should be in a safe environment where they can make mistakes and learn.We believe in the concept of failing forward, where failing should be seen as a part of success. Failures are opportunities for creative problem-solving, reflection, innovation, and growth.





MAKERS & TINKERERS
Ziro is a powerful tool for makers and tinkerers of all ages to quickly prototype their ideas. They can combine it with their custom 3D printed designs and program Ziro to experiment in robotics, home automation and other pet projects. The development kit would support Arduino and give makers full control and access to the power of the smart modules, each having a powerful microcontroller, motor and capable of hosting it’s own WiFi hotspot. With Ziro, making connected gizmos, smart robots, and other pet projects has never been easier.






Ziro is a robotics kit that let's you build robots that you can control using your hand. It's simple, fun, engaging and anyone can use it. 

Ziro is modular and untethered, made up of individual wireless motors that are controlled by a wireless connected smart glove. Ziro can be expanded to included up to 8 modules.

















Get started using our pre-made kits or assemble your own personal designs. Ziro’s modular design enables free-form robotics construction, allowing you to build virtually anything. 


Ziro enables building robots using non-plastic and eco-friendly materials such as cardboard boxes. Put your Amazon boxes to good use!











ATTACH THE MOTOR MODULES
Motor Modules can be animated in a hinge or 360º rotational movement, adding versatile dynamic movement to your robot. These modules are wireless, so they can be placed anywhere you want!! Attach your modules to your designs and see your creations come to life. You can even use them with 3D printed designs, store-bought toys, or virtually anything that you want to bring to life.













CONFIGURE WITH ZIRO'S SMART PHONE APP

Use Ziro’s free smartphone app to pair hand gestures to the movement of each module. Once connected, your smart glove movements will animate the modules.

story:
"Automatic and Hands Free Volume Control for  Your Smartphone" 

Novo is an innovative audio accessory that adjusts your headphone volume based on the ambient noise around you to create optimal listening experiences. You don’t need to touch the volume button on your phone. Novo will be your personal volume assistant, adapting the volume for you automatically.  With Novo, no more volume issues.

Novo clips to your clothing and then monitors your surroundings. It adapts your audio in real-time by either boosting or reducing the volume to give you the best listening experience so that you can hear what you need to hear, when you need to hear it, without needing to touch your phone.

Novo uses patented Adaptive Audio Technology™ to automatically monitor and adjust your volume based on your surroundings.  With its state-of-the-art MEMs microphone, integrated with its hardware platform synced with software algorithms, Novo listens to your environment and adapts your audio in real-time, to ensure bettering hearing quality. 

Novo improves your hearing by either boosting or reducing your volume to provide an optimal listening experience. 


In “boost mode,” Novo will increase your call volume when noises interfere so you can hear the person you are talking with loud and clear. For example, if you are outside on a phone call and passing traffic makes it difficult to understand the person on the call, Novo will boost your volume to make it easier to hear.


In “reduce mode,” you can enjoy listening to your favorite music in the office and if a workmate needs your attention and calls your name, Novo will “reduce” the volume of your music in real-time so you can hear the person trying to talk with you.

This mode is especially helpful when you are outside being active and need to be aware of your surroundings to keep alert and safe.


What You Get & How It Works

Novo connects to any iPhone, Android, mobile phone, MP3 or tablet with a standard 3.5 mm audio jack and uses two standard Type 13 batteries, providing over 200 hours of operation or approximately six weeks of use. 
 
Novo also features an adjustable slider that allows you to personalize the microphone sensitivity to best suit your preferences along with a metal clip that attaches to your pocket, waist, or shirt. 



Novo functions on the device are simple. Here is a diagram to explain all:


Novo in the Press

"Audiophiles will be amazed by novo's ability to adjust your volume based on the ambient noise around you and changing sound levels within the proximity of you and the novo.” - Rick Limpert, Ranked the No. 1 Sports Tech Writer in America,                                                                                                                                 www.RickLimpert.info

The Impact

With your support, we can finalize Novo to launch worldwide and ensure delivery of the first production run by December. We appreciate your help so that we can bring people everywhere the very best and safest way to listen to audio. 

By participating in this Novo campaign your contribution will make a big difference:

  • Help us bring Novo to market
  • Launch globally
  • Make product affordable and accessible to everyone

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't participate in a perk reward, we understand and still value your support:

  • Please share Novo with your friends and family
  • Be enlisted in our Indiegogo page share tools so you can also email and post in other areas online

 Thank you for your support and teaming up with us!

FAQ

1. Do you have a Quick Start Guide showing Novo?
See Novo Quick Start Guide setup image here:


2. What are Novo specs?
Operating Modes:  2
Audio Output Plug & Cable:  12” cable with 3.5 mm stereo plug
Audio Input Jack:  3.5 mm stereo
Power Requirements:  Two (2) Type 13 Hearing Aid Batteries
Product Dimensions:  1.5” x 0.8” x 0.5” (Not counting cable/plug)


3. What do the various color options look like?
See attached color options. Brushed Aluminum Silver is our production run, but making a limited supply of Gold-tone and Blue-metallic exclusively for IndieGoGo perks:

4. Any potential challenges?

We value transparency so please let us know if you have any questions or concerns about the product and timing. With Novo we are ready to go with a production run this December. The one challenge we foresee is shipping the product globally with the correct global packaging and messaging for international markets. We would also value your feedback to fine tune the product. Based on your input we can finalize Novo and determine which countries to ship to first and what is needed globally to make an international release happen.

5. What are the award options for participating in Novo campaign?
