story:
Update: 

We are now shipping the new version of inCharge, with stronger magnets and higher quality connectors and components. Orders will be processed  and shipped within 5 business days.

Hey there!

Hi guys, we are Lorenzo and Carlo. We are brothers and we study engineering at Politecnico di Milano, in Italy. 

After experiencing frustration with the battery life of our smartphones, we decided to do something: create the most compact charging cable, to be always carried along. We are now part of Indiegogo's InDemand program, this means that you can still order from our campaign. Your order will be shipped within 5 business days. 48h after your order, you will receive an email to select the colors/connectors.

What is inCharge?

It's a very simple product, yet so useful that we believe everybody should own one. That's why one of our main goals was to keep it affordable.

There are already solutions such as power cases and extra batteries, but they are either not portable enough or easy to forget.

Because size matters.
  

Thanks to its magnetic closure, you can snap it onto your keyring and carry it with you everyday.

Thanks to its flexibility, you can comfortably use your phone while on charge.

inCharge is colorful. Pick your favorite between 9 colors!

inCharge is available with both lightning connector and microUsb, so it's compatible with most of the devices out there.

Lightning connector. Works with every new generation iPhone, iPad and iPod with a Lightning connector. 

Lightning compatibility list

Micro USB. Works with every smartphone and tablet with a standard micro USB connector. 

MicroUsb phones compatibility list 

inCharge Type-C

We are currently working on inCharge with type-c connector. To stay tuned and get notified when available, please visit this link: incharge.rocks/c

Dimensions

We are serious when we say it's the most compact cable around!

Our competitors are almost double the size and triple the price!

Video Reviews

Below some video reviews on YouTube!


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zcA7-bQvcK4

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1V9MceQam4k

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tIbTZ6PADAU

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S7v3S6McgX8

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Exo7cpyZjg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-o17hRXoINI

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Z7GlC981zc

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4yxvwX8VuCM


Features

We spend over 70% of our day next to a USB port, and every time is a chance to top up your battery!

There are over 5 Billion USB ports around the world, you will develop a USB radar!

You won't have to fight with tangled cords ever again!


Packaging solutions

Below you can see our first packaging designs, and our current e-commerce solution. 

We'd like to minimize our impact on the environment by avoiding unnecessary waste from packaging material. Our e-commerce packaging is very minimalistic, but it's designed to protect your inCharge during shipping. 


How to pick colors

After contributing, please allow at least 24 hours for the database to be updated, then you will receive an email asking you to fill up a form. If you did not get the email within 48 hours, please visit incharge.rocks/colors.

Who wrote about us


Your help

We are really excited about this, and we hope you are, too. Now we need your help to bring inCharge into your pocket.

As a supporter you will get your inCharge at a very special price! So please consider backing our project, and share it with your friends. 


Similar products?

We have received some criticism from users who believe that inCharge is not a new product, and we’d like to clarify this. There are already some similar products on the market but they are either much more expensive, or very bad quality. We designed inCharge to have the most affordable price possible while keeping a great quality, we also chose the best length and made a new magnet system. So yes, we started from existing products on the market, but we made ours a lot better! :)


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you like our project but you can't contribute, please consider sharing it using the share buttons under the video with your friends and family. This will help us a lot to spread the word!

    Thank you, cheers!


    In Demand

    InCharge was selected by the Indiegogo team, with a few other projects, to be part of a new program that allows our campaign to continue receiving contributions. This means that even though our campaign ended on December 2014, you can still get InCharge here on Indiegogo!


    How to pick colors?

    After making the contribution, please allow at least 24 hours for our database to be updated, then visit this page: http://www.incharge.rocks/colors

    Insert your email and you will receive your order link to pick your colors and cable types. Please remember to check your spam folder!


    Reviews

    We need your feedback! 

    If you have received your inCharge, please take a moment to share a word about how you like it (or not). Of course we prefer good reviews, but we value truth and sincerity more!

    Read reviews or share yours: http://www.incharge.rocks/reviews


    Shipping and Delivery

    ----------------------------
    Campaign contributions (Before September 2015):
    Every perk includes International free shipping. However, please note that economy shipping to countries like: United States, Brazil, Mexico and more generally overseas countries, can take a while to be delivered. This is why we always suggest to add the priority shipping perk (3$), or even better the tracking code priority perk (12$). If you decide to go with economy shipping, please be prepared to wait a long time, but we always guarantee you will receive your perk, if your address is correct of course!

    If your address is wrong, your perk will come back to us and we will contact you to get your correct address and ship it again. :)

    -----------------------------

    Pre-Orders (After October 2015):

    Every order will be shipped with standard international economy shipping (non trackable). If you require a tracking code, please add $4 to your order total.

    -----------------------------

    Pre-Orders (After January 2016):

    Every order will be shipped with standard international trackable shipping. You will receive an email with your tracking code within 2 days from shipping!

    Our funders' pictures

    View our funders' picture: http://www.incharge.rocks/gallery
    Share yours: gallery@incharge.rocks


    Warranty

    Any problem with your cable? No worries! InCharge is covered by 1 year warranty. The warranty starts from the date of your purchase. Please contact via email info@incharge.rocks and we will sort it right away.


    Questions?

    If you have any question or concern, please shoot us an email at info@incharge.rocks and we will answer as soon as possible!


    Useful links

  • ABOUT US
  • WHOLESALE INQUIRY
  • PRESS INQUIRY
  • PRODUCT REVIEWS

  • CONTACT US
  • PRIVACY POLICY
  • REFUND POLICY
  • FAQs
story_txt:
Update: 
We are now shipping the new version of inCharge, with stronger magnets and higher quality connectors and components. Orders will be processed  and shipped within 5 business days.

Hey there!
 



Hi guys, we are Lorenzo and Carlo. We are brothers and we study engineering at Politecnico di Milano, in Italy. 
After experiencing frustration with the battery life of our smartphones, we decided to do something: create the most compact charging cable, to be always carried along. We are now part of Indiegogo's InDemand program, this means that you can still order from our campaign. Your order will be shipped within 5 business days. 48h after your order, you will receive an email to select the colors/connectors.
What is inCharge?
It's a very simple product, yet so useful that we believe everybody should own one. That's why one of our main goals was to keep it affordable.
There are already solutions such as power cases and extra batteries, but they are either not portable enough or easy to forget.


Because size matters.  

Thanks to its magnetic closure, you can snap it onto your keyring and carry it with you everyday.


Thanks to its flexibility, you can comfortably use your phone while on charge.


inCharge is colorful. Pick your favorite between 9 colors!



inCharge is available with both lightning connector and microUsb, so it's compatible with most of the devices out there.

Lightning connector. Works with every new generation iPhone, iPad and iPod with a Lightning connector. 
Lightning compatibility list
Micro USB. Works with every smartphone and tablet with a standard micro USB connector. 
MicroUsb phones compatibility list 
inCharge Type-C
We are currently working on inCharge with type-c connector. To stay tuned and get notified when available, please visit this link: incharge.rocks/c
Dimensions
We are serious when we say it's the most compact cable around!




Our competitors are almost double the size and triple the price!



Video Reviews
Below some video reviews on YouTube!








https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zcA7-bQvcK4
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1V9MceQam4k
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tIbTZ6PADAU
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S7v3S6McgX8
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Exo7cpyZjg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-o17hRXoINI
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Z7GlC981zc
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4yxvwX8VuCM

Features





We spend over 70% of our day next to a USB port, and every time is a chance to top up your battery!
There are over 5 Billion USB ports around the world, you will develop a USB radar!
You won't have to fight with tangled cords ever again!




Packaging solutions
Below you can see our first packaging designs, and our current e-commerce solution. 


We'd like to minimize our impact on the environment by avoiding unnecessary waste from packaging material. Our e-commerce packaging is very minimalistic, but it's designed to protect your inCharge during shipping. 



How to pick colors
After contributing, please allow at least 24 hours for the database to be updated, then you will receive an email asking you to fill up a form. If you did not get the email within 48 hours, please visit incharge.rocks/colors.


Who wrote about us




Your help 
We are really excited about this, and we hope you are, too. Now we need your help to bring inCharge into your pocket.
As a supporter you will get your inCharge at a very special price! So please consider backing our project, and share it with your friends. 

Similar products?
We have received some criticism from users who believe that inCharge is not a new product, and we’d like to clarify this. There are already some similar products on the market but they are either much more expensive, or very bad quality. We designed inCharge to have the most affordable price possible while keeping a great quality, we also chose the best length and made a new magnet system. So yes, we started from existing products on the market, but we made ours a lot better! :)

  Other Ways You Can Help If you like our project but you can't contribute, please consider sharing it using the share buttons under the video with your friends and family. This will help us a lot to spread the word!
Thank you, cheers!




In Demand
InCharge was selected by the Indiegogo team, with a few other projects, to be part of a new program that allows our campaign to continue receiving contributions. This means that even though our campaign ended on December 2014, you can still get InCharge here on Indiegogo!


How to pick colors?After making the contribution, please allow at least 24 hours for our database to be updated, then visit this page: http://www.incharge.rocks/colorsInsert your email and you will receive your order link to pick your colors and cable types. Please remember to check your spam folder!


Reviews




We need your feedback! 
If you have received your inCharge, please take a moment to share a word about how you like it (or not). Of course we prefer good reviews, but we value truth and sincerity more!
Read reviews or share yours: http://www.incharge.rocks/reviews




Shipping and Delivery
----------------------------
Campaign contributions (Before September 2015):Every perk includes International free shipping. However, please note that economy shipping to countries like: United States, Brazil, Mexico and more generally overseas countries, can take a while to be delivered. This is why we always suggest to add the priority shipping perk (3$), or even better the tracking code priority perk (12$). If you decide to go with economy shipping, please be prepared to wait a long time, but we always guarantee you will receive your perk, if your address is correct of course!If your address is wrong, your perk will come back to us and we will contact you to get your correct address and ship it again. :)
-----------------------------
Pre-Orders (After October 2015):
Every order will be shipped with standard international economy shipping (non trackable). If you require a tracking code, please add $4 to your order total.

-----------------------------
Pre-Orders (After January 2016):
Every order will be shipped with standard international trackable shipping. You will receive an email with your tracking code within 2 days from shipping!

Our funders' pictures
View our funders' picture: http://www.incharge.rocks/gallery
Share yours: gallery@incharge.rocks


Warranty
Any problem with your cable? No worries! InCharge is covered by 1 year warranty. The warranty starts from the date of your purchase. Please contact via email info@incharge.rocks and we will sort it right away.



Questions?
If you have any question or concern, please shoot us an email at info@incharge.rocks and we will answer as soon as possible!

Useful links


ABOUT US
WHOLESALE INQUIRY
PRESS INQUIRY
PRODUCT REVIEWS


CONTACT US
PRIVACY POLICY
REFUND POLICY
FAQs

story:
***Check out a new story about us at Fastco Labs: Meet the Magician Who Can Fix Your Crappy No Bars Cell Signal.

***Keep up to date on our project and see new demonstrations at www.dots911.com.


DOTS911: Mobile Phone Signal Finder Software and Signal Enhancer Hardware

Mobile phones are everywhere - in February 2012, there were over 5 billion active mobile phone accounts. Globally, nearly everyone carries a mobile phone almost all the time and these ubiquitous devices are great tools for getting help when you’re lost or trying to resolve infrequent but critical events like a car accident or an injury. However, accidents on the road or on trails often occur in locations without cell phone reception, and the economics of improving signal coverage are such that wilderness areas and a huge fraction of roads will have massive coverage gaps for decades to come.  An estimated 100,000 people die each year because they need help in remote areas and can't make a call.

When you're stuck in one of these no-coverage areas and need help, our iOS and Android signal finder app will lead you back to the nearest signal.  Our Signal Enhancer hardware will amplify whatever signal you do have, often making the difference between having no useable service nearby and being able to instantly make a call.

Why you need the DOTS911 app:

 1. For everyday use to record a dot where your car is parked and then get back to it easily.

 2. For recording dot breadcrumbs to retrace your exact path back to your hotel or the start of your hike, ride, hunt, or car journey.  So you don’t have to depend on the kindness of strangers.

3. In an emergency or not, DOTS911 will lead you to a usable cell signal.

The above video shows a first time user following the DOTS911 app to retrace her steps in order to get out of a wilderness area with no trails.

Why you need the Signal Enhancer: 

(that works with every cell phone and involves no wires or batteries)

 1. To get a better signal inside your house, giving you a more reliable connection and faster data speed.  Just leave it in the DOTS911 phone holder while it charges, make calls via Bluetooth accessories, and use it as a hot spot to provide internet service to all your devices.

2. To provide improved signal strength in emergencies.  This allows your phone to work in many places where otherwise there is no usable signal.  When your car is broken down or you're on a hike, the Signal Enhancer can amplify a weak signal thereby increasing the likelihood of being able to call for help when otherwise you'd be stuck without any phone service.

The above video shows a demonstration in which a call is made from a "red dot" location with no usable phone signal in Big Basin, CA.

DOTS911 is insurance against getting stranded without mobile coverage.

When an accident happens and you have no mobile signal, the lifeline in your pocket becomes no more useful than a brick. Unfortunately, when you don't have reception, there's no easy way to tell where or how to find it. Tragic stories based on this conundrum frequently make headlines, with stranded hikers or motorists unable to find help despite being close to a location with good phone reception. That reception isn't useful to them because it’s invisible. See some examples in our video below: 

The above video shows real life examples of people who could have benefited from the DOTS911 app and Signal Enhancer.


The DOTS911 app is insurance against getting stranded without mobile coverage.

When you can’t make a call, the DOTS911 app uses a combination of the individual user’s data and crowd-sourced data to find the nearest available mobile phone signal. In areas with user-provided data preloaded from our servers, you’ll find the nearest signal for your phone, but even if you’re the first explorer in a new area you’ll be led back to the last place where you personally had a signal. These two features are highly complementary. Neither depends on a current data connection, making them unique among signal-related smartphone apps. When a user has an accident and needs to find cell phone reception, the first feature shows the last location along the road or trail behind him where he can find it.  The second feature provides crowd-sourced signal data collected before the signal was lost, leading the user to the nearest location where anyone has ever seen a usable signal.

Signal location data will even be accessible on our website so you can view it with your computer and print it before a trip through a remote area, making it useful for those without a smartphone.

The DOTS911 app and signal enhancer prototypes work for our beta testers today.

Both hardware and software prototypes already perform exceptionally well. The software has already allowed beta testers to find a signal and avoid getting lost on multiple occasions. The hardware has been used to make calls in many isolated areas where there is usually no useable mobile signal, and closer to home it’s been used to increase data transfer rates by a factor of 10-100x by increasing 4G signal strength, instantly converting a 3G connection to 4G. Check out feedback from some of our beta testers:

The above video shows testimonials from some of our beta testers.


The DOTS911 signal enhancer can boost your signal by up to 30x, works with every cell phone on the planet, requires no power, and is 10x cheaper than the competition.

Our signal enhancers don’t require any special port on your phone. Set your phone in the holder and you can boost your signal strength signal by up to 15 dB with no wires, no required power source, and at a tenth the price of powered signal repeaters that are much less successful at finding a signal in remote areas. This can be the difference between no service and 2-3 bars of signal, between a patchy 2 bars and steady 5 bars of signal, or between a 200 kbps and a 20 Mbps data transfer rate. 

The enhancer has meaningful gain at all current cell phone frequencies. The gain is more as the enhancer size increases. Also, the higher the frequency, the more the gain is. If and when the proposed 5 GHz. cell band is utilized, our gain will be considerable more than what we have conservatively disclosed. At Sprint WiMAX data frequencies of 2.5+ GHz we have seen gain of 15dB =X30 for the Ultra 16", 12dB =X15 for full 12", and 9+dB=X8 for the compact 8 inch enhancer. When we went to the remote high desert site in Nevada near where a Jeep with six overturned last December, they were not able to make a cell call, but we were able to easily make a cell call with the 12 inch signal enhancer. And that was connecting to a low frequency tower in the 850 MHz band. See our link to the story at http://dots911.blogspot.com/2014/01/dots911-trip-to-lovelock-nevada-to.html

Three Signal Enhancer models: Compact, Full Size, and Ultra.

DOTS911 belongs in your cell phone.

Imagine that you’re driving on a road in the mountains when it starts to snow or you have engine trouble. Before long you pull over and need to make a call for help, but you see you have no reception on your phone. What do you do? For all you know, there’s a signal 200 feet in front of you. Or maybe there’s a signal 5 miles back the way you came. Were you paying attention to your bars of reception on the drive in? With our app you simply look at your phone and have immediate visual directions to the last place where you were able to make a call. If you’re not the first user on this road, you can have crowd-sourced data for the area as well and can see whether the nearest signal might be further ahead or off your road but still nearby. Every year in the United States alone there are many thousands of serious or deadly incidents in no-coverage areas that could have been avoided with a phone call. Most of the time this sort of incident occurs within walking distance of mobile coverage, but the victim has no way to know that. 

DOTS911 signal map near Gold Beach, Oregon

DOTS911 belongs in your car’s emergency kit.

We have developed a device that can improve cell phone reception as well as any external antenna, but which is similar in portability to a phone and which requires no external antenna port. This signal-enhancing device is compatible with every mobile phone, regardless of design, and improves signal strength by up to 15 dB, a factor of thirty increase in power. We envision one of these signal enhancers in every car and in every hiker’s first aid or survival kit. With the signal enhancement device’s assistance, the five, ten, or twenty mile hike to good mobile connection can be shortened or completely eliminated, turning a desperate struggle for survival into a short wait for a tow truck or a helicopter rescue. 

The DOTS911 Signal Enhancer will be an important companion in your car or on a trail.

DOTS911 belongs in your home.

Many potential customers are simply people with poor signal strength in their homes, which is a common problem due to the signal attenuation of construction materials. A 15 dB gain can be the difference between 0 and 3 bars of reception or 20 kbps and 10 Mbps data speed. The hundreds of millions of mobile phone users with poor signal strength at home would see a clear and immediate benefit from our hardware signal enhancers. 

Example Signal Enhancer increasing data transfer rates by 60x by enabling 4G.


We need your support.

We’ve refined our signal enhancer engineering designs through several generations of prototypes. The current iterations are effective and can be produced efficiently. We’ve fabricated 3-D mold forms from several materials using CNC machines for the main reflector and laser-cut phone mounts and bridges. Coatings materials that reflect signals as high as twice the frequencies used by current mobile phones have been selected and validated as well. These designs have been field tested by our development team and beta testers, and as you can see in our videos above, they’ve been found to work extremely well.

Our existing molds are great for prototypes but in order to bring the unit price down to consumer-friendly levels we need to transition to aluminum and steel molds, which involve a substantial capital investment but will allow us to create tens of thousands to millions of units without any variation from part to part.  We plan to use these molds to fabricate our signal enhancers in USA.

Our client software is feature complete on Android but needs development on iOS and further interface refinement to make the user experience as smooth and entertaining as possible, and the server side needs scaling up and interface development as well. In other words, we’ve already shown that the software works and works well, but we need to make sure everyone can use it without any difficulties caused by user volume or unique phone hardware.  We need funds for our app and web developers and for server resources to support our data infrastructure.

This is the right time to transition to production, but doing so requires capital. Your contibution is that capital. Our pledge to you is that you won’t be disappointed with the results. Together we can reduce countless dangerous or fatal accidents into mere inconveniences and convert many more inconveniences into complete non-events. Make a difference for yourself and for the world.

We developed these products because we wanted to stop seeing stories about people stranded and unable to get help. We can change a huge number of these incidents with sad outcomes into easy calls to 911 or simply to AAA.

Thanks for reading.

Thank you for taking time to view our campaign!

If you can’t afford or don’t want to buy our signal enhancer, no hard feelings. We’re still going to tell you a fact we discovered along the way that may end up saving your life. It’s simple, but can be deadly serious!

Consider the following example we investigated while developing our products. We heard a news story of a missing couple in California who had driven in a 4-wheel-drive vehicle to Burnside Lake, 5 ½ miles off the junction of highways 88 and 89. Their timing was ill fated – once they reached the area a heavy winter storm left their car immobilized in snow. They had no working mobile phone signal where they were stranded.  The next morning, as the storm continued, one of them tried to escape the area to find help on foot and died a mile north of the lake.

Once the weather cleared, we drove to Burnside Lake to test our signal enhancer and determine whether it would have prevented this tragic loss.  On the way we had lunch at a resort less than a mile from the entrance to the dirt road leading to the lake. Nick, an employee at the resort, told us that he had gone there himself only two weeks before the couple got stuck.  He had the same major mobile phone carrier that we use and he told us that he got a strong signal there, so strong in fact that he could watch YouTube videos in his tent at night.

We then drove to the lake to verify his claim.  He was right.  We realized that if one of the couple had a phone with one major mobile carrier and the other used the other major carrier, that instead of needing to call 911, they probably would have called for a tow truck and gotten out before the heavy snowfall and maybe even had a pleasant lunch at the nearby resort.

This is often the case: the service areas of each mobile phone carrier can be radically different from the others, especially away from major cities.  When choosing a carrier or planning for a trip to an area that may be isolated, we urge you to remember this story and the benefits of having access to emergency services through multiple independent mobile phone networks.

We don’t want you to be the lead story on the nightly news!  We want you to be the lead story on our website, detailing how you used our products to get help when you’d have otherwise been stranded.

Strong signal found at Burnside Lake, but only with the right mobile carrier.

John Wilbur, our CEO, has a long record as a critical innovator in the tech world.

Learn more about the team on our blog.

Founder/CEO: John Wilbur designed the first joystick for Pong-type games, first coin-operated billiards game, the first microprocessor-based coin operated game circuit boards, and invented the first 80-column card for Apple Computers, allowing the Apple II to be used as a business machine with a full-width display and critical in making the world’s first personal computer word processors and spreadsheets usable. He also designed and sold manufacturing rights to the first 128k RAM card for Apple Computer, i.e., the first SSD for an Apple PC, and designed the hardware and software for the first multiprocessor LORAN, the navigational system used in virtually every ship and many airplanes for the last several decades. He brings DOTS911 a track record of innovating in ways that change the world as well as experience running electronics businesses and interacting with hardware manufacturers to ensure quality, lower costs, and improve yields.  See more in a recent Fastco Labs article about John and this project.

Founder: Jeffrey Wilbur has a B. S. from Yale University and a Ph.D. in Chemical Engineering from UC Berkeley as well as six years of experience analyzing market data, developing new products, leading research teams, interacting with customers, and shaping research strategy at The Dow Chemical Company. He has a deep technical background and extensive experience with the materials science relevant to the hardware we have developed.

Board Member: George Crow was a key member of the original Apple Macintosh team and a cofounder of NeXT with Steve Jobs. He has extensive industry experience at Hewlett-Packard, Apple, NeXT, Supermac, and Truevision.

Developers: One developer with six years of experience at a major internet-focused Silicon Valley firm and one with nine years of experience at a major internet-focused Silicon Valley firm.

Q&A

What if I want multiple Perks?

Indigogo is set up to only let you choose one Perk. But if you would like to add additional Perks, simple 'up' your contribution, and select the one reward. When the campaign is over we will send out a survey to all those contributing more than the Perk selected, and you select the additional Perks you want that you have contributed for. The survey will also verify where you want them shipped. Please limit the number of Perks to a maximum of ten.

Why are some pledge levels only receiving the Android app?

We apologize for any confusion.  Let us clarify: if a pledge reward level includes a copy of the mobile phone app, it can be on your platform of choice.  However, we expect the Android app to be ready with our first batch of production signal enhancers while the iOS app is targeted for launch when we ship our second batch of signal enhancers.  However, if you want a signal enhancer from the first batch and pledge at that level, you can request the iOS app and receive it as soon as it's launched.

Why isn't international shipping included?

International Shipping prices vary by location and country and the size of signal enhancer you ordered. It’s simpler (and cheaper for you) for us to handle this separately. After the campaign is over and we are ready to start shipping, you will receive an invitation to go to our website and enter your shipping information to pay the appropriate amount. 

Why are the international signal enhancers slightly higher priced?

At the moment, the additional handling, regulatory requirements, shipping costs in case of replacements, and support needs abroad demand more of our team. We currently have no manufacturing or assembly operations outside of the USA, so for now we cannot reduce our costs by shipping from a different country. We really do care about shipping our products to all parts of the world, so please understand.

How big are the signal enhancers?

  • Compact enhancers with bridge, phone holder, stand, and packing can fit in an 
  • 8 1/2” x 11” x 2 ” OD box. weight 16 oz
  • Full size enhancers with bridge, phone holder, stand, and packing can fit in a 
  • 12” x 12” x 2” OD box.      weight  1 lb 8 oz
  • The Ultra enhancer with bridge, phone holder, stand, and packing can fit in a 
  • 19” x 19” x 2” OD box.

Will DOTS911 offer a warranty?

Yes.  We will guarantee that you will receive a working signal enhancer and will warranty it against manufacturing defects for 1 year. We will provide written and video instructions on our website showing you how to test and use your signal enhancer.

Will uploading my signal data be anonymous?

It’s up to you!  You can upload completely anonymously if you’d like.  On the other hand, if you upload signal information and would like to have your account associated with it, that’s an option as well.  In the latter case, we’ll be sure to give you recognition when a user benefits from your data.  With sufficient funding we plan to add an achievement system to recognize our explorers.

Acknowledgements

We would like to thank those who were an inspiration to us through their personal ordeals.  Because of you and your experiences, many lives will be saved.  With additional thanks to our team members and beta testers:

George Crow

Jeffrey Wilbur, Ph.D.

Lauren Kinnee, Ph.D.

Matt Spergel

Marty Spergel

Arun Luthra, Ph.D.

Michal Drewniak

Art Broughton

Dan Jacobson

Matt Lariz

Barbara Wilbur

Chris Carlucci

help, but you see you have no reception on your phone.  What do you do? 
 For all you know, there’s a signal 200 feet in front of you.  Or maybe 
there’s a signal 5 miles back the way you came.  Were you paying 
attention to your bars of reception on the drive in?
With our app you simply look at your phone and have immediate visual 
directions to the last place where you were able to make a call.  If 
you’re not the first user on this road, you can have crowd-sourced data for 
the area as well and can see whether the nearest signal might be further
 ahead or off your road but still nearby.
Every year in the United States alone there are many thousands of serious or 
deadly incidents in no-coverage areas that could have been avoided with a
 phone call.  Most of the time this sort of incident occurs within 
walking distance of mobile coverage, but the victim has no way to know 
that. DOTS911 signal map near Gold Beach, OregonDOTS911 belongs in your car’s emergency kit.We have 
developed a device that can improve cell phone reception as well as any 
external antenna, but which is similar in portability to a phone and 
which requires no external antenna port.  This signal-enhancing device 
is compatible with every mobile phone, regardless of design, and 
improves signal strength by up to 15 dB, a factor of thirty increase in 
power.  We envision one of these signal enhancers in every car and in 
every hiker’s first aid or survival kit.  With the signal enhancement 
device’s assistance, the five, ten, or twenty mile hike to good mobile 
connection can be shortened or completely eliminated, turning a 
desperate struggle for survival into a short wait for a tow truck or a 
helicopter rescue. The DOTS911 Signal Enhancer will be an important companion in your car or on a trail.DOTS911 belongs in your home.Many potential customers are 
simply people with poor signal strength in their homes, which is a 
common problem due to the signal attenuation of construction materials. 
 A 15 dB gain can be the difference between 0 and 3 bars of reception or
 20 kbps and 10 Mbps data speed.  The hundreds of millions of mobile 
phone users with poor signal strength at home would see a clear and 
immediate benefit from our hardware signal enhancers. Example Signal Enhancer increasing data transfer rates by 60x by enabling 4G.We need your support.We’ve refined our signal enhancer 
engineering designs through several generations of prototypes. The 
current iterations are effective and can be produced efficiently.  We’ve
 fabricated 3-D mold forms from several materials using CNC machines for
 the main reflector and laser-cut phone mounts and bridges.  Coatings 
materials that reflect signals as high as twice the frequencies used by 
current mobile phones have been selected and validated as well.  These 
designs have been field tested by our development team and beta testers,
 and as you can see in our videos above, they’ve been found to work 
extremely well.  Our existing molds are great for prototypes but 
in order to bring the unit price down to consumer-friendly levels we 
need to transition to aluminum and steel molds, which involve a 
substantial capital investment but will allow us to create tens of 
thousands to millions of units without any variation from part to part. 
 We plan to use these molds to fabricate our signal enhancers in USA.Our
 client software is feature complete on Android but needs development on
 iOS and further interface refinement to make the user experience as 
smooth and entertaining as possible, and the server side needs scaling 
up and interface development as well.  In other words, we’ve already 
shown that the software works and works well, but we need to make sure 
everyone can use it without any difficulties caused by user volume or 
unique phone hardware.  We need funds for our app and web developers and
 for server resources to support our data infrastructure.This is 
the right time to transition to production, but doing so requires 
capital.  Your contibution is that capital.  Our pledge to you is that you 
won’t be disappointed with the results.  Together we can reduce 
countless dangerous or fatal accidents into mere inconveniences and 
convert many more inconveniences into complete non-events.  Make a 
difference for yourself and for the world.
We
 developed these products because we wanted to stop seeing stories about
 people stranded and unable to get help.  We can change a huge number of
 these incidents with sad outcomes into easy calls to 911 or simply to 
AAA.
Thanks for reading.
Thank you for taking time to view our campaign!
If you can’t afford or don’t want to buy our signal enhancer,
no hard feelings. We’re still going to
tell you a fact we discovered along the way that may end up saving your life. It’s simple, but can be deadly serious!
Consider the following example we investigated while
developing our products. We heard a news
story of a missing couple in California who had driven in a 
4-wheel-drive
vehicle to Burnside Lake, 5 ½ miles off the junction of highways 88 and 
89. Their timing was ill fated – once they reached
the area a heavy winter storm left their car immobilized in snow. They 
had no working mobile phone signal where they were stranded.  The next 
morning, as the storm continued, one of
them tried to escape the area to find help on foot and died a mile north
 of the lake.
Once the weather cleared, we drove to Burnside Lake to test
our signal enhancer and determine whether it would have prevented this tragic
loss.  On the way we had lunch at a
resort less than a mile from the entrance to the dirt road leading to the lake. Nick, an employee at the resort, told us that he had gone there himself only two weeks before the couple got
stuck.  He had the same major mobile
phone carrier that we use and he told us that he got a strong signal there, so
strong in fact that he could watch YouTube videos in his tent at night.
We then drove to the lake to verify his claim.  He was right.  We realized that if one of the couple had a
phone with one major mobile carrier and the other used the other major carrier,
that instead of needing to call 911, they probably would have called for a tow
truck and gotten out before the heavy snowfall and maybe even had a pleasant lunch at the
nearby resort.
This is often the case: the service areas of each mobile
phone carrier can be radically different from the others, especially away from major
cities.  When choosing a carrier or planning
for a trip to an area that may be isolated, we urge you to remember this story
and the benefits of having access to emergency services through multiple
independent mobile phone networks.
We don’t want you to be the lead story on the nightly news!  We want you to be the lead story on our
website, detailing how you used our products to get help when you’d have
otherwise been stranded.
Strong signal found at Burnside Lake, but only with the right mobile carrier.
John Wilbur, our CEO, has a long record as a critical innovator in the tech world.Learn more about the team on our blog.Founder/CEO: John Wilbur designed the first joystick for
Pong-type games, first coin-operated billiards game, the first
microprocessor-based coin operated game circuit boards, and invented the first
80-column card for Apple Computers, allowing the Apple II to be used as a
business machine with a full-width display and critical in making the world’s
first personal computer word processors and spreadsheets usable. He also
designed and sold manufacturing rights to the first 128k RAM card for Apple
Computer, i.e., the first SSD for an Apple PC, and designed the hardware and
software for the first multiprocessor LORAN, the navigational system used in
virtually every ship and many airplanes for the last several decades. He brings
DOTS911 a track record of innovating in ways that change the world as well as
experience running electronics businesses and interacting with hardware
manufacturers to ensure quality, lower costs, and improve yields.  See more in a recent Fastco Labs article about John and this project.Founder: Jeffrey Wilbur has a B. S. from Yale University and a Ph.D. in
Chemical Engineering from UC Berkeley as well as six years of experience
analyzing market data, developing new products, leading research teams,
interacting with customers, and shaping research strategy at The Dow Chemical
Company. He has a deep technical background and extensive experience with the
materials science relevant to the hardware we have developed.
Board Member: George Crow was a key member of the original Apple Macintosh team
and a cofounder of NeXT with Steve Jobs. He has extensive industry experience
at Hewlett-Packard, Apple, NeXT, Supermac, and Truevision.
Developers: One developer with six years of experience at a major
internet-focused Silicon Valley firm and one with nine years of experience at a
major internet-focused Silicon Valley firm.Q&AWhat if I want multiple Perks?Indigogo is set up to only let you choose one Perk. But if you would like to add additional Perks, simple 'up' your contribution, and select the one reward. When the campaign is over we will send out a survey to all those contributing more than the Perk selected, and you select the additional Perks you want that you have contributed for. The survey will also verify where you want them shipped. Please limit the number of Perks to a maximum of ten.Why are some pledge levels only receiving the Android app?We
 apologize for any confusion.  Let us clarify: if a pledge reward level 
includes a copy of the mobile phone app, it can be on your platform of 
choice.  However, we expect the Android app to be ready with our first 
batch of production signal enhancers while the iOS app is targeted for 
launch when we ship our second batch of signal enhancers.  However, if
 you want a signal enhancer from the first batch and pledge at that 
level, you can request the iOS app and receive it as soon as it's 
launched.
Why isn't international shipping included?
International Shipping prices vary by location and country
and the size of signal enhancer you ordered. It’s simpler (and cheaper for you)
for us to handle this separately. After the campaign is over and we are
ready to start shipping, you will receive an invitation to go to our website
and enter your shipping information to pay the appropriate amount. 
Why are the international signal enhancers slightly
higher priced? 
At the moment, the additional handling, regulatory
requirements, shipping costs in case of replacements, and support needs abroad
demand more of our team. We currently have no manufacturing or assembly
operations outside of the USA, so for now we cannot reduce our costs by
shipping from a different country. We really do care about shipping our
products to all parts of the world, so please understand.
How big are the signal enhancers?

Compact enhancers with bridge, phone holder, stand, and packing can
fit in an 
8 1/2” x 11” x 2 ” OD box. weight 16 oz

Full size enhancers with bridge, phone holder, stand, and packing
can fit in a 
12” x 12” x 2” OD box.      weight  1 lb 8 oz

The Ultra enhancer with bridge, phone holder, stand, and packing
can fit in a 
19” x 19” x 2” OD box.
Will DOTS911 offer a warranty?
Yes.  We will guarantee that you will receive a working signal
enhancer and will warranty it against manufacturing defects for 1 year. We
 will provide written and video instructions on our website showing
you how to test and use your signal enhancer.
Will uploading my signal data be anonymous?
It’s up to you!  You
can upload completely anonymously if you’d like.  On the other hand, if you upload signal
information and would like to have your account associated with it, that’s an
option as well.  In the latter case,
we’ll be sure to give you recognition when a user benefits from your data.  With sufficient funding we plan to add an
achievement system to recognize our explorers.AcknowledgementsWe would like to thank those who were an 
inspiration to us through their personal ordeals.  Because of you and 
your experiences, many lives will be saved.  With additional thanks to 
our team members and beta testers:George CrowJeffrey Wilbur, Ph.D.Lauren Kinnee, Ph.D.Matt SpergelMarty SpergelArun Luthra, Ph.D.Michal DrewniakArt BroughtonDan JacobsonMatt LarizBarbara WilburChris Carlucci

story:
ROX V8 raises the bar for top performance smartphones, with the Mediatek MT6595 SoC (System on a Chip), the world’s first 'true multi-processing' 8-core mobile CPU.  The MT6595 recently tested above 47,000 in initial AnTuTu tests-- more than 20% faster than the Samsung Galaxy S5, HTC One M8, and OnePlus One (GSMArena 7/15/14).  Luna plans to initially sell direct to consumer, keeping distribution costs at a minimum.  The Luna ROX V8 also comes ‘unlocked’ allowing the freedom to change providers at any time.

“The ROX V8 has state-of-the-art features and power to make it one of the top smartphones ever,” says Todd Walker, founder and CEO of Luna Mobile.  “The phone meets or exceeds our competition in almost every way,” adds Chief Innovation Officer James Mayiras.  “Raw speed only has value when combined with functional benefits that simplify your life.  That’s what makes ROX V8 the ultimate smartphone, ready to become your ‘everything’.  Presently, no company or product provides this complete solution that customers crave.”
  

Where else will you find this exclusive combination of the latest and greatest technical innovations at such an affordable price?

MT6595 Octa-Core - Quad cores are OK, but octa-core phones are better.  Experience powerful, yet efficient, next-gen 'octa-core' power on the Luna ROX V-8.  With CorePilot™, each of the eight independent cores can idle to conserve battery power or roar to life when you need it.

Android KitKat 4.4.4 - The Luna ROX V8 comes with Android ‘KitKat’ providing key features, unlocked and open with the best apps at top speed.  Your phone is your 'everything' and the Luna ROX V8 is the ‘everything phone’.

2 GB / 32 GB RAM + Cloud - 32 GB provides plenty of room to work and play the way you want to, with local data storage for apps, documents, music, videos and more.

3000 mAh Battery - Enjoy maximum all day power from a long-lasting 3000 mAh battery.



1080P Video Camera - Shoot pro quality video at full HD 1080P broadcast resolution.  It’s like an HD SLR that’s always in your pocket, ready to go for that perfect shot when you need it.

13MP Back / 5MP Front Cams - The Luna ROX V8 shoots top level photos at 13 MP quality.  The built-in flash and HDRI maximize lighting for the perfect shot in any environment.

Ultra HD 4K - The Luna ROX V8 hardware accelerates and improves your video with crystal clear UHD 4K playback.  Even HD looks better with the built-in ClearMotion™ picture quality engine, improving every pixel of your display.

HEVC H.265/VP9 - MP4 is the old standard.  New video achieves better quality with HEVC and VP9 for UHD 4K with drastically smaller files.  The Luna ROX V8 is one of the first to hardware accelerate this new standard for smooth playback. 

 Without it, your phone is obsolete for video playback in 2015.

5.5" IPS Screen, Slim Profile - 5.5” is the perfect size for a smartphone display with a big, beautiful view and small enough for your pocket.

Gorilla Glass 3 - Cracked screens are not a style statement.  Your Luna ROX V8 is protected with durable, non-scratch Gorilla Glass 3 on the front and advanced polymer composite on the back.

Wireless HD Screencast - Play your media ‘without wires’ to any SmartTV using Wireless HD.  Combine this with the PowerVR 6 GPU and launch full-screen gaming to any large smart screen.

Full HD + PowerVR 6 3D GPU - The Luna ROX V8 has full HD 1080P resolution for video and gaming.  Accelerate all the latest games with the new GPU, PowerVR 6.



4G LTE - The Luna ROX V8 uses 4G LTE, the new global standard for high speed mobile data.  The 4th generation finally achieves speeds that are similar to your Wi-Fi at home.  It’s the one device that’s always live when you need it.

Dual SIMs - The Luna ROX V8 can have two separate numbers from completely different carriers with Dual SIM sockets.  The Luna ROX V8 is carrier unlocked for you to choose.

5G WiFi 802.11ac / Bluetooth 4.0 LE - Get 802.11ac, 5Ghz. and 2.4Ghz., the latest WiFi that transfers apps, 4K video, and more at Gigabit+ speed.  Standard on the Luna ROX V8.  Do more.  Do more faster.



Open Creativity for All

The Luna ROX V8 empowers ALL filmmakers and photographers like never before.  Creative inspiration and brilliance should be open to anyone, and not just the chosen few who can afford high-priced editing equipment or $650+ phones.  With the Luna ROX V8, you now have all the tools necessary to produce and present an entire HD quality film.  Given its affordability, our phone is THE creative and sharing tool for the burgeoning community of bright producers. 

HEVC plus Octa-core Power

The Luna ROX V8 uses the new codec, HEVC H.265, replacing H.264 (mp4), however our phone is still backward compatible with all your current MP4 files.  HEVC is twice as efficient, but requires a more powerful CPU.  Our 8-core processor gets the job done. 

Complete Studio in a Phone

It's  a complete solution for shooting video and pictures, instant editing, uploading, or live streaming right on the device. The desktop-like power makes it possible in a smartphone with all threads managed by CorePilot™. That's raw power!

Film-Edit-Upload

In rare cases, the final end product will make it to film, but the majority of new content is now uploaded directly to the web for immediate playback.  With LTE data speed, edited footage can be uploaded to any site on the Internet with lightning speed.  Furthermore, the new HEVC standard means uploaded content will now be half the file size and take half the time to upload.  And with its powerful MT6595 Octa-core Chipset, the Luna ROX V8 will be one of only three phones in the market to support this 4K Ultra HD standard.

Attach it and GOGO with Live Streaming

Much of the exciting content created these days comes from mobile cameras placed in new and interesting ways. The Luna ROX V8, with its 13 mega-pixel high definition camera, can easily mount to your bike, car, helicopter drone, etc. for quick and easy filming.  Best of all, the integrated LTE data connection allows you to LIVE STREAM directly to the web, all in a single device.

Large 5.5” Screen and FHD

We specifically chose a large, full HD screen for the precise purpose of easily viewing and editing content right on your phone.  When out in the field, there is no more need for a separate monitor to make sure you’ve got the perfect shot.  Details like this really do matter when bringing creative projects to life.



We take great pride in the smartphone we are bringing to market.  The Luna ROX V8 meets or exceeds the competition in nearly every category.  But the real value is in the combination of our feature set.  You won't find this in any other phone on the market today.  And you can get the Luna ROX V8 at a fraction of the price of the competition.  You be the judge.



ONE FOR THE MONEY

With an Indiegogo contribution of just $399 you will receive a phone plus accessories bundle that includes the following:

  • Luna ROX V8 Octa-core 5.5" Smartphone with: 13 and 5 MP Cameras, LTE, Dual Sims, FHD screen, and 3000 mAh battery. 
  • Custom Protective Case ($20 retail)
  • Earbuds ($30 retail)
  • Micro-USB Charging Cord
  • AC Adapter
  • User Manual
  • Lifetime Customer Support (USA-based)
  • One Year Warranty

ONE FOR THE MONEY (Deluxe)

For $449, EVERYTHING in the ONE FOR THE MONEY plus a 
  high quality portable charger.



THREE TO GET READY  (X 3)

The Deluxe package x 3 (each with full bundle including portable charger)

+ FREE SHIPPING TO USA
+ THREE (3) 'KEEP CALM AND ROX ON' T-SHIRTS



NOW GO CAT GOGO!  (10 pack)

The Deluxe package x 10 (each with full bundle including portable charger)

+ FREE SHIPPING TO USA
+ TEN (10) 'KEEP CALM AND ROX ON' T-SHIRTS



KEEP CALM AND ROX ON T-SHIRT

If you simply want to help the effort to build amazing and affordable mobile devices with a $20 contribution, you can get a 100% cotton T-shirt that most people won't understand.  How cool is that?


There are basically two types of cell phone networks in the US: GSM & CDMA.  The Luna Rox V8 operates on GSM networks.  There are many well-known GSM providers for you to choose from including AT&T, MetroPCS, T-Mobile, Walmart and dozens of other companies who actually encourage you to Bring Your Own Device (BYOD).  We love that and you will too.  They will give you something called a 'SIM card' which you slip into the LUNA ROX V8 and away you go!  Simple is Smarter™.


Note: Sprint, Verizon and their affiliate providers are operating on a CDMA network which does not accept GSM phones.  Too bad for them.



LUNA Mobile is a USA-based start-up company whose mission is to provide the consumer with high-quality feature-rich mobile phones at a fraction of the cost of the big guys.  We are tired of carriers that force phone owners into contracts and lock your expensive hardware to their system.  If you buy the Luna ROX V8, you get to choose your carrier.

With your support to fund our initial production, we can bring this vision to reality, offering the consumer a new way of communicating.  Simple is smarter.

Be a backer on Indiegogo today and get VIP access to the first manufacturing run of a premium-class smartphone at a price well below any of our competitors.



As with all crowdfunding projects, we need your help in spreading the word on this exciting new product.  So if you like what you see, please SHARE this campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, etc. using the controls near the top of this page.  You can also stay connected using the icons near the bottom of the page.  Thank you!



1. CONTRIBUTIONS & PAYMENT

2. AVAILABILITY & DELIVERY

3. PRODUCT & SOFTWARE

4. WARRANTY & RETURNS


1. CONTRIBUTIONS & PAYMENT

How do I add shipping charges to my order?  Once you’ve selected your Perk, click Additional Gift, select Custom, and add the appropriate amount indicated for shipping based on your location.

I forgot to add shipping to my Perk - what should I do?  No problem! If you'd like to add funds for shipping, you can make another contribution and select "No Perk, Just a Contribution."  We will match your contribution with your original order and you’re all set.

I did not choose a Perk when contributing, but I paid the whole sum for the Luna ROX V8.  Do I get a phone anyway?  If you made a contribution for the Luna ROX V8, but forgot to add a Perk, please contact us at support@lunahq.com.

What if I want to order a quantity not listed as a Perk?  Just add the required amount to your contribution and we will contact you for details.

Does the Perk price include VAT or other taxes?  No, contributors must pay any taxes and duties related to the selected destination country.  Tax, customs fees and other applicable customs charges are not included in the price of the Luna ROX V8. Once we get close to the delivery date, we will ask you to confirm your shipping address and we will provide further instructions on handling VAT or any other applicable taxes.

I’m having problems making a contribution, please help?  If you faced problems when making a contribution, please check common contribution errors.  You can also email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to help with any issues.

2. AVAILABILITY & DELIVERY

What if you fail to reach the funding target?  We’ve set our goal to be highly achievable and to enable optimum pricing for you.  If for some reason we don’t reach our target, we will still fulfill your order.  

When will you ship the Luna ROX V8?  Assuming our campaign reaches its goal, we expect to ship the first phones in March, 2015.  Please note that the delivery date is subject to change.  In any event, we will keep you updated on the schedule by e-mail.

If I take part in the Luna ROX V8 campaign, will I get the phone before others? Absolutely!  You will be among the first to get the Luna ROX V8.  We'll ship the phones in the order of contributions made through Indiegogo.

Will the Luna ROX V8 also be available for general sale or only through Indiegogo?  Only through Indiegogo during the campaign.  Shortly after the campaign is over, we will be offering the phone through retailers and online at a minimum price of $399.  The Indiegogo contributors will get the phone first and with the lowest price at the time of delivery.  Rest assured, the phone will never have a retail price of $299 again.

After contributing to the campaign, what happens next? Do you just deliver the phone to me?  When you contribute to the Luna ROX V8 campaign we will ensure that you receive all the latest information about the project as it progresses.  Once we get close to the delivery date, we will ask you to confirm your shipping address and we will provide further instructions on handling VAT or any other applicable taxes.  In the meantime be sure to follow us on Facebook and Twitter.

3. PRODUCT & SOFTWARE

What countries and mobile networks will support the Luna ROX V8?  The Luna ROX V8 is an open device, not locked to any particular network. It works in all countries that provide GSM/3G/LTE-based network services.  It will also support the two LTE standards to provide 4G mobile broadband connectivity around the world (subject to network availability and data fees).  The Luna ROX V8 is also a quad-band phone (850/900/1,800/1,900 MHz) allowing our customers to travel internationally and use the same handset.

Can the phone’s features or specifications change before delivery?  As in any crowdfunding campaign, changes are possible.  We reserve the right to make changes in described features, specifications, and delivery date estimations, and to introduce software features and functionality at a later date.

4.WARRANTY & RETURNS

What is your warranty policy?  LUNA stands proudly behind the quality of our products and guarantees to the original purchaser that our product shall be free from defects in material or workmanship for a period of one year.  This warranty applies to the product under normal use and is subject to all product usage documentation.

I am not happy with the Luna ROX V8, can I return it?  You may return the Luna ROX V8 within 14 days of receipt for a full refund.  Please note that return shipping, including any customs or other charges as applicable, will be the responsibility of the sender.  To request a return merchandise authorization (RMA), simply send an email to support@lunahq.com.  Please indicate clearly in the subject and body of the message “RETURN”, providing any relevant information including your Indiegogo contribution number, contribution date and payment method utilized.  We will provide you with detailed RMA instructions.


------------------------------

My question wasn't answered on this campaign page, what to do?

If you have more questions or simply just want to know Luna Mobile better, please visit our website LunaHQ.com and/or follow us on Facebook and Twitter!

Complete Studio in a Phone
It's  a complete solution for shooting video and pictures, instant editing, uploading, or live streaming right on the device. The 
desktop-like power makes it possible in a smartphone with all threads managed by CorePilot™. That's raw power!
Film-Edit-Upload
In
 rare cases, the final end product will make it to film, but the 
majority of new content is now uploaded directly to the web for 
immediate playback.  With LTE data speed, edited footage can be uploaded 
to any site on the Internet with lightning speed.  Furthermore, the new 
HEVC standard means uploaded content will now be half the file size and 
take half the time to upload.  And with its powerful MT6595 Octa-core 
Chipset, the Luna ROX V8 will be one of only three phones in the market to 
support this 4K Ultra HD standard.
Attach it and GOGO with Live Streaming
Much
 of the exciting content created these days comes from mobile cameras 
placed in new and interesting ways. The Luna ROX V8, with its 13 mega-pixel high definition camera,
 can easily mount to your bike, car, helicopter drone, etc. for quick 
and easy filming.  Best of all, the integrated LTE data connection 
allows you to LIVE STREAM directly to the web, all in a single device.
Large 5.5” Screen and FHD
We
 specifically chose a large, full HD screen for the precise purpose of 
easily viewing and editing content right on your phone.  When out in the
 field, there is no more need for a separate monitor to make sure you’ve
 got the perfect shot.  Details like this really do matter when bringing
 creative projects to life.




We take great pride in the smartphone we are bringing to market.  The Luna ROX V8 meets or exceeds the competition in nearly every category.  But the real value is in the combination of our feature set.  You won't find this in any other phone on the market today.  And you can get the Luna ROX V8 at a fraction of the price of the competition.  You be the judge. 


ONE FOR THE MONEY 
With an Indiegogo contribution of just $399 you will receive a phone plus accessories bundle that includes the following:


Luna ROX V8 Octa-core 5.5" Smartphone with: 13 and 5 MP Cameras, LTE, Dual Sims, FHD screen, and 3000 mAh battery. 

Custom Protective Case ($20 retail)
Earbuds ($30 retail)

Micro-USB Charging Cord
AC Adapter

User Manual
Lifetime Customer Support (USA-based)
One Year Warranty

ONE FOR THE MONEY (Deluxe) For $449, EVERYTHING in the ONE FOR THE MONEY plus a   high quality portable charger. 


TWO FOR THE SHOW  (X2)
The Deluxe package x 2 (each with full bundle including portable chargers)
+ FREE SHIPPING TO USA+ TWO (2) 'KEEP CALM AND ROX ON' T-SHIRTS








THREE TO GET READY  (X 3)


The Deluxe package x 3 (each with full bundle including portable charger)

+ FREE SHIPPING TO USA+ THREE (3) 'KEEP CALM AND ROX ON' T-SHIRTS



NOW GO CAT GOGO!  (10 pack)


The Deluxe package x 10 (each with full bundle including portable charger)


+ FREE SHIPPING TO USA+ TEN (10) 'KEEP CALM AND ROX ON' T-SHIRTS







KEEP CALM AND ROX ON T-SHIRT

If you simply want to help the effort to build amazing and affordable mobile devices with a $20 contribution, you can get a 100% cotton
 T-shirt that most people won't understand.  How cool is that?






There are basically two types of cell phone networks in the US: GSM & CDMA.  The Luna Rox V8 operates on GSM networks.  There are many 
well-known GSM providers for you to choose from including AT&T, 
MetroPCS, T-Mobile, Walmart and dozens of other companies who actually 
encourage you to Bring Your Own Device (BYOD).  We love that and you 
will too.  They will give you something called a 'SIM card' which you 
slip into the LUNA ROX V8 and away you go!  Simple is Smarter™.
Note:
 Sprint, Verizon and their affiliate providers are operating on a CDMA 
network which does not accept GSM phones.  Too bad for them.







LUNA
 Mobile is a USA-based start-up company whose mission is to provide the 
consumer with high-quality feature-rich mobile phones at a fraction of 
the cost of the big guys.  We are tired of carriers that force phone owners into contracts and lock your expensive hardware to their system.  If you buy the Luna ROX V8, you get to choose your carrier.
With
 your support to fund our initial production, we can bring this vision 
to reality, offering the consumer a new way of communicating.  Simple is smarter.
Be
 a backer on Indiegogo today and get VIP access to the first 
manufacturing run of a premium-class smartphone at a price well below 
any of our competitors.



As with all crowdfunding projects, we need your help in spreading the 
word on this exciting new product.  So if you like what you see, please 
SHARE this campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, etc. using 
the controls near the top of this page.  You can also stay connected 
using the icons near the bottom of the page.  Thank you!




1. CONTRIBUTIONS & PAYMENT2. AVAILABILITY & DELIVERY3. PRODUCT & SOFTWARE4. WARRANTY & RETURNS1. CONTRIBUTIONS & PAYMENTHow do I add shipping charges to my order?  Once you’ve selected your Perk, click Additional Gift, select Custom, and add the appropriate amount indicated for shipping based on your location.I forgot to add shipping to my Perk - what should I do?  No problem! If you'd like to add funds for shipping, you can make another contribution and select "No Perk, Just a Contribution."  We will match your contribution with your original order and you’re all set.I did not choose a Perk when contributing, but I paid the whole sum for the Luna ROX V8.  Do I get a phone anyway?  If you made a contribution for the Luna ROX V8, but forgot to add a Perk, please contact us at support@lunahq.com.What if I want to order a quantity not listed as a Perk?  Just add the required amount to your contribution and we will contact you for details.Does the Perk price include VAT or other taxes?  No, contributors must pay any taxes and duties related to the selected destination country.  Tax, customs fees and other applicable customs charges are not included in the price of the Luna ROX V8. Once we get close to the delivery date, we will ask you to confirm your shipping address and we will provide further instructions on handling VAT or any other applicable taxes.I’m having problems making a contribution, please help?  If you faced problems when making a contribution, please check common contribution errors.  You can also email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to help with any issues.2. AVAILABILITY & DELIVERYWhat if you fail to reach the funding target?  We’ve set our goal to be highly achievable and to enable optimum pricing for you.  If for some reason we don’t reach our target, we will still fulfill your order.  When will you ship the Luna ROX V8?  Assuming our campaign reaches its goal, we expect to ship the first phones in March, 2015.  Please note that the delivery date is subject to change.  In any event, we will keep you updated on the schedule by e-mail.If I take part in the Luna ROX V8 campaign, will I get the phone before others? Absolutely!  You will be among the first to get the Luna ROX V8.  We'll ship the phones in the order of contributions made through Indiegogo.Will the Luna ROX V8 also be available for general sale or only through Indiegogo?  Only through Indiegogo during the campaign.  Shortly after the campaign is over, we will be offering the phone through retailers and online at a minimum price of $399.  The Indiegogo contributors will get the phone first and with the lowest price at the time of delivery.  Rest assured, the phone will never have a retail price of $299 again.After contributing to the campaign, what happens next? Do you just deliver the phone to me?  When you contribute to the Luna ROX V8 campaign we will ensure that you receive all the latest information about the project as it progresses.  Once we get close to the delivery date, we will ask you to confirm your shipping address and we will provide further instructions on handling VAT or any other applicable taxes.  In the meantime be sure to follow us on Facebook and Twitter.3. PRODUCT & SOFTWAREWhat countries and mobile networks will support the Luna ROX V8?  The Luna ROX V8 is an open device, not locked to any particular network. It works in all countries that provide GSM/3G/LTE-based network services.  It will also support the two LTE standards to provide 4G mobile broadband connectivity around the world (subject to network availability and data fees).  The Luna ROX V8 is also a quad-band phone (850/900/1,800/1,900 MHz) allowing our customers to travel internationally and use the same handset.Can the phone’s features or specifications change before delivery?  As in any crowdfunding campaign, changes are possible.  We reserve the right to make changes in described features, specifications, and delivery date estimations, and to introduce software features and functionality at a later date.4.WARRANTY & RETURNSWhat is your warranty policy?  LUNA stands proudly behind the quality of our products and guarantees to the original purchaser that our product shall be free from defects in material or workmanship for a period of one year.  This warranty applies to the product under normal use and is subject to all product usage documentation.I am not happy with the Luna ROX V8, can I return it?  You may return the Luna ROX V8 within 14 days of receipt for a full refund.  Please note that return shipping, including any customs or other charges as applicable, will be the responsibility of the sender.  To request a return merchandise authorization (RMA), simply send an email to support@lunahq.com.  Please indicate clearly in the subject and body of the message “RETURN”, providing any relevant information including your Indiegogo contribution number, contribution date and payment method utilized.  We will provide you with detailed RMA instructions.------------------------------My question wasn't answered on this campaign page, what to do?If you have more questions or simply just want to know Luna Mobile better, please visit our website LunaHQ.com and/or follow us on Facebook and Twitter!

story:
Most of today’s cold wallets are storage oriented and PC connected, providing little convenience but the risks still exist. Cryptocurrency owners are seeking the ideal secure wallet on the market. For them, the ideal would be a secure daily trading tool that is mobile-oriented, fully featured and supports multiple currencies. Security, functionality, and usability are becoming the defining features of the next generation cold wallets.

 

ELLIPAL is the perfect crypto management solution. A cold wallet that is mobile-oriented and convenient to use thanks to its companion App. It extremely secure due to its use of hardware and software to protect your assets, and allows for seamless management of your accounts, exchanges, and provides you with up-to-date crypto news. It is the ultimate fusion of user convenience and secure cryptocurrency storage.

Interested in writing or featuring the ELLIPAL in one of your upcoming articles or reviews? You can reach out to us at: info@ellipal.com.

 ELLIPAL has featured in:

ELLIPAL has signed strategic cooperation agreements with DAD(Decentralized advertising), CoinWallet, MMHA(Malaysia Mobile Hardcore Alliance), ARP,IoTeX and Lakeside Crypto. Through these win-win cooperation, we will join hands towards better serving ELLIPAL users. 

Strategic Cooperation Partners:

 

Unlike traditional cold wallets that must be connected to a computer, the ELLIPAL cold wallet works seamlessly with its companion App to allow exchanges, trades, and account management on your mobile phone anytime, anywhere.

 

Keep your private keys and cryptocurrency secure with a reliable cold wallet that will stop any hacking attempts and only allow you to access it. Built with advanced features to provide ultimate convenience without sacrificing security, you will be able to access your crypto whenever you want while also stopping hackers and thieves.

ELLIPAL is 100% isolated from the internet making it hack-proof. It blocks all attempts that try to connect it to a network.

ELLIPAL also protects your valuable information and assets by storing your private keys securely inside the hardware trust zone using strong cryptography. Your private key never expose to outside.

If the wallet detects any security breach, all data will be erased automatically.

 

QR code scan is the only means to exchange information between ELLIPAL wallet and ELLIPAL phone app. Being manual and visual, this data exchange process is under your full awareness and total control

To ensure security we added a multi-step passwords verification for you to log in before accessing your accounts.

 

Using  ELLIPAL is very simple. Following the intuitive UI, you can check the status of your accounts, recover data via mnemonics, or import new accounts and even check transaction records.

 

Creating an account is an easy process - just choose your cryptocurrency to create a new account.

When you set up your account you will be asked to record the mnemonics which are used to recover your account.

 

Select the account you wish to connect to, then select “Connect App”.  The cold wallet will generate a unique QR code that you have to scan with your phone to connect to the App and synchronize the information.

 

ELLIPAL works seamlessly with its companion App allowing you to manage your accounts, connect to exchanges through your smartphone and keeps you updated with real-time market information.

 

ELLIPAL is compatible with major traded cryptocurrencies (BTC ,BCH ,ETH and ERC20 tokens). Our team is currently working to bring support to even more cryptocurrencies in the future.

 

Whether you are an Android or iOS device user, ELLIPAL and the ELLIPAL App are designed to work with all mobile platforms.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Product FAQ

 Q: What is cold wallet 2.0? 
 A: Cold wallet 2.0 stands for the next generation of cold wallet. Cold wallet 2.0 is mobile-oriented, safe and gives more freedom to users.
 

Q: How does ELLIPAL stay completely internet isolated?
 A: The security of the transactions on ELLIPAL is ensured by scanning QR code for private key signature so it is impossible to connect to the internet. Furthermore, the hardware is designed to completely isolate itself from any connection. 
 

Q: Why QR Code connection safer than USB connection?
A: There is a possibility of cold wallet getting infected when it is connected to an infected USB port. There is no physical link when it comes to QR code.

 

Q: What happens to my assets when I lose or damage the cold wallet? 
A: Your assets will be safe as it is impossible to connect ELLIPAL to the internet and all data will be removed after several failed password attempts. To recover your assets, simply acquire a new ELLIPAL and input your account’s mnemonic.  
 

Q: How many kinds of crypto does ELLIPAL support?
A: Currently, ELLIPAL supports more than 1500 currencies including BTC,BCH,ETH and all ERC20 tokens. ELLIPAL will support more in the next few months.
 

Q: How many accounts can I create with ELLIPAL ?
A: There is no limit on how many accounts you can store with ELLIPAL.

 

General FAQ

Q: How can I contact your team?
A: You can contact us at info@ellipal.com.


Q: How many countries do you ship to?
A: We are offering global shipping to all of our backers.

 

Q: Can I change my address before you ship?
A: You can log into your Indiegogo account and change your address. If you encounter any issues contact us at info@ellipal.com.

 

Q: Can I claim multiple perks?
A: Yes, you can claim as many perks as you’d like.

 

Q: Do you offer refunds?
A: We will be offering refunds while the campaign is active. After the campaign ends we will not be offering refunds.
