story:
ONE CORD DOES IT ALL, AND IT DOES IT FROM ANY DIRECTION!  (All perks come with 1.8m (6 foot) Cords)

 

ONE CORD CHARGES BOTH iPHONE and MOST ANDROIDS (micro) WITH ONE SINGLE HEAD!  NO PARTS TO CHANGE OR LOOSE!!!

Tired of trying to plug in your charging cord and and having it turned the wrong way!

WELL THOSE DAYS ARE OVER!

INTRODUCING THE WORLDS FIRST TRIPLE BLIND CHARGING CORD!

YES IT DOES NOT MATTER WHICH WAY YOU STICK IT IN!!!!!

Contact us at Support@cordsofsteel.com

FULLY REVERSIBLE USB!  NO MORE GUESSING! 

FULLY REVERSIBLE LIGHTNING (iPhone, iPad, iPod)

FULLY REVERSIBLE MICRO USB (Android, headsets, speakers, game controllers) WOW!

                   

The Right Angle Cord is made from Stainless Steel Spring Metal

and constructed of the quality material unparalleled in the industry!

​NO FRAY!

ANIMAL PROOF!

VIRTUALLY KID PROOF!

*Please note the newer version of the cord is the one depicted here in the above photograph and differs from the cord in the video due to a late change in manufacturing and is of exceptional quality.  

   

 

WHY IS THE CORD CALLED A TRIPLE BLIND CHARGING CORD?

  • It Fits in your charging cube, wall adapter or computer both directions on the USB A side.
  • It fits your Micro USB Devices (Android, Bluetooth, Game Remotes ect.) both Directions.
  • It fits your lightning devices (iPhone, iPad, iPod ect.) both directions.
  • No parts to change no parts to lose! One cord One head!

​

​

WHY THE RIGHT ANGLE?

Having the cord off to the side prevents damage to the charging head especially if drop it on the cord itself! 

SO WHATS MY STORY! 

  • My Name is Cliff and I am the Co-Founder of Cord's of Steel that brought you the breakout success "The Freedom Charger".  We funded The Freedom Charger in only 34 minutes almost one year ago and despite the fact the we are extreamly proud of our first launch I honestly believe we have changed the game with our new charging cord "The Right Angle! 
  • What is the right angle? The Right Angle is the most versatile and easy to use all in one charging cord ever to be brought to the market!  It works with any Lightning or Micro USB connection and is fully reversible!  Imagine not worrying what way it goes into an android or iPhone!  Our unique design allows us to charge most products on the market without changing out any part which means no parts to lose!
  • We need your help to get this awesome product out to the masses and get yourself a kick ass charging cord!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Let me break it down for you:

  • We are currently in production so you will get your cord as soon as the campaign ends!
  • You will have to fend off your friends and family because they are going to want your cord!
  • All funds will go directly to inventory and operating cost..

The Impact

This will change the way you charge your phone and accessories:

  • Imagine only needing one cable to charge ALL your devices when you ad a C type Adapter to your order!
  • Imagine never having to worry what direction you put either end of the charger into its port!

Risks & Challenges

We really don't have any risk involved.  We are currently in production!

The only risk is all your friends trying to steal your Right Angle Cord!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute you can still share with your friends and family on Social Media!

Thank you for your awesome support!

You will have to fend off your friends and family because they are going to want your cord!
All funds will go directly to inventory and operating cost..





The Impact

Imagine only needing one cable to charge ALL your devices when you ad a C type Adapter to your order!
Imagine never having to worry what direction you put either end of the charger into its port!



Risks & Challenges
We really don't have any risk involved.  We are currently in production!
The only risk is all your friends trying to steal your Right Angle Cord!

story:
Hi, everyone!We are Minds Wear, mainly university students from different majors and teachers specializing in different fields, from  Nanjing, China, especially Nanjing University of the Arts.  We are not science professors but we all have our own talents. 

Thanks a lot! Our supporters! With your help, let's can go futher! See more supporters in the back! We've got many new suppoters here! !


Perks Renew here!!!

We are here because we believe that life can be better with technology and technology can be better with art.

Our campaign is to raise money for the production of the 1st batch of the 1st version of Rilove. Now we have already designed everything of the ring, from the outer face to the prototype. 
Rilove, as the smarty ring that got rid of the ordinary functions such as the recording of heart rate or deep sleep or tracking, has developed a series of new functions with fashion and art that focus more on the habits of the young group. If Minds Wear goes well in the future, we'll dig it futher at home appliances.
This is the expression of our attitude and it's not only the beginning of Minds Wear, but also an innovation of our generation. You deserve a better life. Join us!

    A FEASIBLE PIECE !! NO MIRAGE. CHECK THIS OUT!!
    Some factories in China have been enquired. One of them in Shenzhen, China, has made sure that it is feasible which means that it can totally be produced. With Rilove smart ring, you can get instant alerts without touching the screen. You don't wanna miss it!


As it is going on, we've found Rilove has been far more that what we predicted. We're looking for more possibilities in other fields from the perspective of the art, which inspires us to open our contemporary life, to keep exploring the unknown and to discover the meanings of our life.

What We Need & What You Get

 We need about $50,000 for the production of the  1st batch of the 1st version of Rilove. It'll go for the production and the package.  We'll do our best for our first group of supporters. Now we pay more attention to the products and the supporters. 

If we fail our goal, we'll still fight for it to the end and you can keep getting the latest information of our development by visiting our facebook to or contacting with us through e-mail. If it runs smoothly, you're going to see the 2nd, 3rd versions of Rilove with more functions and ideas in the future.( Our community on facebook: Minds Wear)

Challenges

According to the contemporary technology, the size of Rilove smart ring has inevitably limited  the function and finally we chose to put several core functions into it. It's very important to avoid any bad influence towards the appearance and user experience. Luckily, we have professional advisers at the aspects of technology. 
At first, due to lack of experience in this project,  we have 've been through a lot at the aspects of the design, material choice and internal structure, even went to Shen Zhen for the technical help, one of the most mature manufacturing zone on the Earth, manufacturers for iphone,  Samsung and Huawei, etc over there.  We're now in partnership with one of them. 
Why don't you join us and leading the fashion trend while enjoy the benefits of Rilove smart ring?

About our future:

We're trying to make progress in Mobile Social and Smarty Furniture. The 1st preconceived function is meant for making friends with accuracy. There'll be an app for the ring and you can upload some information you want for your ideal friend and so do others. Once you turn on the function in the app and your information is matched, the ring will shake at the same time though at different places. There are way too more functions in our plan. Welcome to our facebook community to learn more!

Normal Q & As:

Shipping: For INTERNATIONAL orders, you may need to add extra $20 for postage. For the claimed perks in which the postage hasn't been charged , we may charge the postage  when we are shipping. Thanks for your understanding. 

Estimated Shipping date: September.

Water Resistence: Daily using.

Material: Not certain yet. It still needs a professional test to determine the final material which needs your fund to support but it is totally feasible with high-quality plastic. We're hoping that the front part for the LED lights be high-quality glass.

Ways to contact us: Facebook community: Minds Wear. Our team members' message in the introduction as you can see.

More supporters here!

Just part of it...Thank you all again for your support!


Tell others the cool ring on Indiegogo. We deserve the better!!

FACEBOOK COMMUNITY: Minds Wear
story_txt:
Hi, everyone!We are Minds Wear, mainly university students from different majors and teachers specializing in different fields, from  Nanjing, China, especially Nanjing University of the Arts.  We are not science professors but we all have our own talents. 
Thanks a lot! Our supporters! With your help, let's can go futher! See more supporters in the back! We've got many new suppoters here! !










Perks Renew here!!!




We are here because we believe that life can be better with technology and technology can be better with art.


Our campaign is to raise money for the production of the 1st batch of the 1st version of Rilove. Now we have already designed everything of the ring, from the outer face to the prototype. Rilove, as the smarty ring that got rid of the ordinary functions such as the recording of heart rate or deep sleep or tracking, has developed a series of new functions with fashion and art that focus more on the habits of the young group. If Minds Wear goes well in the future, we'll dig it futher at home appliances.This is the expression of our attitude and it's not only the beginning of Minds Wear, but also an innovation of our generation. You deserve a better life. Join us!






A FEASIBLE PIECE !! NO MIRAGE. CHECK THIS OUT!!Some factories in China have been enquired. One of them in Shenzhen, China, has made sure that it is feasible which means that it can totally be produced. With Rilove smart ring, you can get instant alerts without touching the screen. You don't wanna miss it!






As it is going on, we've found Rilove has been far more that what we predicted. We're looking for more possibilities in other fields from the perspective of the art, which inspires us to open our contemporary life, to keep exploring the unknown and to discover the meanings of our life.

What We Need & What You Get We need about $50,000 for the production of the  1st batch of the 1st version of Rilove. It'll go for the production and the package.  We'll do our best for our first group of supporters. Now we pay more attention to the products and the supporters. If we fail our goal, we'll still fight for it to the end and you can keep getting the latest information of our development by visiting our facebook to or contacting with us through e-mail. story:
WTFast (What the Fast) is the world leader in online game acceleration with over 140k registered users and supporting over 800+ games.  For some time now our clients have been asking us if we can do the same thing for general web surfing.  Watching YouTube videos or just browsing... you want to do that fast too, right?

We have put this project online to judge the demand for and also to help to optimize our network for an accelerated VPN service.  Unlike traditional VPN services, the primary focus of WTFast VPN will be to reach unmatched levels of speed and security for our users.  Our talented team will achieve this through our extensive experience with WTFast.

We have set $10k as our target to reach with pledges because we determined that it is what we would need to launch a small scale VPN operation.  However, the ideal outcome will be significantly more money raised through your pledges.  The more pledges we receive, the more AWESOME we can make the VPN network. 

Your pledges shape the VPN network.  Simply put, you get to vote how we set up our VPN network.  We will set up our servers around the globe to help provide optimal results for the regions with the most votes.  The larger your pledge, the more votes for your region.  For the upper tier pledges, we will even go out of our way to set up a server as close as possible to where you live! 

Fame.  For larger pledges we will give you credit at our website, and maybe even name a server/IP after you.  Go down in history as one of the people who helped start WTFast VPN!

Enhanced Security.  Our primary focus with the first build out of the VPN service will be to deliver a FAST service.  With enough pledges, we can accelerate development of enhanced security features that will make your online surfing safer and more secure than you ever thought possible.

Thanks for helping to start WTFast VPN - we are looking forward to your support!

Stop Internet Censorship and Traffic Shaping.  This is one of the clear additional benefits that we can offer to the users of our VPN service.  By using our service, you will be encrypting your Internet usage to enable you to access content from anywhere in the world.  Now you can enjoy the latest sports coverage and geo-locked TV programming without restrictions.  Surf where you want, when you want, FREEDOM!  =)


Rob Bartlett is the CEO/Founder of WTFast, which was launched December 2009 and has grown to over 140k registered users and supporting over 800 games. 

Rob is a serial Internet entrepreneur, doing business online since 1997 with extensive experience in online marketing, customer support and developing complex automated online systems.

 

 

March 28 Update - A HUGE thank you for the pledges we have received so far.  This is a tremendous help and we are glad to see that we have the ball rolling now.  If you have friends that you think might be interested in pledging, please tell them.  The more pledges we have, the more awesome we can make the launch and the better we can make the VPN infrastructure.  This is YOUR VPN service, let's make it as awesome as humanly possible!

March 31 Update - Today we passed $1000 in pledges, thanks guys, your pledges will help ensure a successful launch.  We really appreciate your support!

April 11 Update - A huge thanks to Eclipse Gaming Cafe in Kuwait for their generous contribution!  We keep edging closer to our goal, thank you everyone for your support!

story:
Who am I and what do I want?

      My name is Jack Belliveau I am a fabricator, an artist, an engineer and a dreamer.  I have several degrees, Including an Associates in Business, a Masters in Film and Television (working on the PhD). I am also a certified welder (MIG, TIG) a former ASE Certified Mechanic, and a Certified Personal Trainer.
     This campaign is to help me complete a project that I first conceived over 13 years ago while sitting in 7th grade English class. A self reliant, sealed electric vehicle that could maintain constant power/charge without any need for plugs or cords. A vehicle Currently being called EVC-1 (Electric Vehicle Conversion 1)
     My goal is to fabricate a second prototype of my power plant/battery/controller/motor assembly that can be fitted as a drop in kit for nearly any roadworthy vehicle and be able to be installed by most mechanically inclined people. Imagine driving your own vehicle to the beach for the weekend and not spending more on fuel than the Hotel costs.

 

Where I'm at so far:

     Up to this point I have designed and fabricated a test module as well as a small scale prototype for the initial test vehicle. Both were successful at proving my concept but the small scale prototype was only enough to power a pretty cool (If I do say so myself) powerwheels car.

     Here is what I'm asking from you...$1. That is all, I will not ask for anybody to give more than that(but, if you feel like you must, I won't deny you that happiness). I need $15,000 in order to build the initial kit and get it roadworthy via a donor vehicle, however this project is, what I like to call a community project. I don't think it would be fair to offer super cool perks to people who can afford to donate more, but don't truly believe in my dream when someone who maybe can only afford $1 believes in my cause ten times more.

     All of the money collected will be used in the purchase of raw materials and shop time. My team and I will be doing most of, if not all of the fabrication and machining from raw materials . We just don't haveall of  the equipment needed to do so, but have equipment and shop space we can rent available to us.

     I believe that there are 15,000 people in this world who have dreams. 15,000 people who want to see some one else succeed in one of theirs. All I need is 15,000 people to donate $1 to my project.

 

What about the 15,000 dreamers?

     Everybody who donates will have their names shadow painted onto one of the many body surfaces of the vehicle as well as included in the credits of the coinciding documentary film. But wait, there's more. each person will recieve a digital copy of the film, as well as a photo print of the vehicle and an upclose shot of their name placement.

Where I want to be at:

     My goal is to have the first roadworthy prototype good to go for initial testing by February 20th 2013 at which time we will journey from Salisbury, NC to Myrtle Beach, SC non stop having worked out all of the bugs by June 1st 2013. At that point I will gather my team of mechanics and fellow film makers and we will take the EVC-1 Key West Florida where, with chase vehicles in tow we will drive nonstop to Los Angeles California. Stopping only to change out drivers while others eat or sleep in one of the follow vehicles.

     This entire journey, as well as the entire fabrication and testing process will be documented and compiled into a documentary about my dream, and about how the world, as a community can band together and make a positive change.

    **** In order to fund the documentary I plan on either starting another Indiegogo fundraiser, selling advertisement space on the chase vehicles(no advertisements will be placed on the EVC-1) or organizing a local fundraiser with the help of the vast film and arts community right here in the Salisbury, Charlotte area.****

 

My end game:

     Through my development I would like to be able to produce an easy to install, reliable, safe and revolutionary Electric Vehicle conversion kit that I can produce for less than $7,500 per unit while at the same time creating a unique, informative and entertaining look into the development of a dream.

story:
3 out of 4 teen girls feel depressed, guilty and shameful after spending just 3 minutes looking through a fashion magazine.

Time to take a stand. 

MissRepresentation.org is partnering with body image experts at Emer.ge to create a mobile app to fight sexist and damaging media and celebrate the positive.

From Go Daddy commercials during the Super Bowl to a billboard at a bus stop in New York City, hashtag #NotBuyingIt has been used by tens of thousands on Twitter to challenge brands and companies which rely on misrepresentations of gender and extreme sexual objectification to sell their products.

Now we're taking it to the next level! 

We're putting the power back in the hands of the consumer. In a media environment where women continue to be valued primarily for their youth, beauty and sexuality, it's time we took a collective stand.

With this app users will be able to upload sexist or inspiring media they see, scroll through images posted by others, and immediately let brands on Twitter know how they feel! 

SAMPLE IMAGE:

       

The app will connect individuals to an international network of committed supporters, so that anyone - whether they have 10 or 10,000 Twitter followers - can start and win their own campaigns. With the click of a button you can easily target #NotBuyingIt messages towards companies sending sexist and damaging messages and recruit people around the world to support you - making certain your voice is heard!

Using GPS technology we will pinpoint where the worst advertising is coming from and which communities are most active in fighting back. You'll have the ability to document all the billboards and posters impacting your local community, putting pressure on brands and local officials to respond. 

Our scoreboard will keep track of progress in real time, ranking which products are deemed most sexist by the community and which ones we support.

SAMPLE MAP and SAMPLE SCOREBOARD:

     

The #NotBuyingIt app will gather the passion and energy of people worldwide to end sexist and limiting portrayals of gender in the media! We've already seen companies change their practices after receiving a few hundred tweets, but by bringing us all together, this app will put us in a position to truly shift media culture.

For too long mainstream media has been a one-way stream of images and information. They create, we consume. But with modern technology it no longer has to be that way: we have the right and opportunity to talk back and influence the media we buy.

Sexism sells because it's what's being sold. We deserve more and better options. And with this app we will show the media that there is a way to make money without demeaning more than half the world.

Graphic by LoveSocial for MissRepresentation.org

Today's American teenagers consume nearly 11 hours of media every day. And too many of those messages and images portray women in a degrading light, perpetuate unrealistic body ideals, or use extreme stereotypes of masculinity to define men.

Time to call it out and make a change.

Thanks to early support from the Jacki Zehner and the Zehner Family Foundation, who pledged $6,000 towards this app, we only need $20k more to make it happen!

We estimate that we need $26k to be able to develop and release a #NotBuyingIt mobile app to empower millions worldwide to call-out sexist media wherever and whenever they see it. About 90% of the funds will go directly to the developers designing and creating the application, and the rest will help us market the completed product to the general public.

We promise you that every dollar you contribute will go towards this project, and the more we raise beyond the $26k goal, the better and more effective the end product will be!  

Other Ways To Get Involved:

Spread the word about this campaign! Share this page far and wide. Click below to tweet:

Tweet

Then join the conversation on Facebook, where nearly 100,000 people are debating issues of gender representation, body image and the consequences of harmful media daily.

And use #NotBuyingIt on Twitter whenever you see sexist media!



Some of the exciting and unique gifts available to donors:

  • #NotBuyingIt Stickers - to help you tag sexism in the real world!
  • Limited Edition MissRepresentation.org Jewelry
  • Official MissRepresentation.org Youth T-Shirts
  • A personal video message from Second Lady of California, Miss Representation (2011) Director and CEO/Founder of MissRepresentation.org, Jennifer Siebel Newsom
  • One-on-One mentoring sessions with Newsom or a member of the MissRepresentation.org team
  • Miss Representation (2011) memorabilia signed by Jennifer Siebel Newsom
  • A seat at the creative table behind the #NotBuyingIt App

During the 2013 Super Bowl - the most watched and tweeted about media event of the year - the #NotBuyingIt hashtag was used by thousands to reach over 4 million people on Twitter with a critique of sexism in the commercials. Go Daddy alone received over 7,000 #NotBuyingIt tweets during the game. It was an astounding display of what we’re capable of when we come together as a community to challenge misogyny, gender stereotypes and related harmful messages in the media.

Imagine what more we could do (and say) with this easy-to-use app at the fingertips of passionate and caring people worldwide! If 10,000 tweets during the Super Bowl can reach 4 million+ people, how much noise could 100,000 people with the #NotBuyingIt app make?

Here are some of the past successes this hashtag has had on Twitter:

  • Pressured Amazon.co.uk to remove a line of t-shirts promoting rape in under 24 hours
  • Forced America’s leading Halloween costume seller to change how it markets girls’ costumes
  • Pressured a solar company to rescind a sexist ad campaign and delete their Facebook page
  • Helped get Hallmark to remove a sexist greeting card in under 24 hours
  • Helped get two children’s books that promoted gender stereotypes removed from the shelves of Harrod’s in London in under 24 hours

Emer.ge's "Body Image Voice" web application will serve as a guide and inspiration for our new mobile design: 

 

About MissRepresentation.org:

After directing the award-winning Sundance documentary Miss Representation in 2011 - which premiered on the Oprah Winfrey Network and exposed how the misrepresentation of women in the media is leading to the underrepresentation of women in positions of power - Jennifer Siebel Newsom created MissRepresentation.org to empower ordinary individuals to continue challenging sexist media in their own lives.

About Emer.ge

Web & Mobile Apps / Games That Aim To Improve Health

The word “health” means something different to everyone. No matter how it is defined, for all of us, our health is significantly impacted by our own choices. Body image is a major influence on our choices. Emerge takes evidence-based programs that improve body image, eating disorders, and weight management and adapts them into interactive media and technologies aimed at transforming thoughts, perceptions and behaviors. Emerge programs aim to empower individuals to seek health and thriving as the desired endpoint, rather than unattainable appearance goals.

These unattainable appearance goals are often perpetuated by the media - appearance ideals are promoted and products are sold to glamourize those ideals and/or help individuals realize those ideas..no matter how harmful. The impact of harmful media exposure that glamorize ideas for body image, size, shape, youth, and optimum fitness, on body image and eating disorders is well documented in scientific research studies. Emerge seeks to develop apps that focus on the role that media and advertising play in shaping our ideals for health and beauty and gives consumers a voice in what media they find helpful and what media they find harmful.

Go Daddy alone received over 7,000 #NotBuyingIt tweets during the game. It was an astounding display of what we’re capable of when we come together as a community to challenge misogyny, gender stereotypes and related harmful messages in the media.
Imagine what more we could do (and say) with this easy-to-use app at the fingertips of passionate and caring people worldwide! If 10,000 tweets during the Super Bowl can reach 4 million+ people, how much noise could 100,000 people with the #NotBuyingIt app make?



Here are some of the past successes this hashtag has had on Twitter:


Pressured Amazon.co.uk to remove a line of t-shirts promoting rape in under 24 hours

Forced America’s leading Halloween costume seller to change how it markets girls’ costumes

Pressured a solar company to rescind a sexist ad campaign and delete their Facebook page

Helped get Hallmark to remove a sexist greeting card in under 24 hours

Helped get two children’s books that promoted gender stereotypes removed from the shelves of Harrod’s in London in under 24 hours

Emer.ge's "Body Image Voice" web application will serve as a guide and inspiration for our new mobile design: 



 
About MissRepresentation.org:

After directing the award-winning Sundance documentary Miss Representation in 2011 - which premiered on the Oprah Winfrey Network and exposed how the misrepresentation of women in the media is leading to the underrepresentation of women in positions of power - Jennifer Siebel Newsom created MissRepresentation.org to empower ordinary individuals to continue challenging sexist media in their own lives.
About Emer.ge

Web & Mobile Apps / Games That Aim To Improve Health
The word “health” means something different to everyone. No matter how it is defined, for all of us, our health is significantly impacted by our own choices. Body image is a major influence on our choices. Emerge takes evidence-based programs that improve body image, eating disorders, and weight management and adapts them into interactive media and technologies aimed at transforming thoughts, perceptions and behaviors. Emerge programs aim to empower individuals to seek health and thriving as the desired endpoint, rather than unattainable appearance goals.
These unattainable appearance goals are often perpetuated by the media - appearance ideals are promoted and products are sold to glamourize those ideals and/or help individuals realize those ideas..no matter how harmful. The impact of harmful media exposure that glamorize ideas for body image, size, shape, youth, and optimum fitness, on body image and eating disorders is well documented in scientific research studies. Emerge seeks to develop apps that focus on the role that media and advertising play in shaping our ideals for health and beauty and gives consumers a voice in what media they find helpful and what media they find harmful.

story:
The DreamCharger Story

DreamCharger is the world's newest, most innovative and greatest mobile power source that has been under research, design and development throughout the past year. 

  • The DreamCharger carries its name because it's not only a fantastic mobile power source, but also a dream for our future customers and ourselves.
  • We truly need your help with reading and sharing our campaign, and making a small contribution - in order for us to realize this dream. 
  • If you can't contribute with money - that's okay! Please use this campaign to learn more about the world of mobile power generation, and what we can offer good people like yourself. Spread the word about our campaign to your family and friends.
  • One year of research and design has gone towards mastering the intense details that the perfect mobile power source should promote. Our charger is a result of this effort.

From displaying the remaining charge & discharge times, to utilizing dual-USB output ports for you and a friend to charge multiple devices simultaneously - the DreamCharger is a product that people of modern populations throughout the world need. 

Imagine knowing the exact durations of time that your DreamCharger will require to discharge to empty, and charge until full. These unique features of the DreamCharger will save you loads of time, money and energy when you can't afford to miss a moment of your extremely busy life.

Having the precise charge & discharge details displayed directly on your DreamCharger's OLED panel will keep you consistently informed as to how much power your DreamCharger contains at all times - for the times that you need to charge your smartphone the most. We're setting you up with ALL of the information and powerful charging capabilities that you'll ever need to continue using your smartphone and tablet 24/7 for business, fun and your personal life. 

Never experience your smartphone or tablet "dying" ever again. Don't miss out on all of the potential that your electronic devices provide you with. You won't have to miss a single moment of life ever again when using the DreamCharger. 

The Impact

Smartphones. iPads. Tablets. They're essential pieces of our high-tech lifestyles. People everywhere are now relying on mobile power more than ever before.

But have you ever been in a situation when you needed immediate access to an electrical outlet, yet you couldn't find one? Maybe you were expecting an important phone call from someone, and then saw that your smartphone's battery was low. Or, maybe you occasionally forget to fully-charge your favorite tablet before leaving the house.

No one can afford to miss an important phone call, or struggle with using an iPad that has just 7% battery-life remaining..

Many of us run into these situations multiple times per week, if not each day. We've all been in these predicaments.

And our team is here to solve these issues before they happen. But we're doing more than just that. We're solving the problems that come with lacking access to mobile power - but we're also doing it in a beautiful way.

Here's what our team, and the DreamCharger will provide you with: 

Sharp Appearance

We offer a powerful, great-looking, and comfortably-held mobile charger. Our prototype is complete, and it looks amazing. With the DreamCharger, you'll be able to charge your mobile devices with serious power - AND you'll be able to do so in style. 

The DreamCharger displays information through an OLED (organic light-emitting diode) panel, which is hidden under a mirror-like cover. When the OLED isn't displaying information, you won't even see it. This adds a hint of mystique to the DreamCharger's image. The surface of the DreamCharger is painted with a UV (ultraviolet) coat which appears gorgeous, smooth and wear-resistant.

Each of the four corners of the DreamCharger are also arcuated, which makes it very gentle on the hands, and extremely comfortable to hold. The thickness of the plastic shell has also been expanded to 2mm, adding to the overall appeal, strength and comfort of our charger.

It's unheard of for technology this powerful to fit so comfortably within the palm of your hand, and look this good. You have to see and feel the DreamCharger for yourself to believe it. Once you use the DreamCharger just once - you'll never leave your home without one again. Whether you decide to keep one in your pocket, bag or purse, there will be days when you absolutely need to use your DreamCharger.



Impressive Batteries

The heart and lungs of our device consists of its three impressive battery cells. The battery cells make up the primary source of energy for the internal circuit, and also provide the output power for your personal high-tech electronic devices.

The DreamCharger uses the commonly known 18650 cylindrical lithium-ion batteries. Most laptops actually use these types of batteries. Therefore, they're some of the most mature and reliable batteries on the market. After testing all of the 18650 battery cells on the market, our team decided to utilize the SANYO UR18650F, which is a world-class battery cell with light-blue insulation rings, and red tubes.

The advantages of our batteries include utilizing an ultra-high discharge plateau - which provides a better conversion efficiency for the internal boost converter circuit. The batteries also have a low internal resistance of less than 45 milliohms, which increases discharging efficiency, and reduces the overall heat that's generated.  

This low self-discharge rate will preserve most initial energy when it's not in use. 


Our batteries offer a longer service life: meaning that more than 80% of the design capacity is reserved after 300+ charge/discharge cycles. The batteries are completely safe and secure. We've minimized the risk of explosion and spontaneous combustion. We've never experienced such an accident, nor have any accidents with the cells been reported so far. The typical capacity of a single SANYO UR18650F is 2600mAh. We've equipped the DreamCharger with three of these cells, equaling a total capacity of 7800mAh.

Dimensions & Weight

The battery pack's total dimensions are 54mm x 65mm x 18mm. Our three battery cells weigh a total of 141g. After minimizing the overall design as much as possible (down to the millimeter) we've achieved a total size of 67.6mm x 104mm x 22.7mm for the DreamCharger.

The overall size of the DreamCharger is only 39mm longer, 13.6mm wider, and 4.7mm thicker than its battery pack (approximately as big as two iPhone 4s'). The overall weight of the DreamCharger is 198g, or 57g heavier than the battery pack. 


We could have reduced the overall weight even more by minimizing the thickness of the plastic shell, but we didn't want to compromise the DreamCharger's strength & durability. 
Beyond the miniscule details - the DreamCharger is extremely lightweight for the power that it provides electronic devices with.   


Output Capacity

As mobile devices become bigger, faster and stronger - internal battery capacities must also increase as a result of this. More power is needed from external supplies to generate more powerful devices.

It has now even become commonplace for people to leave the house with multiple electronic devices. You may need to charge a smartphone and a tablet device at the same time, or share charging capabilities with a friend (be your friend's hero). 

Based on all of this, we've designed two standard (Type-A) USB output ports for the DreamCharger.

  • One of our ports is a low power output port, providing 5V, 1A maximum output, which can charge almost all mobile phones.
  • The other port is a high power output port, providing 5.2V, 2.4A maximum output, which can charge both mobile phones, and the latest pads/tablets.
The most powerful adapter that Apple equips the iPad with is a 5.2V/2.4A/12Watt adapter. Our high power output port is designed with this specification in mind, and is fully compatible with Apple's recognition standard. Therefore, all iPhones and iPads can be charged at their maximum current by using this port.


Efficiency

Higher efficiency means more energy output, and lower generated heat. A typical lithium-ion battery is 2.7V to 4.2V. To get between 5V and 5.2V output voltage, it needs the help of a boost converter circuit.

Most mobile power chargers use non-synchronous boost circuits, which means a lower cost, and a lower conversion efficiency (at around 80%). We didn't want to go down this low-quality route. We needed to achieve high-quality, and a high current output, in order to maximize efficiency, and to reduce the overall heat that is generated through our charger.

The DreamCharger utilizes a synchronous boost circuit, setting the average conversion efficiency at different loads ranging up to, or even higher than 90%. 

Automatic Recognition Adapters  

The charging current is typically set at a fixed rate for general mobile power. 
But sometimes, problems can occur because of this. Connecting mobile power to a computer's USB 2.0 port (to charge a device) can trigger protection of the computer, and even possibly damage the USB port. This happens because standard USB 2.0 ports on computers can only provide 0.5A maximum output current. 

To solve this, we've added an "automatic recognition circuit" to the DreamCharger. 

So when DreamCharger connects to an adapter, it will automatically identify one of the three generic, main types of chargers. The DreamCharger will then limit the current drawn from the corresponding charger type, preventing hazards from occurring.


User Interface - Working Status Indicator

DreamCharger uses a 0.96inch, 128 x 64 dot-matrix white light OLED panel.

OLED provides many benefits such as self-luminous, high contrast, high viewing angle, high temperature stability and more. This provides the DreamCharger with an excellent display. All of the information that the DreamCharger provides you with is displayed through text or icons in this OLED panel. The OLED panel vividly displays the working status of DreamCharger in four modes: standing by, discharging, charging or charge over.

If the DreamCharger enters protection operation mode, it will indicate: temp too high, temp too low, or overload. This protection function is considered to be the most comprehensive aspect of the DreamCharger.


User Interface - Remaining Capacity Indicator

Currently, almost all mobile power sources have to "guess" the remaining capacity by detecting their batteries' voltage levels. The problem with this method of guessing remaining capacities is that battery voltage may change based on different ranges of load. Therefore, this is nothing less than indicating the remaining capacity through LED's.

Voltage of an empty battery will even increase after releasing for some time. This will show that there is a LED lighting, but the mobile power shuts down, once connected to a load. Again, this isn't an accurate method of calculation.

Through our continuous efforts, the accuracy of detecting the remaining capacity of the DreamCharger reaches an incredible 1mAh.  Meanwhile, the remaining percentage is up to 1%, and is shown by both the battery icon and Arabic numbers.

The more accurate our remaining capacity indicator is, the better you can take advantage of the DreamCharger.


User Interface - Remaining Time for Charging and Discharging

When you use a mobile power charger for your electronic devices, you want to see accurate charging data. This is what keeps you from encountering possible unfortunate situations. Being aware of your real-time charging & discharging information at all times is about preventing bad outcomes from happening. It's about taking control.

You want to know the exact duration it will take for your DreamCharger to discharge to empty, and the duration of time that DreamCharger will need to be charged to full.

The benefit of 1mAh accurate precision is that if we simultaneously monitor the current flow into or out of the battery pack, we can get the remaining charge time to full, or discharge to empty.

We calculate these precise figures by using simple division: Remaining capacity (mAh) ÷ current. For example - when using the DreamCharger to charge a pad, assuming that the remaining capacity is full (7800mAh), and the current flowing out from the battery pack is 2000mA, the remaining time = 7800mAh÷2000mA = 3.9 hours. Similarly, when we charge the DreamCharger, assuming the remaining capacity is empty (0 mAh), and the current flowing into the battery pack is 1500mA, then the remaining time = (7800mAh - 0mAh) ÷ 1500mA = 5.2 hours. It's not too complex. DreamCharger can calculate these times with accuracy up to 1 minute, and will indicate these figures on-screen, automatically.

To go a little deeper, in order to prevent the current from jumping, the current is averaged. Thus, DreamCharger will take a few seconds to average the current at the initial stage of charging or discharging. The more stable the current, the more accurately the remaining time can be calculated for you.


User Interface - Battery Pack Status Monitor 

When you're driving a car, sometimes you may check your engine's temperature, your speed, and so on. This is all of the important information that is indicative of the health of your automobile.

DreamCharger provides an interface similar to this - but instead monitors your battery pack, cell temperature, remaining capacity, voltage, and current flown into or out. You can think of it as the automobile of your electronics. We also show the voltage's current value shown by the bar icon.

You can check the current and voltage VS maximum and minimum in the form of a simple ratio. For SANYO UR18650F (which the DreamCharger currently uses) the voltage 3V corresponds with an empty bar, while 4.2V corresponds with a full bar.

For the current bar, 0A corresponds with an empty bar, and 5A corresponds with full when discharging, or 2A corresponds with full when charging.

Tip: When charging your devices, you can roughly estimate the current flowing out of the USB port. The formula is simple: battery voltage × battery current × 90% ÷ 5V (when using 5V/1A output port, or 5.2V when using 5.2V/2.4A port). "90%" is the average efficiency of the internal boost circuit. 


User Interface - Advanced Information

With the increase of battery charge-discharge cycles, the full-charge capacity of the battery will decrease, due to the process of Li-ion. In the advanced information screen, you can not only check the charge-discharge cycle number, but also the full-charge capacity. You can roughly determine the health of the battery pack through these two variables.

Nowadays, when you travel by air or another form of transportation, security personnel may check the design capacity and other information of your mobile power - and only compliant ones can be taken.

We mark the design capacity of the battery pack, battery manufacturer/model, chemical type of the battery, production date, serial number and so on. Some information will simultaneously be indicated on the shell too. 


Operation - The Simpler, The Better

While it seems as if the DreamCharger has a rich functionality and information indicator screen, it's actually very easy to use our device. This provides you with a winning product that packs high-power and a soft learning curve.

We designed only one recoil-slide switch for DreamCharger as a power and function switch, considering that when you put a mobile power device in your bag or pocket, a push-switch may cause a malfunction trigger more easily. 


How to Discharge: The only thing you need to do is connect your device to the DreamCharger, and then short-slide the switch until DreamCharger is turned on. When the discharge is over (when your devices have been charged to 'full'), you'll have no need to manually turn off the DreamCharger. It will shut down automatically after 30 seconds, once detecting the end of the discharge.

How to Charge: When you want to charge the DreamCharger, simply connect an adapter to the charge port of DreamCharger. It will automatically turn on, begin to charge, and then automatically stop when charged to full.

In fact - you can charge the DreamCharger at anytime that you like. However the DreamCharger cannot be charged when being discharged simultaneously. DreamCharger would then stop discharging, and change its status to charging preferentially.

Switching Between Different Screens: Simply short-slide, or slide and hold for one second, then release. All screens can be switched by using this method. 


Low Self-Discharge - More Capacity Can be Maintained for Longer Periods of Time

Self-discharge comes from two aspects: one is battery self-discharge, and the other is the leakage current from the internal circuit, when it shuts down. SANYO UR18650F batteries (which the DreamCharger equips) has a very low self-discharge rate.

What we have to do is minimize the leakage current when shutting down. Through our continued exploration and testing, the leakage current is reduced to less than 1uA (0.001mA). Benefiting from these two aspects, the remaining capacity can be maintained for a long time, even if you don't use the DreamCharger for a long period of time.


Security - The Most Important Aspect of Mobile Power

Lithium is a highly reactive chemical compound, and the protection of the DreamCharger's batteries is highly important. We've placed security as a top priority from the very beginning of the DreamCharger project. Overall, the security aspect of DreamCharger can be divided into two categories of protection.

The first category of protection is the high level of input/output protection.

This includes input voltage/current protection, output current protection, and delayed start of charging protection. This is a conventional protection.

The second category is the low level of comprehensive protection for batteries, including better voltage/current protection, thermal protection, and charge-time protection. This level of protection generally isn't necessary unless the DreamCharger malfunctions.

 Of course, if all protection fails, there's a primitive layer of protection which the SANYO UR18650F itself provides. 

Input Protection: This protection will come into effect from the very moment that you connect a charger to the DreamCharger. The protection circuit will continue to detect the input voltage, then stop charging immediately, and disconnect the external charger once it's detected that the input voltage is higher than 6V. When you plug a damaged charger into the DreamCharger, this situation could occur.

The "automatic recognition circuit" that we've mentioned above can also be considered a form of input protection. DreamCharger will determine the type of charger that you connect to, and will then control the maximum input current, in order to protect the external adapter from being damaged. 

Delayed Start of Charging Protection: We can say that we're the first group of innovators in history to add this form of protection to mobile power. Many people may recognize the experience of the moment that you plug certain household appliances into a wall socket, and you see sparks appear. This happens because, in the absence of the plug being fully inserted into the socket, there's a relatively large contact resistance between the plug and the socket. If the device begins to work in maximum consumption at once, the large current combining with the large contact resistance will product a large amount of heat at the contact point - thereby damaging the plug or socket.

The maximum charging current for DreamCharger is 2A, which isn't exactly a small current. If the DreamCharger begins charging with such a large current at once, it may cause a similar failure.

So we performed a little improvement through starting the charging only after a short period of detecting the charger, once the plug has been fully inserted. This can protect your port contactor from burn or damage, because of the excessively large current and contact resistance. 

Output Protection: This protection comes into effect from the moment which you connect the DreamCharger to load. The protection circuit will continue to monitor the output current of 5V/1A and 5.2V/2.4A ports, and will then limit the output current once it's detected that the output current is greater than 1A or 2.4A. The OLED screen will indicate which port is overloading or short circuiting.

DreamCharger can then automatically restore output when you eliminate the overload or short circuit. This usually happens when you connect a large power consumption device into the 5V/1A port. This can be easily resolved by reconnecting the device to the 5.2V/2.4A port, which meets almost all of the specifications of handheld devices. 


Cell Voltage Protection: This protection is commonly referred to as "overcharge protection" or "overdischarge protection." It could be dangerous when improper charging causes cell voltage to become too high. It could also cause damage to the cell when excessive discharging causes cell voltage to become too low, too. The cell voltage protection circuit ensures that cell voltage stays within the normal, allowable range, and cuts off the connection of cell and circuits immediately once it's detected that the voltage is out of range.

The cell voltage will continue to rise by the charge procedure when you charge the DreamCharger. The internal charging circuit will control the cell voltage from exceeding 4.2V. The protection circuit will activate once it's detected that the cell voltage is higher than 4.35V, even if the charging circuit is failing.

Conversely, the cell voltage will decrease when DreamCharger is discharging by the decrease of the remaining capacity. Normally, DreamCharger will stop discharging and indicate a "too low remaining capacity" message on the OLED screen, when the remaining capacity becomes too low. However, if the software crashes or other anomalies occur, leading to the automatic stop due to discharge failure, the protection circuit will immediately activate, when detecting that the cell voltage is lower than 2.3V.

Cell Current Protection: There has to be a certain limitation for the current flown into or out of the cell, otherwise danger may occur, and the cell could be damaged if this limit is exceeded. The cell current protection circuit will disconnect the battery and circuit immediately, once it's detected that excessive charging or discharging of the current occurs. 

When charging the DreamCharger, charging circuit controls the current maximum of 2A. But even if the charging circuit fails, the protection circuit will disconnect the cell from the circuit once it's detected that the charging current has exceeded 3A. Conversely, the protection circuit will disconnect the cell from the circuit once it's detected that the discharging current exceeds 6A - especially when short circuits occur.

Cell Temperature Protection: There are different requirements of charging and discharging temperatures which are set by different types of battery chemistries, and manufacturing processes. Excessive temperatures can obviously be dangerous, and too low of temperatures may damage the cell. The cell temperature protection circuit will stop charging or discharging immediately once it's detected that the temperature of the cell is out of the allowable range. For the SANYO UR18650F, the temperature range for charging is 0℃ ~ 40℃ (32℉ ~ 104℉), and for discharging is -20℃ ~ 60℃ (-4℉ ~ 140℉). The cell temperature protection circuit will continuously monitor the cell temperature, and will stop charging or discharging immediately once the temperature exceeds the allowable range, while also indicating a temperature message on the OLED screen. 

Tip: In some emergency situations, you may need the DreamCharger to work outside of the permitted temperature range. You can temporarily make the DreamCharger work outside the allowable range if necessary. However, we strongly recommend against this practice. The method of how to achieve this function will be indicated in the instruction manual. 


Charging Duration Protection: The charging duration from empty to full will not exceed over 16 hours, when even connecting the DreamCharger to a standard USB 2.0 port (which only provides 500mA maximum current). The charging duration protection circuit will stop charging once the charging duration reaches approximately 26 hours if the charging circuit detects failure. Overcharging could cause danger. 

Pressure Valve Protection: This ultra-low level of protection is provided by the SANYO UR18650F itself. We know that explosions are caused instantly, and generate enormous pressure. The pressure valve of the 18650 Li-ion cell is typically designed in a  position near the positive electrode. Once the cell's internal pressure rises to a dangerous level, the pressure valve will then disconnect the positive electrode and release its internal pressure. It will permanently damage the cell once this protection is triggered, but can guarantee the cell from facing danger. SANYO UR18650F has the most stable quality of pressure valve on the market, and we couldn't find that this type of Li-ion cell had experienced any form of explosion or spontaneous combustion ever before. 

Tip: Although we've mentioned many types of protection, they can also be divided into hardware and software-levels of protection. Hardware-level protection has no need to rely on the software running. This means that even if the software crashes, the hardware-level protection will still be active. It's the most reliable form of protection. The software-level protection needs to rely on the software running, and will fail once the software crashes. All the types of protection listed above are hardware-level protection except the cell temperature protection. The cell temperature protection is a software-level protection. 

DreamCharger Disassembly (Updated on 12/15/2014)

Please find more details behind DreamCharger in the "Updates".

We'll continue to update, such as the disassembly, technical details, the ways we intend to ensure high-quality for you, etc.


A Dancing DreamCharger without its "Coat" (Updated on 12/17/2014)



What We Need & What You'll Get

We need your help, but we're going to help you out too. Here are the details of what we need to turn the dream of DreamCharger into a reality for you:

We're aiming for an overall campaign fundraising goal of $10,000. We've been so focused on perfecting the immaculate quality of the world's greatest mobile power source, that our costs have become a little bit high. We're mainly raising this money to craft a superior, high-quality mold that we will use to produce all future DreamChargers, Additionally, the money that's raised will also go towards the equipment, materials, packaging, and expenses associated with creating the first round of DreamChargers. Our team truly hopes that you can help. We also hope that you can give us your feedback and thoughts on the DreamCharger. We're open to hearing what you have to say. Please reach out to our team with any comments, questions or kind words.

Here are the PERKS of donating to our campaign.

  • $1 - You took away a little bit of knowledge on the science behind mobile power generation.
  • $5 - Turn on your DreamCharger in style! We will compile the Software that you can display Your Very Own Logo on, each time that the DreamCharger is turned on. Logo needs to be any 128 x 64 dot matrix image in monochrome that you send to us.
  • Please design your logo or have a friend create one for you (per the specified format requirements) then send it to us. 


  • $50 - You'll receive our EARLY BIRD DreamCharger & 0.5 Meter Type-A USB to Type-Micro USB Cable. This early bird package includes shipping charges at this price. You'll pay a flat price of $50, for a limited time only. This package is limited to the first 50 buyers.
  • $50 - You can become one of the first users of DreamCharger in the world. You'll receive a Standard Edition DreamCharger & 0.5 Meter Type-A USB to Type-Micro USB Cable. This cable can be used to charge the Dreamcharger by connecting an adapter to it, or for directly charging your devices if they contain a type-micro charging and communication port. Enjoy the DreamCharger's powerful experience that's completely different from any other mobile power in the world. Add $7 for international delivery. Shipped free in China.
  • Customers can choose their favorite color of DreamCharger by coordinating the correct color code (by typing R+R or B+W etc. when ordering this perk).


  • $60 - For the hardware enthusiasts out there, you'll receive an Indiegogo Limited Edition CRYSTAL Version of the DreamCharger. This will be a DreamCharger with a fully transparent shell*, so that you can see the SANYO UR18650F cells and all internal components clearly. Only 100 of these will be created. You'll acquire a piece of DreamCharger history by choosing this campaign donation package. International postage not included. Add $7 for international delivery. Shipped free in China.
        *Mirror-like cover will still be translucent. 


  • $95 - You'll receive Two Standard Edition DreamCharger's & Two 0.5 Meter Type-A USB to Type-Micro USB Cables. Give a DreamCharger package to a friend or family member, and make their day. Add $12 for international delivery. Shipped free in China.
  • $225 - You're getting Five DreamChargers. You're a very social guy or girl with many friends! It would be pretty embarrassing if your DreamCharger were to be snatched by one of your friend's (when you were showing them its beauty). You can simply order enough DreamChargers to allow each of your friends to "rob" them from you. We'll customize the software to display one logo for you for free, so that they'll never forget that their DreamCharger was "robbed" from you! 
  • Please select your favorite DreamCharger colors by indicating the correct color codes when ordering this perk. International postage not included. Add $25 for international delivery. Shipped free in China.
  • $2250 - Here's the Small Business Pack. You operate a small company, and want to treat your employees extremely kindly. You'll receive 50 DreamChargers shipped to you with your own free logo added. Worldwide free shipping included.

FAQ:

1. Q.) Why does the DreamCharger equip three battery cells, but not more or less?

A.) Less cells, like two, only have 5200mAh of design capacity, which seems to be too small. Conversely, more cells - like four (because it will have a larger design capacity) means that the larger dimensions and weight will take a longer time to charge to full. When considering these factors, we decided that it would be the more appropriate choice to equip the DreamCharger with three cells. 

2. Q.) Why not design the adapter inside of DreamCharger so that it can charge by being plugged directly into a wall socket?

A.) This would increase a lot of electrical components, especially the inclusion of a transformer - which would also greatly increase the dimensions and weight of the DreamCharger. It would have become very hot when the adapter circuit works, which may shorten the life of the battery cells. 

3. Q.) Why not design a LED flashlight on DreamCharger?

A.) A small size LED lamp leads to a low luminous. A high luminous LED lamp has a larger size, and a higher temperature when it works. This LED lamp may need a larger and more-complex cooling component, which can not be put into the DreamCharger. At present, most mobile phones also provide a flashlight function. So we thought that a low luminous flashlight isn't totally necessary. 

4. Q.) Why does the DreamCharger not have a short movie?

A.) Since we've already exceeded our budget and costs associated with developing the DreamCharger, we've decided that it's too expensive to make a short movie for the DreamCharger. We're saving this money, and we instead find it more appropriate to use the majority of our funds on creating high-quality molds and components. We will eventually add a simple video to our YouTube, so please keep an eye on our channel.

5. Q.) Why do some details of the DreamCharger in some of the pictures not look clear enough?

A.) That's because almost all of the DreamCharger's pictures are taken of our one and only prototype. Rather than using 3D software rendered pictures, we wanted to keep the DreamCharger's appearance more realistic. The actual appearance of the DreamCharger in future production will appear much better than the pictures shown in this campaign.

6. Q.) Why are there no words or patterns printed on the DreamCharger's shell?

A.) This is only a prototype. We will print our logo, the specifications and a lot of other information on DreamCharger's shell once the time comes for mass production. In fact, there will be a complete product package when we mail them to our customers. The package will include the cable, instruction manual, packaging materials and so on.

7. Q.) How many DreamChargers should I buy to be able to customize my own logo?

A.) You just need to purchase one DreamCharger in this campaign to be able to customize your own logo for display on it. Or, if you purchase five or more DreamChargers at one time, your logo that you design will be added for free. You'll just need to send us the picture of the logo. In the future, we will require a minimum order quantity for logo customization.

          Risks & Challenges

          Our team has solved all of the difficulties which arise when engineering powerful technology. Through creating, designing and launching the DreamCharger, we've been able to do the all of the "dirty work" for you. 

          Our next step will be to build the mold of the DreamCharger and then begin with our production supply - which is a much easier process compared to all of the problems which we've already solved.

          Here's a breakdown of our team members skills so that you can feel safe and secure in knowing that we have the knowledge and expertise to deliver you the highest-quality mobile chargers in the world.

          • Jin is the hardware engineer and project manager of DreamCharger. He is a self-proclaimed geek who loves all things related to mobile power and technical electronic hardware.
          • Lin is our software engineer who's great at C, C++, Java and many more computer languages.
          • Zeng is the structural engineer behind DreamCharger, who has successfully developed the structures of more than 200 products throughout his career.
          • Together, we have more than 10 years of combined work experience in our respective fields.
          • With our combined experiences, technological knowledge and extreme dedication to mobile chargers - it can be said that there's zero risk involved in delivering the DreamCharger "dream" to our customers.
          • Timing is the only obstacle that we're working against - and we plan on delivering the DreamChargers in April of 2015 at the latest. 
          • We will be providing multiple updates and follow-up plans to keep our customers informed of all DreamCharger related news. 

          This will be a flexible campaign. We will begin all of the above procedures in advance of kicking the goal. Even if the campaign "fails" - the DreamCharger will still be brought to life. Donated funds will go towards crafting a high-quality mold, buying equipment, materials, and operating costs.


          Other Ways You Can Help

          Some of you just won't be able to contribute, and that's okay! That doesn't mean that you can't help:

          • Please spread the message. Tell your family, friends and anyone else in your life about our campaign.
          • E-mail this link to all of your friends who love their mobile phones and other technologies.
          •  Post this Indiegogo campaign URL to Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Tumblr, or any other social media website which you may be apart of.
          • Use the Indiegogo share tools to more easily share this campaign!

          Disclaimer (Posted on 12/23/2014)

          Delivery of perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. This is to set reasonable expectations for our contributors/donors.
story_txt:
The DreamCharger Story
 
DreamCharger is the world's newest, most innovative and greatest mobile power source that has been under research, design and development throughout the past year.  

The DreamCharger carries its name because it's not only a fantastic mobile power source, but also a dream for our future customers and ourselves. 
 We truly need your help with reading and sharing our campaign, and making a small contribution - in order for us to realize this dream. 
If you can't contribute with money - that's okay! Please use this campaign to learn more about the world of mobile power generation, and what we can offer good people like yourself. Spread the word about our campaign to your family and friends. 
 One year of research and design has gone towards mastering the intense details that the perfect mobile power source should promote. Our charger is a result of this effort. 
 
From displaying the remaining charge & discharge times, to utilizing dual-USB output ports for you and a friend to charge multiple devices simultaneously - the DreamCharger is a product that people of modern populations throughout the world need. 
Imagine knowing the exact durations of time that your DreamCharger will require to discharge to empty, and charge until full. These unique features of the DreamCharger will save you loads of time, money and energy when you can't afford to miss a moment of your extremely busy life. 
Having the precise charge & discharge details displayed directly on your DreamCharger's OLED panel will keep you consistently informed as to how much power your DreamCharger contains at all times - for the times that you need to charge your smartphone the most. We're setting you up with ALL of the information and powerful charging capabilities that you'll ever need to continue using your smartphone and tablet 24/7 for business, fun and your personal life. 
Never experience your smartphone or tablet "dying" ever again. Don't miss out on all of the potential that your electronic devices provide you with. You won't have to miss a single moment of life ever again when using the DreamCharger.  

The Impact Smartphones. iPads. Tablets. They're essential pieces of our high-tech lifestyles. People everywhere are now relying on mobile power more than ever before.
But have you ever been in a situation when you needed immediate access to an electrical outlet, yet you couldn't find one? Maybe you were expecting an important phone call from someone, and then saw that your smartphone's battery was low. Or, maybe you occasionally forget to fully-charge your favorite tablet before leaving the house. 
No one can afford to miss an important phone call, or struggle with using an iPad that has just 7% battery-life remaining.. 
Many of us run into these situations multiple times per week, if not each day. We've all been in these predicaments. 
And our team is here to solve these issues before they happen. But we're doing more than just that. We're solving the 
problems that come with lacking access to mobile power - but we're also doing it in a beautiful way. 
Here's what our team, and the DreamCharger will provide you with: 
Sharp Appearance
 
We offer a powerful, great-looking, and comfortably-held mobile charger. Our prototype is complete, and it looks amazing. With the DreamCharger, you'll be able to charge your mobile devices with serious power - AND you'll be able to do so in style.  
The DreamCharger displays information through an OLED (organic light-emitting diode) panel, which is hidden under a mirror-like cover. When the OLED isn't displaying information, you won't even see it. This adds a hint of mystique to the DreamCharger's image. The surface of the DreamCharger is painted with a UV (ultraviolet) coat which appears gorgeous, smooth and wear-resistant. 


Each of the four corners of the DreamCharger are also arcuated, which makes it very gentle on the hands, and extremely comfortable to hold. The thickness of the plastic shell has also been expanded to 2mm, adding to the overall appeal, strength and comfort of our charger. It's unheard of for technology this powerful to fit so comfortably within the palm of your hand, and look this good. You have to see and feel the DreamCharger for yourself to believe it. Once you use the DreamCharger just once - you'll never leave your home without one again. Whether you decide to keep one in your pocket, bag or purse, there will be days when you absolutely need to use your DreamCharger. 



Impressive Batteries

The heart and lungs of our device consists of its three impressive battery cells. The battery cells make up the primary source of energy for the internal circuit, and also provide the output power for your personal high-tech electronic devices. 
The DreamCharger uses the commonly known 18650 cylindrical lithium-ion batteries. Most laptops actually use these types of batteries. Therefore, they're some of the most mature and reliable batteries on the market. After testing all of the 18650 battery cells on the market, our team decided to utilize the SANYO UR18650F, which is a world-class battery cell with light-blue insulation rings, and red tubes. The advantages of our batteries include utilizing an ultra-high discharge plateau - which provides a better conversion efficiency for the internal boost converter circuit. The batteries also have a low internal resistance of less than 45 milliohms, which increases discharging efficiency, and reduces the overall heat that's generated.  This low self-discharge rate will preserve most initial energy when it's not in use. 

Our batteries offer a longer service life: meaning that more than 80% of the design capacity is reserved after 300+ charge/discharge cycles. The batteries are completely safe and secure. We've minimized the risk of explosion and spontaneous combustion. We've never experienced such an accident, nor have any accidents with the cells been reported so far. The typical capacity of a single SANYO UR18650F is 2600mAh. We've equipped the DreamCharger with three of these cells, equaling a total capacity of 7800mAh. 

Dimensions & Weight

The battery pack's total dimensions are 54mm x 65mm x 18mm. Our three battery cells weigh a total of 141g. After minimizing the overall design as much as possible (down to the millimeter) we've achieved a total size of 67.6mm x 104mm x 22.7mm for the DreamCharger. 
The overall size of the DreamCharger is only 39mm longer, 13.6mm wider, and 4.7mm thicker than its battery pack (approximately as big as two iPhone 4s'). The overall weight of the DreamCharger is 198g, or 57g heavier than the battery pack. 

We could have reduced the overall weight even more by minimizing the thickness of the plastic shell, but we didn't want to compromise the DreamCharger's strength & durability. Beyond the miniscule details - the DreamCharger is extremely lightweight for the power that it provides electronic devices with.   





Output Capacity

As mobile devices become bigger, faster and stronger - internal battery capacities must also increase as a result of this. More power is needed from external supplies to generate more powerful devices. 
It has now even become commonplace for people to leave the house with multiple electronic devices. You may need to charge a smartphone and a tablet device at the same time, or share charging capabilities with a friend (be your friend's hero). Based on all of this, we've designed two standard (Type-A) USB output ports for the DreamCharger. 

One of our ports is a low power output port, providing 5V, 1A maximum output, which can charge almost all mobile phones. 
The other port is a high power output port, providing 5.2V, 2.4A maximum output, which can charge both mobile phones, and the latest pads/tablets. 

The most powerful adapter that Apple equips the iPad with is a 5.2V/2.4A/12Watt adapter. Our high power output port is designed with this specification in mind, and is fully compatible with Apple's recognition standard. Therefore, all iPhones and iPads can be charged at their maximum current by using this port. 




Efficiency

Higher efficiency means more energy output, and lower generated heat. A typical lithium-ion battery is 2.7V to 4.2V. To get between 5V and 5.2V output voltage, it needs the help of a boost converter circuit. Most mobile power chargers use non-synchronous boost circuits, which means a lower cost, and a lower conversion efficiency (at around 80%). We didn't want to go down this low-quality route. We needed to achieve high-quality, and a high current output, in order to maximize efficiency, and to reduce the overall heat that is generated through our charger. 
The DreamCharger utilizes a synchronous boost circuit, setting the average conversion efficiency at different loads ranging up to, or even higher than 90%. 

Automatic Recognition Adapters  
The charging current is typically set at a fixed rate for general mobile power. But sometimes, problems can occur because of this. Connecting mobile power to a computer's USB 2.0 port (to charge a device) can trigger protection of the computer, and even possibly damage the USB port. This happens because standard USB 2.0 ports on computers can only provide 0.5A maximum output current. To solve this, we've added an "automatic recognition circuit" to the DreamCharger. So when DreamCharger connects to an adapter, it will automatically identify one of the three generic, main types of chargers. The DreamCharger will then limit the current drawn from the corresponding charger type, preventing hazards from occurring.


User Interface - Working Status Indicator


DreamCharger uses a 0.96inch, 128 x 64 dot-matrix white light OLED panel.OLED provides many benefits such as self-luminous, high contrast, high viewing angle, high temperature stability and more. This provides the DreamCharger with an excellent display. All of the information that the DreamCharger provides you with is displayed through text or icons in this OLED panel. The OLED panel vividly displays the working status of DreamCharger in four modes: standing by, discharging, charging or charge over. If the DreamCharger enters protection operation mode, it will indicate: temp too high, temp too low, or overload. This protection function is considered to be the most comprehensive aspect of the DreamCharger. 



User Interface - Remaining Capacity Indicator


Currently, almost all mobile power sources have to "guess" the remaining capacity by detecting their batteries' voltage levels. The problem with this method of guessing remaining capacities is that battery voltage may change based on different ranges of load. Therefore, this is nothing less than indicating the remaining capacity through LED's. 
Voltage of an empty battery will even increase after releasing for some time. This will show that there is a LED lighting, but the mobile power shuts down, once connected to a load. Again, this isn't an accurate method of calculation. 
Through our continuous efforts, the accuracy of detecting the remaining capacity of the DreamCharger reaches an incredible 1mAh.  Meanwhile, the remaining percentage is up to 1%, and is shown by both the battery icon and Arabic numbers. 
The more accurate our remaining capacity indicator is, the better you can take advantage of the DreamCharger. 


User Interface - Remaining Time for Charging and Discharging

When you use a mobile power charger for your electronic devices, you want to see accurate charging data. This is what keeps you from encountering possible unfortunate situations. Being aware of your real-time charging & discharging information at all times is about preventing bad outcomes from happening. It's about taking control. You want to know the exact duration it will take for your DreamCharger to discharge to empty, and the duration of time that DreamCharger will need to be charged to full. 
The benefit of 1mAh accurate precision is that if we simultaneously monitor the current flow into or out of the battery pack, we can get the remaining charge time to full, or discharge to empty. We calculate these precise figures by using simple division: Remaining capacity (mAh) ÷ current. For example - when using the DreamCharger to charge a pad, assuming that the remaining capacity is full (7800mAh), and the current flowing out from the battery pack is 2000mA, the remaining time = 7800mAh÷2000mA = 3.9 hours. Similarly, when we charge the DreamCharger, assuming the remaining capacity is empty (0 mAh), and the current flowing into the battery pack is 1500mA, then the remaining time = (7800mAh - 0mAh) ÷ 1500mA = 5.2 hours. It's not too complex. DreamCharger can calculate these times with accuracy up to 1 minute, and will indicate these figures on-screen, automatically. 
To go a little deeper, in order to prevent the current from jumping, the current is averaged. Thus, DreamCharger will take a few seconds to average the current at the initial stage of charging or discharging. The more stable the current, the more accurately the remaining time can be calculated for you.


User Interface - Battery Pack Status Monitor 

When you're driving a car, sometimes you may check your engine's temperature, your speed, and so on. This is all of the important information that is indicative of the health of your automobile. 
DreamCharger provides an interface similar to this - but instead monitors your battery pack, cell temperature, remaining capacity, voltage, and current flown into or out. You can think of it as the automobile of your electronics. We also show the voltage's current value shown by the bar icon. 
You can check the current and voltage VS maximum and minimum in the form of a simple ratio. For SANYO UR18650F (which the DreamCharger currently uses) the voltage 3V corresponds with an empty bar, while 4.2V corresponds with a full bar. For the current bar, 0A corresponds with an empty bar, and 5A corresponds with full when discharging, or 2A corresponds with full when charging. 
Tip: When charging your devices, you can roughly estimate the current flowing out of the USB port.
